Solution on-sentence summary: An easy-to-use, inflatable, automatic, and foldable wing sail, using wind propulsion to decrease fuel and GHG emissions
Identification: WISAMO -Wing Sail Mobility- aims to contribute to maritime transport decarbonization improving the environmental footprint of bigger ships, decreasing their fuel consumption and their GHG emissions. WISAMO solution is a large inflatable, foldable and automated wing sail using the universal and free energy of wind propulsion, operable on any vessel -as original equipment or on those ones already operating. The wing's principle is to be inflated with small fans. It is automated and it may be deployed or completely lowered thanks to a telescopic mast according to weather conditions or to facilitate the boat's mobility i.e. when passing under a bridge, when operating on the unloading dock. The position of the mast has been particularly studied to be close to the thrust center of the wing in order to be more efficient. The main differentiating characteristics of WISAMO is the simplicity of usage, optimum power in upwind conditions -the most frequent use case, and efficiency in a large range of winds.

Tags: Marine & Oceans, Cargo ships, Maritime shipping, Fuel efficiency

Solution on-sentence summary: A retrofit infrastructure modernization with the newest technology without waste
Identification: A retrofit is a modernization of a system, which consists in replacing or adding some of its components while keeping others. The main advantage of a retrofit is the saving of resources. Instead of purchasing a new system as a whole, it is possible to integrate new functions, e.g. via new software or targeted components, while retaining the majority of the hardware components. Supercomputing Systems AG (SCS) has long observed the waste of resources in industry. In 2009, a first project was implemented by SCS to counter a partial obsolescence with a retrofit and thus modernize an IT solution without having to acquire a new global solution. Instead of buying new ticket machines for public transport in the canton of Zug, SCS made a retrofit. This pioneering project paved the way for many other projects (dynamic passenger information displays, parking guidance systems, relay interlocking systems) in which an SCS department has now specialized.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, BusinessManufacturingComputers & Other Electronics, BusinessServicesRetailerB2C E-Commerce Platforms, BusinessServicesRetailerNon-food Retail Stores
Tags: Electronic waste, Packaging & plastics waste
The environmental benefits: The software that we have developed for our first customer in the public transport domain is now installed on about 2'500 points of sale;We do not only retrofit ticket vending machines, but have implemented and deployed in Switzerland our solution in two additional domains, i.e. information displays and parking guidance systems;Usually saving about 90% of the CO2 grey energy emissions;Each retrofit is of course different, but when we consider that a retrofit of an existing infrastructure makes it possible to not create new devices and simply change the necessary internal components (e.g. computing units);In the case of ticket vending machines, a retrofit makes it possible to reuse the concrete base on which the device is installed, which implies 100% reuse of the existing concrete foundation;
The Financial benefits: When compared to mainstream alternatives (consisting e.g. in buying a new system), our solution enable the customers to save at least 75% of the costs;After a retrofit, our customers can also buy by themselves the internal electronic component of the system, again at a price up to 75% cheaper than the one of the original provider;

Solution on-sentence summary: Environmental monitoring and steering tool, via bees which act as drones collecting samples of pollen which we analyze
Identification: Although pollution and lack of biodiversity constitute operational, reputational, environmental and financial risks for many sectors it remains difficult for many actors to take improvement actions amongst others due to a lack of metrics. The BeeOmonitoring combines nature (bees acting as drones to collect billions of environmental samples on large surfaces) and technology (software processing the data). Through the analysis of the samples, BeeOdiversity can identify, find the origin and assess the level of pollutants (heavy metals, 523 pesticides, nitrates, PAH, dioxins, etc.) and assess plant diversity level and quality. The BeeOmonitoring enables to (i) monitor industrial and agricultural pollution, (ii) assess the quality/diversity of plants, (iii) take targeted improvement decisions and (iv) implement adapted actions to enhance biodiversity. No other method can monitor so many pollutants and provide biodiversity metrics (on-site) as efficiently.

Solution on-sentence summary: An IoT-connected and consumer-friendly water recycling system to reduces water consumption by up to 45 percent in buildings
Identification: Hydraloop offers a full product range of stand-alone and concealed water recycling devices for residential and commercial real estate. Hydraloop purifies the water from showers, baths, and washing machines as well as condensation water from tumble dryers, heat pumps and air conditioning units. Hydraloop water can be re-used for toilet flushing, washing machines, garden irrigation, and topping up swimming pools. Hydraloop's patented technology is consumer friendly, carefree, and sustainable. Our treatment process removes dirt, soap, and other pollution from greywater without the use of filters, membranes, or chemicals. Hydraloop combines six different technologies: sedimentation, floatation, dissolved air floatation, foam fractionation, an aerobic bioreactor, and disinfection of the treated water with powerful UV light.

Solution on-sentence summary: A software platform that optimises energy efficiency and decreases emissions of ships, using digital twins
Identification:
Syroco EfficientShip supports the energy transition of maritime transportation. Using digital twins of ships, the software platform helps ship operators and fleet managers to evaluate & improve the efficiency of ships and decrease their fuel consumption and carbon emissions.

It uses physics modeling, data and AI to provide an accurate simulation of ship behavior and reduce emissions by 10% or more. 



Thanks to the digital twin, Syroco EfficientShip builds a baseline and tracks each ship's performance to guide the crew during operations, increasing the efficiency and performance of each voyage. 



At the fleet level, the platform creates operating conditions to predict and evaluate performance under different operating scenarios and routes.



In the research lab or design office, Syroco EfficientShip optimizes the design and operating parameters of the ship, testing advanced operating scenarios to determine the best configuration for the ship.

Solution on-sentence summary: A software tools to assess the geo-energy potential for sustainable heating and cooling of buildings
Identification: Geosophy allows real estate and construction professionals to assess the geo-energy potential of the subsoil of a building to be renovated or built. They can thus cool their buildings in summer and heat them in winter, dividing their energy costs by 5, and reducing the carbon footprint of a building by up to 90%. Geo-energy, or surface geothermal energy, is a local, sustainable, non-carbonated, discreet and silent energy from the shallow subsoil, which at this stage is largely under-exploited in France. This solution is based on our ability to develop Physics and financial models, using data science and machine learning techniques to automatize and refine feasibility studies of geo-energy installations.

This sustainable engineering seeks for the balance between our society, reducing costs associated with its manufacture (accessible to all) and being respectful with the environment. Solution on-sentence summary: Firelighters made with recycled coffee grounds to light wood firelogs in fireplaces, stoves or to light charcoal in BBQ
Identification: Smart and Green firestarters are made with coffee grounds, without wood or petroleum product like paraffin and kerosene. One box of the product helps start 40 fires (in fireplaces, stoves, or barbecue grills). As coffee grounds are 67% more powerful in combustion than wood, the firelighters are very efficient in lighting wood firelogs or charcoal. One box of Smart and Green firelighters allows to recycle coffee grounds equivalent to 75 cups of coffee which represents the average drinking coffee consumption of an adult during 20 days. As there is absolutely no wood in the Smart and Green products, using Smart and Green firestarter is a good way to fight against deforestation. By using Smart and Green firelighters, customers have the guarantee to light fireplaces easily, limit the yearly generated waste quantity of coffee grounds, and avoid cutting trees.

Solution on-sentence summary: A Noise Mitigation System that reduce the underwater noise impact of coastal and Offshore works on maritime ecosystems
Identification: The solution address the issue of underwater noise created by maritime works. Underwater noises have been the subject of numerous scientific publications over the last 25 years and are recognised as one of the worst maritime pollution. Human activities produce huge noise in the environment. These noises propagate almost without attenuation. That’s why marine animals perceive  accumulated noises up to several thousand kilometers around them. Pile driving during maritime works, creates one of the most intense noises, up to 260dB! This level is responsible for major impacts up to the death of individuals. Thus, protecting the ecosystem from these noises is vital for all species and finally for mankind. To address this issue, we have developed our SubSea Quieter. This innovative membrane is a 3D fabric with a coating providing resistance and waterproofness… Once it is inflated, the break in impedance between the water and the introduced air dramatically attenuates sounds up to 99%.

Solution on-sentence summary: An embedded system of sensors and actuators for hives to become bio-vigilant and connected
Identification: NOEHMI is a device destined to control conditions in hives in order to allow beekeepers to monitor pollinators' health. It may be utilized not only by farmers but also by companies, research centers, and local authorities. The device is composed of sensors, actuators, and a scale. Each device is connected to a dedicated application. Thanks to the implementation of artificial intelligence and Internet of Things tools into our system, data analysis, personalized recommendations, and remote control of conditions in the hives will be possible. The popularisation of NOEHMI will lead to a better understanding of how biodiversity is affected by environmental conditions, a decrease in the mortality rate of bees, and increased yield for farmers.

Solution on-sentence summary: A filter for the washing machines to capture microfibres before being discharged into sewage and oceans
Identification: We regularly ingest & inhale microfibres - tiny plastic fibres that our clothes, carpets, blankets etc. shed during use. By washing our clothes, we are releasing about one plastic bag worth of microfibres into the environment every week. Microfibres from washing are a major contributor to microplastic pollution. Microfibers in the environment enter the food chain and end up back on our plates. Attracting dirt, toxins and pathogenic bacteria they cause poisoning, genetic disruption (also in marine life!) and through the food chain affect humans. We eat 5g of microplastics every week, it is as if we ate a credit card. Our solution is a filter that attaches to the washing machine and captures microfibres before they enter the drain. The solution improves the quality of our waters by preventing the microfibres from being discharged into sewage and oceans and thus entering our environment. The dirty cartridges are being cleaned and reused and the mash caught recycled.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Developing countries, Textile & fiber waste, Reduce & prevent waste, Recycle waste
The environmental benefits: Stops between 80 to 90% of fibres that would be otherwise released into the water systems;The use of the filter will not affect the use of water and energy during washing. It represents 0% added burden during washing;The dirty cartridges returned for refurbishing and durable parts will be reused at least 10 times;Microfibre emissions reduction between 80 and 90 % ;Extended cartridge use that covers at least 1 month (20 washings) ;100% closed loop. All cartridges get refurbished with durable parts reused;
The Financial benefits: Price performance: 90 % fibre emissions reduction per 4 Euro/month (estimated cartridge cost after scale-up);

Solution on-sentence summary: A nutrient recovery system that treats wastewater while also providing an algae-based feedstock, a circular economy
Identification: CLEARAS Solutions created and patented the EcoRecover Advanced Biological Nutrient Recovery (ABNR) system. The EcoRecover treats wastewater to discharge limitations or below in order to simultaneously recover plant based materials, creating a circular economy and providing a consistent source of income for the owner of the system. The wastewater provides essential nutrients to algal growth, like phosphorus and nitrogen. Recycled liquid carbon dioxide is pumped into EcoRecover as the other vital component for algae photosynthesis, allowing the system to sequester the carbon dioxide. The EcoRecover is added on to an existing wastewater treatment plant, after the secondary treatment system.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Network
Tags: Algae, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Water & Wastewater treatment

Solution on-sentence summary: Replace phosphate rock mineral fertilizer with secondary source of biophosphate fertilizer for enhanced resilience
Identification: The Bio-Phosphate is a recovered and renewable fertiliser product for substitution of mineral fertilisers produced from Critical Raw Material phosphate rock. Biophosphate has macroporosus structure and economically high concentrated recovered Phosphorus content. The Bio-Phosphate products are formulated to BIO-NPK-C in any compounds as of user/market demands for both organic and low input farming application cases. The product can be adjusted to account to the needs of the land, soil types, different climate conditions, users and markets. BioPhosphate is control the release of nutrients according most important plant needs. Beside the highly available recovered phosphorus/calcium content the BioPhosphate also contains other important recovered trace elements, and other nutrients. Solution on-sentence summary: A patented, low-frequency sound separation technology designed to process impounded waste coal ash
Identification: Waste to value: Turning a traditional industrial waste into valuable, low-carbon engineered building products. The world has an insatiable appetite for cement. SonoAsh’s unique and patented technology provides the opportunity to reduce the massive greenhouse gas emissions associated with virgin cement production by recycling traditional waste and replacing cement clinker with a low-carbon, alternative material that delivers improved strength characteristics. Additionally, the SonoAsh process remediates the legacy, long-term, environmental issues associated with industrial waste in storage, improving groundwater and creating new clean technology jobs. There are millions of tonnes of material in storage globally that can reduce the emissions associated with cement production and help build future green infrastructure.

Looking For: Visibility, Partners

Solution on-sentence summary: The power of sea and ocean waves is converted to electricity through a clean and safe solution with high efficiency
Identification: The power of sea and ocean waves is converted to electricity through a new technology that is economically sustainable, and cumulated to safe work conditions over time of machinery, persons, and environment. The converter comprises interconnected rectangle parallelepipeds in their initial form out of the water. The structure, self-positioning in a certain depth, fluctuates simultaneously and correspondingly to the movement of the sea-ocean wave, accompanying it in its form and movement. From said movement, all the sections necessarily are going to change their geometric shapes, from rectangle parallelepipeds to oblique parallelepipeds forcing, by narrowing or stretching in its diagonal, the linear alternators to operate the generation of electricity. Generma technology helps to finally enter the wave energy conversion as one of the leading actors into the mix of exploited renewable sources which, together, will contribute to dismantling the use of polluting sources.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Credibility
Tags: Coastal, Marine & Oceans, Electrical grid, Wave & Tidal power

Solution on-sentence summary: The Dendronic process uses a novel solvent to turn waste wood into inputs for the renewable chemical industry
Identification: The Dendronic process separates the three main components of wood: lignin, cellulose, and hemicelluloses which can then be used for various applications, such as sugar production, conversion to bio-chemicals and new materials. Underused materials such as agricultural waste, invasive species, sawdust and non-recyclable waste wood from the construction and demolition industries are targeted as raw materials. The goal is to enable the bio-based economy transition by reducing the cost of input materials for the bio-based industries through the use of low-cost waste feedstocks as well as increased valorisation from by-products.

Solution on-sentence summary: A next-generation energy storage solution to tackle renewable energy integration and EV charging challenges
Identification: To meet the climate objectives, we must move towards a sustainable energy model which reinforces the use of renewable energy sources. However, solar and wind power only produce when the wind is blowing, or the sun is shining. This causes grid instability due to loss of system “inertia”, which ultimately impacts energy supply to consumers. Electricity is difficult to store on a large scale; production must always be at least equal to consumption. Without a mass storage solution, renewable energies have no future. OXTO ON is a flywheel and this Solution will lead the stability of inertia of the system, fostering renewable integration and electrification of transport. A flywheel is considered a mechanical battery that stores kinetic energy in the form of a rotating mass. It is a truly sustainable solution to the challenges of decarbonising power generation and transport industries. Three markets are targeted: Grid stabilisation, EV-charging industry, Building/Trains energy recovery.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Batteries - energy storage, Flywheel energy storage systems (FESS)
The environmental benefits: 95% round-trip efficiency, 4 ms response, 100% DOD & unlimited cycles;Modular system with 25-year lifespan and limitless cycles of charge;Lowest operation costs: no degradation of performance, no cooling system;True sustainable solution: 70% less CO2 emissions than chemical batteries (e.g. lithium) from cradle to grave;Fosters renewable integration and electrification of transport; contributes to reduction of GHG emissions;100% recyclable (steel) and cleaner disposal process than alternative solutions;
The Financial benefits: Lowest cost over 25 years (2-3x cheaper): low maintenance costs, no replacements, 100% performance;Payback time = 3-5 years;Enables efficient use of solar and wind, provides UPS capabilities (savings on fuel costs);

Solution name: Buy Back Program for Mobile Devices
Solution on-sentence summary: Back2Buzz incentives customers to trade in their old mobile devices, to refurbish them and give them an extended life
Identification: 80% of the total smartphone volume sold is estimated to remain in drawers (hibernating). Back2Buzz incentives customers to trade in their old mobile devices, to refurbish them and give them an extended life. By using a widget, an app, and a solid back system, Back2Buzz can give higher residual values for a trade-in device than the competition making it more interesting for a customer to trade in older devices. By refurbishing mobile devices, the life cycle of a mobile device is extended by at least 24 months. At the end of the full life cycle (which can be up to 6 years), Back2Buzz makes sure that those devices are recovered and recycled correctly, meaning that the batterie is recycled by official instances (Bebat) and that other precious elements (gold, silver, copper) are recovered from other components.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding
Tags: Recycled, Electronic waste, Rare earths, Waste collection, Logistics, Reuse waste, Recycle waste
The environmental benefits: 80% of the total smartphone volume sold is estimated to remain in drawers (hibernating) as the incentive or residual value is not big enough for customer to turn in their old device;The life span of a smartphone is estimated at 23 months where the full potential could be 6 years by refurbishing;Each newly produced smartphone needs 30 kilos of raw material for a phone in average of 130 grams and 80% of the total CO2 production in the lifecycle of a smartphone comes from its production;At the end of the lifecycle of the phone, precious materials (cobalt, copper, gold, titanium, etc) can be recovered instead of ending up on a waste mountain;
The Financial benefits: A higher residual value is economically more interesting for a customer to trade-in a old mobile device than to keep it in a drawer;A well kept mobile device can be given a second and even a third life, extending the life cycle of a mobile device from 23 months average up to 6 years;

Solution on-sentence summary: A land management system that rewards soil quality and biodiversity restoration by regularly producing valuable harvest
Identification:
The Biodiversity Incubator combines the renaturing of degraded land and restoration of biodiversity with the removal of greenhouse gases while allowing considerate reaping of plant harvest. It upholds the triple bottom line creating positive impact on people, planet, and profit. Degraded land regenerates over time while providing work and revenue to the local population. After repayment of initial investment, annual revenues from harvest sustain care and maintenance and act as a safeguarding value chain remunerating continuous restoration efforts.

It does not compete for fertile (food) land and is established on previously non-farmed land (additionality). Artificial irrigation is not needed. Enhanced drought protection of the perennial plants makes it better prepared for climate adaption. The solution endorses transparency, traceability, and accountability of all stakeholders. It supports directly or indirectly almost all UN sustainability goals (SDGs).

Solution on-sentence summary: The Sanura Flatmate is the most cost-effective shower heat exchanger for saving energy in existing showers
Identification: A lot of energy is wasted in showers. Valuable hot water is used for only seconds and is then drained into the sewer. By using a shower heat exchanger, heat can be recovered from the drain water and reused to pre-heat the incoming cold water. This results in significant energy savings and reduced carbon emissions. Current shower heat exchangers are integrated into the shower floor or wall, requiring breaking and plumbing work. Especially in existing showers/bathrooms, breaking and plumbing lead to significant implementation costs and hinder large-scale adoption of heat exchanger systems. Sanura developed the Flatmate, a shower heat exchanger that can be easily installed on top of the existing shower floor and connected to a standard shower faucet, without any breaking or plumbing work. By eliminating implementation costs, the Flatmate is the most cost-effective heat exchanger solution for existing showers/bathrooms.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Shower, Water-networks, Waste-heat valorisation, Green building
The environmental benefits: The Flatmate saves around 30% energy in the shower;The Flatmate can be installed within 20 minutes, without any breaking or plumbing works;By reusing heat that is otherwise wasted, the Flatmate significantly reduces the total energy used in a shower; In a typical use case of a 4-persons household, the Flatmate prevents around 5 tons of CO2 from being emitted over its 15 years product lifetime.;

Solution on-sentence summary: A cultivation technology allowing industrial-scale use of residual CO2, heat and water for microalgae production
Identification: Our solution overcomes the technical challenges that slow down the industrialization of microalgae cultivation, in particular in the feed, fuels, and plastics sectors. Indeed, raceway ponds are exposed to contaminations and poorly optimized, whereas more advanced PBRs are expensive and limited to small volumes. Our technology allows to cultivate large volumes of microalgae in a controlled environment at a competitive price, which cannot be done with the current available technologies. Our solution draws its advantage from the following features: - SunOleo photobioreactors are simple microalgae cultivation tanks with immersed inflatable light wells, which bring sunlight up to 6m deep in the tanks. Hence, deeper reactors can be made, allowing mass cultivation of microalgae. - As a closed cultivation system, it ensures a better product quality than Open ponds. - The simple design and cheap light wells material allow economies of scale and production costs reduction.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Funding, Network, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Algae, Carbon emissions waste

Solution on-sentence summary: A concrete additive to make recyclable waste light concrete by replacing 100% sand/gravel with solid waste
Identification:
MASUKO additive creates an endlessly reusable path to all otherwise non-reusable solid waste materials that can be shredded to small pieces and mixed into a novel Waste Light Concrete (see Wiki). Potential raw materials: polystyrene, rubber, IBA, polyfoam, motherboards, car parts, crops, sawdust. MASUKO complies with EU's Green Agreement!

We use the traditional concrete mixing process, so MASUKO's scalability is very high, clients already have the equipment to mix WLC. 

We replace 100% of sand/gravel in the concrete mix with otherwise non-recyclable mixed solid waste. MASUKO helps save environmental damages of mining sites and decreases the volume of permanent environment damaging landfill load beyond any other known technology. 

The final WLC product is soft enough to be shredded again and again, it creates a sustainable recycling path that decreases future need for mining new natural resources, by being locally reusable it decreases the costs and environment damage of transportation.

Solution on-sentence summary: A collaborative business model leveraging pyrolysis to end plastic pollution and regenerate nature in high-impact areas
Identification:
The Solution aims at ending plastic pollution while regenerating nature in the most threatened biodiversity hotspots. We created a Model creating resilience within ecosystems through the collaboration of local communities, businesses, environmentalists by leveraging plastic pyrolysis. Transforming low-value plastics into fuel such as diesel and gasoline is the only economically viable solution and best alternative in those remote areas, enabling as such necessary incentives for communities to collect plastic waste, generate a profit through its transformation, creating traction by fueling local businesses such as tourism and enabling profit allocation into nature conservation and regeneration. Research continues to enable a transition to more sober solutions and find better alternatives than pyrolysis. In any case the action starts now.

End Plastic Pollution, Regenerate Nature!

Solution on-sentence summary: A battery fleet monitoring platform to ensure a circular logistics management of mobility batteries, based on data
Identification:
Batteries are a solution for decarbonizing our transport. But their production has a high environmental cost, approximately 100kg of CO2 for 1 kWh of lithium battery produced. 



At Bib,  mobility fleet operators are helped to manage their battery fleet. Thanks to advanced data analysis, they are given visibility on the state of health of their batteries and ensure optimal operational management of the fleet. With the ecosystem of partners provided, operators are enabled to repair and anticipate the most sustainable end of life for batteries (second life, recycling) to limit their environmental footprint. 



Bib Batteries offer a battery monitoring platform with a macro view (overall view, economic monitoring), and a view per battery, with the delivery of a passport to guarantee the residual value of each battery. They also offer optimal operational monitoring to take concrete actions thanks to the collected data and a European network of partners: local repairers, second-life actors, and recyclers.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution to clean, store and use rainwater in urban areas for the benefit of nature and biodiversity
Identification:
Source Urbaine's goal is to provide a simple and autonomous solution that will re-introduce Nature and its benefits in our cities. By collecting and storing rainwater from roofs and roadsides, we can ensure a system that doesn't neeed watering, even during extended heat waves.



All the vegetation and plants that are on our installations are regularly watered thanks to the source below it which ensures their proper development. This aspect is very important, especially during hot weather, as we noticed that the plant have the natural capacity to evapotranspirate ("sweat the water they drink") a lot more when they have access to a large quantity of water. The direct impact on the surrounding environment is to cool it down thus reducing the effect of Urban Heat Islands.



Our systems are flexible and can be adapted to any configuration as public real estate can be very difficult to cope with, especially in crowded cities. The dimensioning of our solutions can fit any of your needs.

Solution on-sentence summary: A digital solution to detect electrical consumption of individual appliances and provide related advice to save energy
Identification:
"Mes Equipements" is a digital service, that gives the power back to the energy consumer. It helps citizens to understand and control their electricity consumption. 



Since electrical energy is intangible, invisible, our customers have a hard time realizing how much energy they consume, and don't know how to take concrete actions to reduce their consumption. 



Thanks to this service, our customers can understand which devices are the most consuming in their homes, and thus focus their efforts. The aim for them is to reduce their consumption, so their bill and environmental impact. 



How it works? Mes Equipements offers our customers a detailed monthly consumption report directly in their phones. They access their consumption history and can compare them from one period to another, or to their peer, appliance by appliance, in € and in kWh. Advice is provided for each appliance to support customers and explain how to reduce consumption in a simple and effective way.

Solution on-sentence summary: Transparency-One Network is a global supply chain network to create a more sustainable world for consumers
Identification: Consumers want products that are safe, sustainable, and responsibly sourced. When making a purchase, consumers want to know where it was made, how it was made, and its impact on people and the planet. Modern businesses must ensure their supply chains are transparent, connected, and compliant with consumer values. Responsible sourcing requires collaboration with suppliers and among internal teams. It requires collecting and monitoring vast amounts of data to identify risks and assess compliance. In-depth and comprehensive supply chain knowledge is crucial to ensure products are safe, sustainable, and responsibly-sourced—from raw material to finished good. Transparency-One is an agile software platform enabling multi-tier supply chain management to achieve responsible sourcing. We help companies track their products, assure their standards are being met throughout the supply chain, and minimizing their social and environmental risks.

Solution on-sentence summary: Dracula Technologies has created LAYER to power the next generation of indoor devices
Identification: Billion of IoTs will be installed in the coming years and more than half of them will be inside buildings. But with traditional solutions to power these new products, such as batteries, we are faced with many challenges associated: Over 15 Billon of Batteries are thrown away in nature every year. Also, replacing a battery in Smart buildings is a problem, because this basic maintenance must be done by an authorized and qualified person. This means a much higher cost than the battery itself. LAYER presents high profitability for the customers with a low TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) thanks to a significant reduction of the maintenance costs of about 80%. Finally, using batteries requires dedicated space to house them in connected objects. All this leads to larger and less discreet products. LAYER was developed, which means Light As Your Energetic Response in order to become a sustainable alternative to batteries.

Solution on-sentence summary: A technological machine and software to produce potable water from air and solar energy in a sustainable and economic way

To this technology are added several integrated systems that improve the capacity of the systems, as well as predictive algorithms to allow the machines to be "smarter" and controllable remotely from anywhere in the world. The idea is to allow companies, factories, hotels and offices to have their own source of clean and sustainable water (reducing the use of plastic bottles as well as the pollution and logistics associated with it) .

Our main region of intervention includes the MENA region, Southern Europe and Sub-Saharan Africa.

Our service "Mon Chauffage Electrique Connecté" proposes to our customers to participate to electric grid stability by valorizing their heating system with smart thermostats on the electricity markets, via our demand response platform.

Solution on-sentence summary: Turns ocean plastic into wealth by capturing it in rivers and extracting the highest value from it
Identification:
The Blue Barriers are an award-winning solution to solve Ocean plastic pollution, by collecting it from rivers BEFORE it even gets to the Ocean. They use the water flow to accompany plastic litter towards a collection basin on a side of the river, where it can be easily removed and directed to recycle. They allow boat navigation and guarantee no impact on river life. Designed to resist any river condition thanks to stainless-steel cable structure, they represent a permanent solution to dramatically reduce the quantity of plastic reaching the Oceans. As recent studies prove, about 80% of plastic gets to the Ocean from rivers. The Blue Barriers collect about 100% of that plastic in std conditions, improving the quality of life of the local population, reducing the risk of flooding due to waste mismanagement and protecting important industries like tourism and fishing.

Selected among The Economist's Top10 OceanChangeMakers.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Rivers, Waste collection, Low-grade plastic waste, Packaging & plastics waste, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: Stops about 100% of riverine plastic;Zero impact on river life and boat navigation;Can be repaid in as little as 2 years by selling the collected waste as wood pellets and premium Ocean Plastic;Stops about 100% of macroplastic in rivers in standards conditions, as measured by the University of Florence Hydrodynamic Lab and during tests on Lamone and Tiber rivers ;Stops microplastics too, as the large quantities of organic materials collected act as a sponge and absorb extremely dangerous meso and microplastics;
The Financial benefits: Research from the University of Modena shows that installing the BlueBarriers in the most polluted rivers is repaid in 2to15 years by selling the collected plastic and pellets made from wood ;Protects relevant industries like Tourism and Fishing (2019 Deloitte research estimate the Economic Value Loss to be above $1.2B in Asia alone);Creates 2 to 10 direct and indirect jobs for each installation;

Solution on-sentence summary: Positive facade architectural solution to better integrate building projects into their environment
Identification:
Ultraçade Power is a composite aluminum ventilated facade system to solarize facades and make photovoltaics accessible. This system provides an architectural solution for integrating solar panels vertically.



The ventilated facade system improves the energy coefficients of buildings through the air gap that is created in the construction system. The energy coefficient of the building is improved by about 30% by this air space which creates a chimney effect that will limit the impact of heat in summer and cold in winter.



It is an architectural solution because the solar panel is framed. There are 13 shapes in total that allow you to adjust to all project lengths, and all project heights, with only standard pieces. It's like a game box, the architect can use the pieces, adapt them to his project, and have, with 13 different shapes, a completely unique project.



The product is Made in France, with varied mounting brackets and a 25-year warranty. Also, it complies with CSTB 3194 specifications.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Visibility, Credibility
Tags: Thermal insulation, Construction, Solar photovoltaic, Green building, Smart-buildings
The environmental benefits: Up to 90% self-consumption of the energy produced by the facade;Up to 30% improvement in the energy coefficients of the building by the system of implementation of ventilated facade of our solution;Aesthetic architectural solution allowing architects and project leaders to have a solution that easily integrates into the environment of their projects; Today only 10% of old buildings can receive photovoltaics on the roof, while more than 60% can receive them on the facade;100% recyclable product and construction system. (excluding photovoltaic module);Makes it possible to give access to industrialists, shops, public buildings to photovoltaic energy for their electrical self-consumption and to save money while participating in the energy transition;
The Financial benefits: The additional cost linked to the "positive" part of the product is only 20%. this allows a return on investment close to 5 years;No additional cost linked to a reinforcement of the roof structure;Possibility of solarising 100% of the facades in the snow zone, which is more difficult on the roof;

Solution on-sentence summary: A decentralized domestic water filtration system that filters rainwater to 100% microbiologically safe drinking water
Identification: The Drop2Drink Unit is a decentralized water filtration system primarily used domestically (but also suitable for SME's). The Unit is designed to combat the increasing global water scarcity. The Drop2Drink unit has been certified by the World Health Organisation and has been tested by local and international drinking water companies. The unit delivers water on demand. Rainwater is collected in a rainwater storage tank or sack. Whenever a user opens a tap point the water is pumped through the Drop2Drink Unit. The water first passes a microfilter, an activated carbon filter, an ultrafilter and as a backup a UVC-Unit. The system can be monitored constantly (highly recommended option). We guarantee 100% microbiologically safe drinking water and aim to provide access to safe water for everyone. The Drop2Drink unit is flexible, plug&play, durable, economical and consistent. As D2D Water Solutions, we are committed to giving back to society and providing a solution to water scarcity.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Credibility
Tags: Drinking-water, Water-networks, Filtration & purification, Water quality, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: Guarantees 100% microbiologically safe drinking water;Save up to 100% on central water supply, effectively becoming "Water-neutral";Also removes microplastics and asbestos up to 0.01 micron;In 2025 1,8 billion people will be living in countries or regions with absolute water scarcity (WWAP, 2012) and two-thirds of the worlds population could be living under water stressed conditions;23,52% relative CO2eq savings and reduce our collective dependence on freshwater sources as rainwater fulfills your water need;
The Financial benefits: Save between €489,16 (1 p. household) and €1.330,64 annually (4 p. household) on water, gas, electricity, maintenance, soaps and cleaning products;Companies who have to pay for a rainwater charge can save 100% of their rainwater charge if they store and use the rainwater via the Drop2Drink unit. For example MEG-Gruppe (Bottler) can save €343K/yr;Save between 71% and 100% on your waterbill. ;

Solution on-sentence summary: A combustion-free process to produce metals from ore and residuals for a more circular world
Identification: GreenIron has a process to address a global market and efforts to lower the GHG output of metal production from Q3 2023. The outputs of the GreenIron process are valuable commodities extracted from magnetite, hematite, other metal oxides, minerals, waste, and residual products from the steel, mining, foundry, and manufacturing industries. The process is completely CO2 free, the only emissions from the process are water and metals. The solution can make a difference in the industry today as it works in batches, which enables modular and scalable operations close to the sources and our customers.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Metal, Reuse waste, Waste-to-materials, Scrap metal waste, Waste treatment, Industrial Waste

Solution on-sentence summary: A material-efficient concrete reinforcement solution for flooring, tunneling and precast applications
Identification: Dramix® steel fiber reinforced concrete offers a solution that is both effective, cost-efficient and environmentally conscious. By using steel fibers instead of traditional concrete reinforcement methods such as mesh or rebar, you can reduce the CO2 emissions by up to 35% for the construction of, for example, an automated warehouse, a production plant, tunnels, precast elements, etc. This is because steel fibers reinforce concrete homogeneously, requiring less material for the same level of performance. Additionally, advanced design optimization allows for the creation of thinner, yet durable concrete elements that use less concrete, steel, and water compared to traditional reinforcement methods.

Solution on-sentence summary: One-stop solution leveraging advanced stochastic mathematical models to devise optimal energy strategies for industry
Identification: j4energy provides a one-stop solution to support industrial decision-makers toward a sustainable future. Thanks to its user-friendly web-based platform, j4energy quickly builds a digital twin of your industrial plant starting from readily available data, maps its current energy situation and identifies optimal roadmaps to meet cost, emissions and energy security targets. Its advanced mathematical models deriving from scientific research guarantee optimal and risk-robust solutions by considering all types of energy technologies, optimizing their interactions and accounting for future uncertainties. Thanks to its proprietary technology library and seamless integration with suppliers, j4energy dramatically cuts lead times from analysis to strategy to implementation - from months to weeks - compared to business-as-usual spreadsheet-based energy analysis and traditional consulting services.

Solution on-sentence summary: The new approach to waste disposal offers substantial energy savings of 80% due to local compaction and electric
Identification:
The solution enables a waste collection which is significantly more efficient, quieter and cleaner. The new approach based on local waste compaction not only reduces the number of transports, but also requires much less space in public areas. Full compactors are simply replaced and no longer emptied on site, which reduces noise emissions to a minimum and allows disposal at any time of day or night.

The clever combination of small compactors and the all-electric vehicle offers municipalities a new perspective and scores particularly well in the area of sustainability. "Wasteloop" is the alternative for municipalities looking for energy-efficient, low-emission waste disposal to achieve sustainability goals.

Solution on-sentence summary: Holding connected electronic payloads in maneuverable state of suspension against gravity at lowest energy consumption
Identification:
The purpose of Hybrid-Airplane Technologies GmbH (HAT) is the R&D activity, production and distribution of sustainable flight systems and communication platforms, in the field of airborne autonomous robotics and cybernetics. The company invented a new way to fly that is completely safe and nearly silent. The flight systems can be powered by renewable energy sources and serve as carrier systems for a variety of sensors for different applications, from live event broadcasting to earth observation. The h-aero® flight systems are used in many fields, such as human and nature protection, public and industrial, infrastructure, as well as environmental.



We solved the physical challenge to keep electronic payloads in a maneuverable hovering and suspending state against gravity and with ultra low energy consumption. We solve issues with UAV endurance, safety, acceptance, payload capacity and noise in industrial inspections, earth observation and surveillance.

Solution on-sentence summary: A sustainable and feasible materials based on colloid and surface chemistry to restore works of art
Identification:
Our solution provides time-effective and safe materials to restore works of art. The time-effectiveness and safety of our approach enables the feasible restoration of large collections worldwide, which are common issues with traditional materials, allowing their transfer to future generations. In other words, our solution is a safe and time-effective way to guarantee the preservation of our Cultural Heritage, with high socio-economic benefits and improved resilience of our society.

Our solution uses non-toxic gels or biopolymers, aqueous-based cleaning fluids and biodegradable surfactants, as opposed to traditional petroleum-based cleaning solvents (hexane, mineral spirits). Therefore, our products have enhanced eco-friendliness vs. mainstream alternatives, and easily used by end-users in restoration SMEs/museums/collections. We provide continuous guidance service and training to familiarize stakeholders with these innovative solutions.
By: CSGI (Consorzio Interuniversitario per lo sviluppo dei Sistemi a Grande Interfase Center for Colloid and Surface Science)

Solution on-sentence summary: A carsharing service based on small nestable EVs for last-mile access to remote destinations in complement to public transport
Identification:
Kiwee mobility solution aims to reduce the need/use of private cars by complementing public transport or carpooling, including the lastmile. 



For the user, Kiwee carsharing consists of small individual electric vehicles available to users on a self-service basis, 24/7, station-based or free floating, available without a driving license. Kiwee cars can carry 2 passengers and are designed for everyday use (child booster, storage space), robust and easy to clean. Their design protects users from poor and cold weather.



For the operator, KIWEE cars can nest into a 10-unit roadtrain, drastically improving the efficiency of redistribution, charging and parking - 1 driver / 1 charging station for 10 units. Efficient redistribution ensures a high quality of service, including for the user finding a car at the right place in the right time.



Kiwee will be proposed for proximity mobiliyt, in city centers and suburban areas to cover the first/last miles of a journey using individual vehicles.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Financement, Crédibilité
Tags: Electric, Cars, Vehicles, Carpooling & carsharing, EV charging, Public transport, Electric vehicles

The Financial benefits: Commuting by Public Transport + Kiwee (rather than one's own private car) will cut commuting budget at least by a factor 2, at most by 7;Using Public Transport + Kiwee (rather than one's own private car) redirects the initial travel budget, on average 6000€/year, to local community economy towards local consumption and employment;Do not waste your time in your car trapped in congestion, use public transport + Kiwee! Roughly 40 minutes gained every day !;

Solution on-sentence summary: An engine that uses sound-waves to create a temperature difference and that replaces the cold circuit in a heat pump.
Identification:
Heating and cooling represent 50% of the EU’s final energy consumption and 80% of the installed systems, such as gas boilers, use fossil fuels. EU’s regulations to reduce Greenhouse Gas (‘GHG’) emissions are pushing sustainable solutions in the market. In that context, heat pumps are the most efficient systems and are expected to become the preferred solution in the future.



However, they are complex to install and have performance limitations. As a result, the current generation of heat pumps is expensive and not suited for application in existing houses. 



Blue heart heat pumps tackle these issues by generating acoustic sound waves that replace the cold circuit of a regular HP. Noises are reduced while the toxic refrigerants are no longer needed. The price is lowered and finally, the implementation in existing houses is facilitated thanks to the size reduction.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Electric, Heat-pump, Building heating
Sectors: Buildings, Energy, Heating, cooling and ventilation
The environmental benefits: A 1-6kW modulating output with superior seasonal coefficient of performance (SCOP) to reduce the energy consumption;Blue Heart has almost no moving parts and does not require maintenance. Its lifetime is more than 15 years;A standardized system suitable for every type of building that ensures a simplified and fail-proof installation;Uses Helium, an inert gas, as a medium - It doesn’t require any refrigerants and is compliant (today) with 2050 environmental targets;Decrease by 70% CO2 emissions per kWh provided;
The Financial benefits: Blue Heart enables a reduction in the purchase and installation cost of the heat pump, as well as that of its operation;Not dependant on the natural gas price fluctuation;

Solution on-sentence summary: Simple and low-tech water filtration technology that does not require electricity nor the use of chemicals
Identification: The Solution is a simple and low-tech water filtration technology that does not require electricity or the use of chemicals for the production of safe drinking water in remote locations. The solution emits less CO2 than commonly used alternatives for water treatment and preserves the environment using recyclable materials and no electricity. It is engineered and conceived as a self-inclusive system, delivered in a high quality and ready-to-use PEHD-chamber. The kls filter technology does not require electricity or the use of chemicals, which reduces CO2 emissions (compared with mainstream alternative for water treatment) and prevents environmental contamination from air, water and soil. The water treatment process is also completely silent and uses only natural filter media: the kls filter is entirely prefabricated from polyethylene, a lightweight and fully recyclable material.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Credibility
Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Developing countries, Drinking-water, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Water quality, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: The results of the tests carried out to date and the data from the scientific literature show a reduction in microorganisms (bacteria, viruses, etc.) by 3-4-log (99.9 - 99.99%);Turbidity (suspended solid content) removal far below 1.0 FTU in treated water (with turbidities in the raw water of 100 FTU) and the production of microbial safe drinking water without the use of chemicals and electricity.;In more recently conducted R&D work using bauxite instead of quartz sand in one of the slow sand filter compartments, the solution showed reductions of E.Coli and Enterococcus up to 4 logs (99.99%);The low weight of the filter (about 1'500 kg) allows, if necessary, its transport by helicopter in inaccessible areas;
The Financial benefits: More than 4 times cheaper than the mainstream alternative for a lifetime of 50 years without degrading water quality thanks to the use of a low-tech technology;Refunded after 12 years of mainstream alternative (UV-lamp) use thanks to a robust and low-maintenance technology;Almost 4'000$ saved per year using KLS-filters technology compared with the use of the mainstream alternative;

Solution on-sentence summary: A universal innovative eco-packaging adaptable for multiple industries and different products
Identification: Sempack is a new eco-friendly universal packaging. It is a flexible pouch which stand up or down. This flexible conical pouch is made of a 100% recyclable monomaterial film and was created in order to offer an alternative to existing packagings but also to provide an eco-responsible solution to the worldwide plastic pollution issue. Sempack has a very high restitution rate and is very light (more than bottles or Doypack). Consequently, we need less material to create Sempack than other packagings. It has a low carbon footprint and is ultra-compressible. The company is conscious about the planet’s pollution and cares about the bad impact of plastics on the environment, that is why we partnered up to create an eco designed packaging. We worked the project upstream with film suppliers and sorting & recycling organizations to ensure that our innovation is well integrated into the sorting stream when a Sempack is thrown away, and not ending its lifecycle in the oceans.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution to detect leaking toilets and avoid unexpected, large water and utility bills
Identification: Many are not aware that an estimated minimum 5-8% in UK, in US several government sources state 20%) of all toilets are constantly leaking clean water from the cistern into the toilet pan - each leaking toilet generally wastes between 274-1096 litres of clean water daily. Clean, unused freshwater leaks down the inner backside of the toilet pan, and straight down the drain along with the waste water. Water can trickle down the inner backside of the toilet pan so slowly that it is not even visible to the human eye, even the water surface inside the toilet pan remains calm. Aguardio's Leak Sensor is capable of detecting water leaks as little as three litres of water an hour. The device is simply connected to the toilet’s water inlet pipe with a plastic tie. It does not interfere with plumbing. If no one is present in the building, remote notification of water leaks is possible by pairing the Leak Sensor with a gateway.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Tags: Developing countries, Toilets, Water-networks, Leaks
Sectors: Buildings, Water, Water distribution, Water efficiency
The environmental benefits: The Leak Sensor will beep when it detects water leaks of more than 3 litres of water an hour (toilets and taps);Around 5-8% of all toilets leak, which could be avoided by implementing Aguardio Leak Sensor;
The Financial benefits: Average payback installations in Denmark expected 4-12 months (only leaks below 275 liters/day) ;

Solution on-sentence summary: An approach to reduce exposure to particulate matter by targeted integration of sustainable air treatment technology
Identification:
The Lungs of the City provides a validated solution to substantially improve urban air quality, aiming at particulate matter removal at exposure hotspot locations. The solution is based on a proven air treatment technology, combined with an scientifically validated application strategy and a vast amount of practical experience. Therefore it brings a meaningful addition to existing policies to improve urban air quality. With the Lungs of the City approach, buildings, objects and infrastructure are smartly and efficiently transformed into net air purifiers to bring relief at exposure hotspot and actively reducing health risk.

With the Lungs of the City, an important instrument has been added to the toolkit for increasing urban sustainability and improvement of the living environment.
Looking For: New clients, Funding, Partners
Tags: Air quality monitors & filters, Filtration & purification, Sensors & monitoring, Ventilation

The Financial benefits: A 2016 study of the World Bank has shown that each investment in air quality improvement will lead to a fourfold saving in health costs;A reduction of 2ug/m3 of PM2.5 concentration will lead to a reduction of more than 6% of the socio-economic cost per year per person. ;

RHeX heat exchangers are a patented solution that can fill a gap in specific niche applications where it is possible to harvest energy from fluids with high levels of mechanical impurities or which, due to their properties, would normally foul or clog traditional heat exchangers.

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy and water-efficient solution to eliminate scaling by limestone in water networks
Identification:
The CO2 BICARBONIZER eliminates scaling by limestone from all equipment with a reduced carbon footprint, energy consumption and water consumption.

The solution is an ecological anti-limestone process with a natural and effective effect called the Karstic effect.

It completely cures limestone and offers optimal drinking water quality with no discharge for operation, and thus takes care of equipment and the health of the house habitants.

The installation does not require a licensed plumber to install and commission the device.

The Bicarbonizer contributes to recycling CO2 by transforming limestone.

Unlike salt softeners, the solution does not consume salt and does not release brine water into the environment. Its CO2 consumption recycles the equivalent of the CO2 absorption of a small tree, i.e. a small tree per year per family.
Looking For: Réseau, Nouveaux clients, Visibilité, Partenaires, Crédibilité
Tags: Drinking-water, Water-networks, Chemicals, Water quality
The environmental benefits: 100% curative of limestone and treats drinking water ;A 10kg bottle of CO2 to treat approximately 80-100 m3 of water, i.e. the equivalent of the water consumption of a family of 4 in an apartment for 1 year on ;Recycling 10 kg of food CO2 from a family per year is approximately the absorption of a young tree for its growth in one year;Use of approximately 80% less product in water for less waste;Crockery equipment, stainless steel sink, dishwasher, washing machine, water heater, kettle, coffee maker, shower screens, taps, (etc.) are preserved;
The Financial benefits: Less energy consumption for heating resistors without limescale deposits and water without pieces of limescale;Healthy tap water that reduces the need of buying plastic bottled water, which generates savings;

Shared airport low carbon transport solution for passengers on the same flight or taking off in the same time slot.

This solution aims to reduce the number of vehicles on city center / airport journeys, for example: 33% of passengers are accompanied by a relative at the airport.

This solution is based on a matching platform that pools passenger transport, providing door-to-door accompaniment.

Among the many advantages, the solution reduces direct and indirect C02 emissions.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: Advanced Energy Communities (EC) solution to simplify the setting up and management of EC
Identification: The solution aims to deliver economic, social and environmental benefits to end-users, while also empowering the active participation of citizens in the energy markets. The solution is a modular, interoperable and localized cloud-based Operating System designed to manage energy communities around the world, managing the energy flows and trades, as well as distributed energy assets to increase collective self-consumption, provides aggregation of flexible assets for balancing markets participation, and it can also aggregate generation to participate in Energy Markets. End-users (residential or C&I) are provided with apps to monitor and manage energy flows and transactions. The solution seamlessly connects the dots between behind-the-meter optimization for community members and front-of-the-meter grid resiliency and transaction management for local energy markets. It is promoting the energy transition in a decentralized, digitalized and democratized way.

Solution name: Hybrid Small wind solar mini power plants
Solution on-sentence summary: A hybrid micro power plant generating energy from wind & solar, to be installed easily on rooftops of  buildings
Identification:
PowerPyramid and EnergyTower are unique hybrid micro power plants to generate clean energy from wind and sun all year round. It can be easily installed on the roofs of buildings such as houses, farms and offices, or placed free-standing.

We mount multiple solar panels on a wooden frame, add a dual vertical axis wind turbine at the top and the controls and electronics below to ensure optimal power production when the sun is shining or the wind is blowing. The devices are characterized by low installation costs, high turbulence resistance, low costs and high robustness and effectiveness. According to the UN, more than 1.4 billion people still have no access to electricity: with the use of hybrid wind-solar small power plants, many of them can be supplied with sustainable, local and clean electricity

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular & autonomous water filtration system which adapts itself to any fresh water source to provide drinking water
Identification: The unYo is a decentralized system that filters any type of fresh water to provide drinking water in a low-cost, effective, and environmentally friendly way, for small volumes (less than 40m3/h). Highly effective, the system is modular and adapts itself to water source ; it blocks 99.9999% of viruses and bacteria, pesticide residues, suspended matters and dissolved pollutants, all while preserving the natural minerals in the water. Thanks to its software, hardware and sensor technology, the unYo is autonomous and requires little to no on-site maintenance ; it does not require the use of chemicals, nor consumables, and it has a very low energy consumption (3kwh). Better for the environment, it has a lower environmental impact when compared to traditional technologies like reverse osmosis. Designed to be coupled with clean energy sources (such as solar panels) and easily transportable, its features make it the ideal solution to provide drinking water in remote areas.

Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Developing countries, Drinking-water, Filtration & purification, Water quality

Solution on-sentence summary: The Dynamic Combustion Chamber™ - DCC™ - boiler is fueled by hydrogen and oxygen, emitting zero greenhouse gases.
Identification: The DCC™ boiler is a commercial/industrial process steam generator (or water heater) fueled by hydrogen and oxygen. It emits no carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide, or other carbonaceous greenhouse gases. Moreover, it is NOx-free with pure hydrogen and oxygen. The primary product of combustion is water (steam), which when condensed is clean enough to be sent to a drain or recycled to the boiler, to an electrolyzer, or to another process that can utilize (warm) water. The purity of this "combustion" or "fuel" steam makes it easier to condense vs. more a dilute steam such as that obtained by combusting hydrogen in air. The energy efficiency of the DCC™ boiler is therefore superior, which is especially relevant wherever the cost of hydrogen is high. The system is particularly well-suited for electrolyzer-derived hydrogen where oxygen is a byproduct that is often vented to the atmosphere.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile:
Public Authorities, BusinessConstruction, BusinessManufacturingAutomotives & Road Vehicles
, BusinessManufacturingMachinery & Turbines, BusinessManufacturingMetals & Steel, BusinessEnergy Utility
Tags: Electrolysis, Hydrogen, Cogeneration (heat and power), Building heating, Industrial process heat
Sectors: Buildings, Energy, Food/Agri, Industry/Goods, Heating, cooling and ventilationPower and fuel generationIndustrial Heat, Manufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: The dewpoint is greater for H2/O2 (DCC™ boiler) than H2/air combustion gases (~98 °C and ~70 °C, respectively at 15% excess O2);A DCC™ boiler producing steam at 3000 kg/h generates ~29 cubic meters (7600 U.S. gallons) of clean water daily;A DCC™ boiler making 3000 kg/h steam saves 11 tonnes of CO2/day ;The hydrogen-oxygen fired DCC™ boiler produces at least 400 kg of clean, warm water of combustion per 1000 kg of steam made;
The Financial benefits: At $1 per kg and electrolyzer O2 recovery, a DCC™ boiler’s fuel cost is equivalent to a ~$6.60/MMbtu ($23/MWh) price point for a conventional boiler;Recent natural gas prices in the EU have reached around $100/MMbtu ($340/MWh). The equivalent cost of hydrogen (with electrolyzer O2 recovery) for an optimized DCC™ boiler is ~$15/kg;

Solution on-sentence summary: A microwave-assisted alkaline hydrolysis for an economically viable recycling process of PET
Identification: The Solution aims at providing a sustainable, and profitable option for recycling polyester, with a particular focus on what mechanical recycling is not able to treat. This Solution relies on microwave-assisted alkaline hydrolysis to go back to terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol, saving up to 60% of CO2 emission compared with the existing production processes. This allows us to go back to what is normally used to produce PET and polyester fibers with a purity as high as the one from fossil fuels. Re-polymerizing the molecules it is possible to obtain a new polyester without using oil (at least 0 kg of petroleum naphtha per Kg of PET produced) and with the same quality (i.e., physical-mechanical properties, scrap rate, etc.).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution name: LOHC infrastructure for large-scale hydrogen transport
Solution on-sentence summary: A hydrogen distribution solution that enables safe and efficient large-scale hydrogen transport
Identification: The solution aims at providing a sustainable, safe and cost-efficient option to store and transport large amounts of hydrogen via the innovative LOHC technology (liquid organic hydrogen carrier). The LOHC technology stores hydrogen in a liquid carrier fluid via a chemical reaction, making it safe and easy to handle and transport.  At the customer site, hydrogen can be released again when needed. The process of storing and releasing hydrogen is reversible, meaning the carrier liquid is not consumed. The idea is similar to filling and emptying a deposit bottle, which is then ready for the next storage cycle. The LOHC has the same material properties as diesel and can therefore be distributed in the existing mineral oil infrastructure (e. g. tank trucks, and tank ships).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Batteries - energy storage, Electrolysis, Hydrogen, Maritime shipping
The environmental benefits: 1,800 kg of hydrogen can be transported via LOHC in a conventional tank truck which is about 3-4 times the capacity of compressed hydrogen at 200 bar;There is zero molecular hydrogen and zero hydrogen loss along the LOHC supply chain;The lifetime of LOHC systems is around 20 years;Can reduce emissions up to 90 % compared to the supply of grey hydrogen via steam methane reformer;Due to the exothermal hydrogenation process, the solution can provide up to 10 MWh of high-quality heat per ton of stored hydrogen to supply e. g. local heating networks or a desalination unit ;
The Financial benefits: Having multi-100 tpd renewable hydrogen accessible before end of 2030;In many use cases the cheapest solution, while being safer and reusing existing assets (according to studies);

Solution on-sentence summary: An End-to-end digital solution to reduce and trace domestic waste and optimize collection operations in any territories
Identification:
Citi'ID solution has been designed to improve waste sorting. 

We are able to identify the quality of waste thanks to artificial intelligence. We use a camera integrated into truck mesh to detect undesirable elements. Data collected provide analysis about waste produced in order to raise awareness and improve waste sorting. Our billing solution linked to bin identification allows measuring waste production per customer. 



We also support collection companies in optimizing their collection routes to limit the frequency of their tours and reduce fuel consumption. 

Our operating software gives data in terms of bin collection, user invoicing, human and material resources used or CO2 emissions, with monthly and annual comparisons of these data. 

We are proud to contribute to environmental and financial gains both for our private and public customers as for citizens and the planet. 

With current versions of the solution Citi'ID, we are already helping our clients to save 30 000 tons of CO2 in 2021.

Solution on-sentence summary: A wave energy system using the energy in the waves for conversion to power and/or desalination
Identification:
The Wavepiston system harvests the energy in the waves for conversion to power and/or desalinated water (drinking water).

Between two anchor points a string is mounted with multiple energy collectors, like pearls on a string. Each energy collector consists of a pump and a plate. When the waves pass by the plates are moved back and forth driving hydraulic pumps that generate high-pressure water, which is piped to a conversion station for conversion to electricity via a standard hydropower turbine and/or used for desalination via a standard reverse osmosis system producing drinking water. A Wavepiston wave energy farm will consist of multiple strings with multiple energy collectors on each string all connected to the conversion station.

The Wavepiston system is the solar cell of wave energy - a modular system with identical modules, ensuring high scalability, high automation, and all parts fit into standard 40' containers for easy logistics.

Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility

Solution on-sentence summary: A HIL-based test solution to de-risk and fasten integration and commissioning of all software-controlled renewables/DERs
Identification: This solution provides an affordable and significantly faster solution for testing and integrating diverse software-controlled devices into the grid while ensuring their safe operation in all conditions. The Microgrid Testbed with Generic Models uses a test-driven and model-based methodology which allows all relevant parties to create high-fidelity models of their renewable installations/microgrids (i.e. digital twins of physical sites) and use these models to identify and fix control software issues by automated testing, as well as to integrate devices and solve interoperability issues before commissioning using the simulation/emulation domain. This way, the solution represents one of the key enabling technologies for a rapid transition to a decentralized and digitalized grid which is also more stable and more resilient.

Because we all have better things to do than spend hours trying to sell our wardrobe on the internet, finding the right place to recycle, or donating it, Mokki exists to take care of the whole process. Items can be dropped (clothes, toys, books, electronics) at the nearest Mokki space, they will be given a new life, from reselling to donation and recycling depending on the items' conditions.

Solution on-sentence summary: A control system using AI to optimize the consumption of activated carbon on the treatment of atmospheric discharges
Identification: MyClaugerDetect is an intelligent solution that optimizes the treatment of odors and atmospheric emissions while reducing the cost of activated carbon by a factor of 10. Our smart unit operates autonomously using a fixed setpoint to ensure regulatory compliance. By combining different data, whether atmospheric, process-related or collected from local residents via the odor observatory, MyClaugerDetect determines a risk level in terms of air quality. If the odor risk is high, MyClaugerDetect automatically adjusts the setpoint. The exhaust air is then filtered in the activated carbons. The goal is to use it as little as possible to limit the environmental impact. If the risk is low, MyClaugerDetect automatically pilots an air bypass to optimize the use of activated carbons. MyClaugerDetect makes it possible to meet regulatory constraints with smarter, waste-free consumption. Resulting in cleaner industrial sites, so that everyone can live together peacefully.

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy conversion solution that allows efficient energy production by low-altitude (urban) blowing winds
Identification: Until now, standard wind energy solutions have focused on the predictable behaviour of winds: the regular, laminar flow found only at high altitudes. However, winds can have much more varied behaviours. Windcity has developed, patented and produces a Passive Variable Geometry turbine, an energy conversion solution to allow efficient energy production by low-altitude blowing winds, enabling the utilisation of wind in urban areas for the benefit of society.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesBuildings Operators
Tags: Off-grid, Wind power
The environmental benefits: Urban wind applications have a great potential increase in energy harvesting: the turbulent wind power lost with conventional tech is fully recovered as a circular input by our solution, which offers up to a net +67% energy production. ;Urban winds come in many short gusts of 3-5 minutes duration: conventional wind tech use this time to slowly speed-up before starting to produce;Being fast to speed-up and starting to produce during the short wind gust requires acceleration: in a turbulent average wind of 18 km/h our solution displays up to 8 times (800x) higher acceleration compared to standard wind tech..;Up to 100% of the urban wind today wasted can be recovered: this translates to +65% overall energy production in the urban environment;Up to 45% CO2 emission reduction in wind turbine production;Average 60% of the blade materials from recycled fibers ;
The Financial benefits: in an urban wind site, pay 0,108 €/kWh equivalent energy price, that is only a 30% of the average 2022 energy price;Save up to 40% of the wind energy installed costs: our rooftop installation uses the existing building as a wind tower;

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular battery using immersion cooling to provide safety, high performance and long life to electric mobile machines.
Identification:
The solution aims at providing a sustainable solution for the energy source of mobile industrial equipment used in sectors like construction, agriculture, mining or logistics.

Heavy duty equipment are used from 5 hours to 24 hours per day and they require constant productivity in all conditions. Electrifying these machines is therefore a bigger challenge than eletrifying cars.

WATTALPS uses an innovative immersion cooling technology to effectively control the temperature of the battery and ensure together safety, maximum performance and cycle life in all conditions.

WATTALPS permits to OEMs of the Off-Road sector to significantly reduce their time to market and divide their CAPEX by 20 for high performance batteries. Thanks to its temperature control, a high number of endurance testing and a clever monitoring system connected to the cloud, WATTALPS’ solution enables leasing companies and fleet managers to control and optimize their investment in their productive equipment.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
