Solution on-sentence summary: A craneless system to erect wind turbines and lift blades by climbing up the turbine like a Koala
Identification: Koalalifter is a technical solution to erect wind turbines and replace spare parts without using a heavy crane. One of the most important advantages of KoalaLifter is the high adaptability of the collars. They are able to copy the shape and diameter of the wind turbine tower thanks to their adaptable friction collars. KoalaLifter is able to climb up the tower using the strength of the tower with winds up to 25 m/s reducing the wind turbine downtime. This provides reliability, robustness and safety during the operation.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Lightweight, Offshore wind power, Electrical grid, Maintenance and inspection, Repair, Wind power
The environmental benefits: KoalaLifter adapts to any type of tower of any height;Koalalifter lifts blades up to 20 tons, nacelle components up to 30 tons and turbine erection up to 150 tons;Component exchange takes 5-6 hours, turbine erection takes 17 hour and the wind turbine shutdown is shorter than with current methods;Less tree cutting & civil works because there is no need to create a clearance area to move KoalaLifter. It is transported only in a regular 40’ truck, where current methods need and use up to 40 trucks;Fast wind farm commissioning results in 60,000 kg CO2eq saved per wind turbine;Less CO2 emissions due to the reduced time to repair a wind turbine: each day the wind turbine cannot operate, it must be substituted by a non-renewable source of energy;
The Financial benefits: Operates with high winds, it is easy to install with an easy dumping system, and it is transported without any special permits;Twice less expensive than a regular crane to erect a 3/4MW turbine;

Solution on-sentence summary: A self-healing cement formula that reduces risk of leakage in carbon capture and storage wells
Identification: EverCRETE self-healing cement provides longer lasting isolation at underground CO2 storage sites. Those sites are designed for permanent containment of captured CO2, which is pumped down injection wells into porous rock formations up to several kilometers beneath surface. A custom formulation of Portland cement is used in a typical oil, gas or storage well to create an impermeable seal between the rock and steel casing. CO2 injection wells pose an additional challenge because CO2 can prematurely degrade traditional Portland cement. EverCRETE's self-healing formula reacts with CO2 upon contact, allowing the impermeable seal to maintain itself in circumstances that would require repair or replacement of traditional cement formulas at significant cost to the operator.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Tags: Underground, Developing countries, Cement, Gaseous waste capture, Leaks, Industrial materials
Sectors: Energy, Infrastructures, Manufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: EverCRETE maintained compressive strength under 28 MPa of pressure in CO2 saturated water through the duration of a lab test that caused traditional well cement to fail;EverCRETE is rated for in-situ temperatures up to 140 degrees Celsius;EverCRETE reduces the chance of premature failure of the cement seal in a CO2 injection well;EverCRETE performance has been demonstrated in laboratory and field conditions;
The Financial benefits: The cost of EverCRETE is approximately 10x less than the cost of repairing degraded cement;

Solution on-sentence summary: An AI and machine learning software platform to accelerate materials R&D and innovation
Identification:
Materials or molecules are essential to every aspect of our lives, from the clothing we wear, the phones and vehicles we use, the energy that powers our lives, to what we eat and the medicines we need.

The solution is a cloud-based software platform deploying our leading machine learning (ML) algorithms that make materials R&D faster, greener, and more productive. This allows companies to develop better materials and molecules faster, while minimizing their waste and carbon footprint.

The solution solves optimization problems that existing methods cannot solve, increasing the probability of discovering novel breakthrough materials. The solution works with existing processes and allows R&D labs to replace the slow and expensive trial-and-error method with a data-driven method, where the platform and algorithms orchestrate and guide the experiments. Companies can deploy leading ML algorithms with no coding and no ML-expertise required.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative heat treatment furnace which allows to decarbonise heat treatment, making it more efficient and safer
Identification: The ECO Furnace is a double chamber installation including a furnace and an integrated oil quenching cell. It is a compact installation that aims at replacing gas-heated atmospheric furnaces for carburizing operations. Thanks to vacuum, the ECO Furnace is very efficient. Heat treatment takes place at a higher temperature in comparison to conventional solutions, which increases productivity. Also, the carbon footprint of this equipment is optimized. Indeed, electric heating combined with vacuum allows to get rid of endo gas generators, and only consume the gas needed to carburize. As a result, energy consumption is limited and CO2 emissions are among the lowest with a cut of about 80% compared to mainstream alternatives. Thus, thanks to electric heating and vacuum, their integration in workshops are made super easy. Indeed, no flames are generated and the risk of fire hazards is eliminated. Moreover, ECO Furnaces can be integrated in existing batch lines, using existing conveyors.

Solution name: GEH2 ® - The Hydrogen fuel cell power generator
Solution on-sentence summary: The GEH2 is a zero-emissions electro-hydrogen medium-power generator for land applications (back-up & prime power)
Identification:
The EODev GEH2® is a hydrogen fuel cell power generator designed to replace diesel or gas gensets in both mobile, prime and emergency standby applications. This generator has zero direct emission, only rejecting water and heat as by-products. No noise, no fumes, no CO2 or fine particles. It was designed to be scalable, efficient and easy to use, and is equipped with the latest generation of hydrogen fuel cells from Toyota, giving it strong reliability and a record life span. It can thus be used in various scenarios, depending on the customers' needs, to provide low carbon electricity to support existing power supply limitations from the grid.

Customers comprise all sorts of companies that have temporary power supply needs or emergency power needs.

Solution on-sentence summary: Color-optimized solar modules allowing the combination of energy and crops production
Identification: Food systems have a significant carbon footprint and a lot can be done to decarbonate our favorite fruits and vegetables. Voltiris' solution, consisting of color-optimized solar modules compatible with crop production, enables the energetic transition of greenhouses and allows greenhouse owners to gain in sustainability, energetic independence and viability. The solution, based on a spectral filtering technology, is compatible with high-light crops. Hence, growers can fully leverage the large surface of their greenhouses to cover them at max 35% with Voltiris modules. For a standard 5ha greenhouse, this results in up to ~17,500 solar modules installed, hence transforming the greenhouse into a photovoltaic power plant. The solution brings innovations on both the solar module and an innovative 2-axis solar-tracking system that allow to produce as much electricity as standard panels resulting in a very competitive LCOE.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Identification: Akila is a digital twin platform for the built environment, able to measure and optimize environmental impact and efficiency all the way from a single building to large international multisite portfolios. Akila users can at any time see how their built assets are performing and use this reporting to easily document their progress towards net-zero. Akila is an open platform, meaning that, in addition to the modules developed in house by the Akila team, it will also feature integrations with a growing number of specialised software and hardware solutions.

Solution name: REDA Thermal Geothermal Electric Submersible Pump
Solution on-sentence summary: A high-temperature electric pump enables profitable geothermal electricity from wells that were previously uneconomical
Identification: REDA Thermal pumps are intended for use by operators of geothermal power plants. The technology gives access to more geothermal resources than would not be possible with a surface-driven pump configuration used in most high-temperature projects to date. Placing the electric pump motor at the bottom of a geothermal well reduces mechanical complexity and creates an opportunity to develop projects with deviated wells, allowing access to more energy resources. Traditional electric submersible pumps are not suited to the high flow rates and temperatures required by geothermal electricity generators.

Solution on-sentence summary: A Local biomass valorization solution
Identification:
This solution maximizes the value of biowaste at the source through the production of high value marketable products.



Increasingly restrictive regulations require primary producers and processors in the food supply chain to find new sources of value for their bio-waste. Upcyclean is an in situ biomass recovery solution that exponentially increases the recycling rate of a wide variety of residues. The solution maximizes their value by treating them at the source, before they become waste.

Logistics are facilitated by a modular and compact processing unit, and technologies are adapted to the needs and target markets. Using green technologies, the solution recovers high added value products for a wide range of application : food, feed, aquafeed, biofertilizers, nutraceutics, cosmetics,... for a zero waste valorization. With the Solution, waste becomes a resource.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution to eliminate the use of chemical pesticides in agriculture, seeking to produce them on farm
Identification: SoluBio allows farmers to eliminate the usage of chemical pesticides in agriculture by producing their own biopesticide on-farm. They are able to considerably reduce costs, increase yield and create biopesticides by the time they need. Today farmers depend on a model based on chemical crop control in which they harvest each time less with an increasing cost for such chemicals. This type of control destroys natural defenses, creates an unbalanced situation in the ecosystem, and pollutes soils and groundwater affecting fauna, and flor. Turning this concept into an economically viable and scalable industrial business implies mastery of agricultural technologies, production of specified microorganisms, closed bio fabrication systems, "on-farm" biological inputs quality control, and systematic monitoring throughout the cycle, from production to application in the field, and finally confirmation of the cost-benefit ratio with the post-harvest results.
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Biobased, Biodegradable, Organic, Pest control, Fertilizing, Agricultural equipment & machinery

The Financial benefits: An estimated payback time 6 months for the customers thanks to the  elimination of the usage of chemical pesticides in agriculture (less diseases, less water contamination, less biodiversity harming);Reduces maintenance costs by up to 70% while preventing chemical contamination of soils;

Solution on-sentence summary: Conductive and semiconductive nanoinks to make flexible electronics by additive manufacturing
Identification: The Solution uses additive manufacturing for electronic circuits production using special nanoinks and avoiding waste and unnecessary material losses compared to conventional techniques. Genesink has developed 3 ranges of high-performance nanoinks: SMARTINK (silver-based nanoinks for conductive interconnects, busbars, and antennas functionalities), TRANDUCTIVE – silver nanowires-based nanoinks to replace ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) for flexible OPV or flexible displays, HELIOSINK – metal oxides-based nanoinks (zinc oxide (ZnO), aluminum doped zinc oxide (AZO), and tungsten oxide (WO3)) to be used as a charge transport layer in photovoltaics cells/OLED lightings. The company is autonomous for nanoinks characterization, development and testing on all types of printing processes. The solution's nanoinks are composed of the active material (metallic/semi-metallic nanoparticles and/or nanowires) and the vehicle (solvent, binder, additives). The selection of the active material is determined by the required physical properties of the printed device (conductivity, optical transparency, stability of the printed pattern to bending and twisting, crucial for nowadays consumer electronics needs).

Solution on-sentence summary: A process that turns sand into fully operational solar panels in an on-site mini-factory
Identification:
For developers of large-scale solar parks and industrial operators at remote locations, who are dissatisfied with the issues with current solar panels (no flexibility on prices, expensive logistics and non-environmental friendly production), Maana Electric transforms sand (from deserts or recycled from other materials) into fully operational solar panels in an on-site mini-factory which fits into shipping containers. That provides cheap, clean and locally produced solar production unlike any other solution on the market today.



First, we purify the sand with several proprietary technologies.  Then, with the purified quartz (up to 95%), we extract the silicon and purify it to solar-grade form (99.99999%).  This silicon is then transformed into wafers and solar cells.  The bulk of purified sand is used to produce 2 panes of glass.  Finally, we assemble the solar modules which are bi-facial frameless ones.

Solution on-sentence summary: CIRCOULEUR manufactures and sells recycled paints, avoiding the incineration of unused paint thanks to Circular Economy.
Identification:
Anytime someone makes a paint job on walls, there is some leftover paint in the can. Adding them up, this represents millions of liters of unused waterborne paint which are incinerated each year, leading to high release of CO₂ in the atmosphere. At the same time, large quantities of raw materials are still getting extracted to manufacture new paints, participating in natural resource depletion.



CIRCOULEUR finally solves all these issues and stops all this waste by reusing this paint waste as a material to make new and more environmentally friendly paints. CIRCOULEUR manufactures and sells these recycled acrylic paints that contain more than 70% of recycled materials. 

Our paints meet high quality standards, and come in a range of beautiful trending colors. They emit almost no VOCs (volatile organic compounds), which guarantees a better indoor air quality. And adding to that, CIRCOULEUR paints are not more expensive than conventional paints, making them affordable for all.

Solution on-sentence summary: A process that converts crop residue into food-grade pulp for the packaging industry
Identification: Crop waste contains cellulose, lignin and hemicellulose which makes them ripe for manufacturing greener products. Using our circular fiber technology, we separate these core components. We use the cellulose fibers to create various kinds of paper and moulded pulp based packaging products. Lignin and hemicellulose can be used as a starting raw material for various chemical industries. Currently, we are using lignin as a binder for our second product to make formaldehyde-free engineered boards. Our technology enables a zero-waste circular economy process, which helps the farmers by helping them earn secondary income through crop waste, the market by providing tree-free and plastic-free sustainable ingredients and the environment by preventing crop burning and reducing deforestation.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution to provide energy insights to individuals & businesses, to fight fuel poverty and democratise energy literacy
Identification:
The Solution helps customers to get full transparency on their energy bills and reduce energy costs. Voltaware Energy Insights Platform uses machine learning algorithms to split the home consumption down the level of individual appliances - allowing customers to see how much and how many times they have used key appliances.  Voltaware also identifies whether an appliance seems to have become inefficient, and if it needs to be replaced. We have also developed a fully non-intrusive Elderly Monitoring product VoltaCare, which detects inactivity of the next of kin: customers who will get alerted if their elderly parent fall out of routine - providing peace of mind at all times between balancing work life and personal commitments.

Solution on-sentence summary: A textile-to-textile recycled material that replaces virgin oil, cotton and wood in production of textile fibers
Identification:
Circulose® is made from discarded textiles, like that worn-out pair of jeans at the back of your closet. Using a breakthrough recycling process powered by 100% renewable energy, we transform old clothes into a pristine natural material for fashion that needs no cotton fields, no oil, and no trees.



THIS IS HOW IT WORKS:



We take in garments that can’t be resold to people. Either they’re way too worn-out or hopelessly out of style. We prefer cotton clothes because they contain a lot of cellulose.



The clothes are shredded, de-buttoned, de-zipped, de-colored and turned into a slurry. Contaminants like plastic polyester are taken out. What remains is cellulose - the biodegradable organic polymer that cotton, trees and all green plants on earth are made out of. 



The slurry is dried to produce sheets of pure Circulose®. We package the sheets into bales and ship them to be made back into natural textile fibers.



A brand designs new virgin quality clothes using Circulose® fibers.
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Credibility
Tags: Recycled, Textile & fiber products, Reuse waste, Waste-to-materials, Textile & fiber waste, Recycle waste

Solution on-sentence summary: A maintenance-free engine oil filtration system that protects engines, limits oil change, and reduces waste
Identification:
The nitiFilter® is a permanent self-cleaning engine oil system that allows avoiding at least 2/3 of oil change while outlasting one's engine. It's a stainless steel mesh filter kept clean by a backflush flow, hence providing a constant and optimal filtration.

It increases engine uptime by reducing unnecessary maintenance while providing better engine protection than the usual engine oil filters. The solution aims at reducing oil change and the associated heap of useless waste while improving engine uptime. Filter replacement and oil change are made non-mandatory, reducing engine oil consumption by at least 3 and drastically limiting waste: no more used filters and much less used oil, all the while guaranteeing an optimal filtration. How does the solution work? instead of using a paper-based filter, whose filtration rating evolved with time and which becomes contaminated and deteriorates, the Solution uses a stainless steel mesh.

Solution on-sentence summary: A showerdrain that reclaims up to 42% heat energy from used shower water by pre-warming the fresh cold water
Identification:
Reclaim valuable heat energy from used shower water by pre-warming the fresh water

before it arrives at the mixer. Up to 42% of thermal energy can be saved by each warm

shower. The showerdrain Joulia-Inline has to be connected to the freshwater. By means of a heat exchanger module, the heat energy of the used shower water is reused to warm the incoming cold water mains. In this way the cold water arrives at the mixing valve up to 15°C warmer than before (from 10°C up to 25°C). Therefore, substantially less hot water is needed. By this means, a 4-person household can save about 1000 kWh per year. Joulia-Inline is sold with either 3 or 5 heat exchanger tubes, which you can select depending on whether maximum efficiency or minimal installation height is more important.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Shower, Water-networks, Waste-heat valorisation, Fuel efficiency, Building heating

Solution on-sentence summary: Smart mini-grids to provide affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy services for off-grid populations
Identification:
ENGIE MySol Grid produces reliable, clean and productive energy and provides affordable energy services, easily accessible to isolated populations. The solar mini-grid installation is connected via smart electricity meters to several thousands of users, such as small industries and workshops (tailoring, welding, woodwork, agribusiness, etc.), public services (schools, health centers, water pumps, telecom infrastructures), businesses (beauty salons, shops & restaurants, cinemas), families and individuals.

MySol Grid combines solar energy, mobile money, pre-paid smart energy meters, access to efficient appliances, and social engagement to offer a compelling service to customers.

By providing entrepreneurs with new opportunities to develop their activities and launch new ones, ENGIE MySol Grid unlocks the economic potential of the communities and enables a quick enhancement of the living conditions.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solvent-free surface functionalization technology reducing the need for dangerous chemicals
Identification: The Solution provides a new manufacturing technology for surface functionalization that enables a dramatic reduction of the amount of chemistry required compared to incumbent wet-chemical technologies.  It uses super-low energy cold atmospheric plasma as a tool to graft a nanometric layer of the desired functional chemistry onto the substrate. Typical applications include surface priming of inert materials prior to adhesive bonding, safe virucidal functionality on PPE and air filters using citric acid, bactericidal functionality on textiles, silicon-free and fluor-free release coatings, single-step immobilization of biomolecules such as antibodies and anti-biofouling coatings. The Solution is highly scalable and easily adaptable to many functionalities and production processes. The environmental impact of the solution is very low as it is almost emission-free, uses extremely low amounts of chemistry and very little energy.

Solution on-sentence summary: A battery for the grid that stores electricity by heating refractory materials
Identification:
STOLECT Carnot battery offers a new electricity storage technology to support the development of renewable energies. Massive quantities of storage are needed on the electric grids in order to reduce the need for fossil backup production when renewables are not producing and to create 100% renewable systems in the future. STOLECT works thanks to the reversible conversion of electrical energy into thermal energy, using turbines and compressors that circulate air in a closed circuit. Energy, in the form of heat, is stored by heating readily available natural materials, such as basaltic rocks, or recycled ceramics.

By offering a technology that is not dependent on critical materials, that can be installed anywhere and that is totally environmentally friendly, STOLECT has the potential to greatly reduce the environmental impact of electric systems in all geographical zones, in particular for small networks, in islands for example.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Network, Credibility
Tags: Batteries - energy storage, Electrical grid, Smart-grid, TES (thermal energy storage)

Solution on-sentence summary: The WAGABOX® solution allows to produce biomethane from landfill gas to substitute fossil-based natural gas
Identification: The result of ten years of R&D at Air Liquide and Waga Energy, the WAGABOX® is a breakthrough landfill gas upgrading technology. It combines two upgrading processes: membrane filtration and cryogenic distillation. Membrane filtration removes the carbon dioxide (CO2) and impurities from landfill gas. The gas is then cryogenically cooled to separate the methane (CH4) from the oxygen (O2) and nitrogen (N2). WAGABOX® technology guarantees grid compliant biomethane regardless of air concentration in landfill gas. It adapts to raw gas flow rates and composition variations and delivers three times more energy than CHP, the most approaching competing technology. Biomethane can be transported and stored using existing gas infrastructure. The solution is fully integrated and is protected worldwide by six patent families.

Sectors: Energy, Waste/Pollution, Power and fuel generation, Energy and fuel efficiency

Identification:
The Waterflush toilet tank saves its users time and money. Its innovative mechanism does not involve any flushing mechanism involving a seal, this leads to no leaks no risk of scaling and no maintenance.

Waterflush was born from the desire to take care of the most precious asset on our planet: water.

Solution on-sentence summary: The EV charging solution optimizing local & global energy profiles with a focus on each driver’s comfort
Identification: As electric mobility is on the rise, parking lots and public streets are increasingly equipped with charging infrastructures. Additional energy and power needs may become critical if not properly managed. SMATCH by ENGIE handles EV charging so to avoid electrical reinforcement while delivering the optimal charging experience to each EV driver. SMATCH manages the charging speed of each car so that the physical constraints and site-specific priority rules are respected, and each user’s needs are taken in consideration. In addition, SMATCH is capable to respond to specific needs of the grid operators by raising/reducing the charging speed, or even injecting energy on the grid (also called “V2G”) so to keep the equilibrium between consumption and production, with invisible impact on the driver's charging comfort.

Solution on-sentence summary: An ecological toilet with the same look as a ceramic toilet for all homes,
Identification:
The Ziya toilet solution makes the use of a dry toilet in an ordinary home accessible.

Ziya looks like a flush toilet, Ziya has the same functionality as a flush toilet, so it is an ecological toilet that looks like an ordinary toilet.



To be noted: Human faeces, obtained from dry on-site sanitation systems, can successfully be turned into valuable input (fertilizer) to be re-used in the local agro-ecological systems (Kelova et al., 2021). Solution on-sentence summary: Achille is a local marketplace using a Saas Mobile Platform for retailers to sell sleeping inventory to local customers
Identification: Faced with the constraint of unsold stock and the need to commit to the circular economy, Achille is the first Saas platform that allows physical shops to put their offers online to optimise stock management. The offers are thus accessible to local consumers who are guaranteed the best price, immediate availability and the shops' service guarantees. Achille contributes to putting the human element back into the digital relationship between shops and their potential area. The whole ecosystem benefits from less destruction, extensions of the product life, allowing to increase the profitability of the shops while gaining traffic, because consumers are in hyper proximity, buy locally and thus limit their travels to look for a product as well as their online orders, generating consequent impacts on the whole ecosystem.

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular semi-automated smart garden that grows edible plants, offering a continuous supply of fresh greens
Identification:
The Natufia One is an innovative semi-automated smart indoor garden for every home, community space or office. The unit is a plug and play device. A single unit is composed of a water tank as a base and a growing pillar where you can grow up to 22 plants or herbs automatically with automated watering and lighting.

Powered by Natufia technology units can also be connected in series: from home use to the whole community greens production. Instead of bringing products from farms to consumers through a long and unsustainable global supply chain, imagine reinventing the consumer journey by allowing communities to control their food and have constant access to food without negatively impacting our environment. Natufia aims at disrupting the way people relate to their food by decentralizing food production by developing a semi-autonomous hydroponics system that provides a never-ending supply of fresh greens and plants, all year long.

Solution on-sentence summary: Sustainable alternative versus virgin oil-based binders for paints & coatings, flooring and other industries
Identification:
SharkDispersions diverts waste from landfills and provides a sustainable alternative to the need of using oil-based binders for paints & coatings. The resulting benefits lead to a better and greener world with significantly lower CO2, GHG emissions, and VOCs. 



Shark Dispersions are created from damaged laminate glass, which has been sent to landfills in many parts of the world. This upcycling of the interlayer from laminated glass means SharkDispersions are created without having to harvest new raw materials from the planet. 



The benefit to a paint or coating company also includes more sustainable final products that help meet customer expectation and compliance with CO2/GHG reduction goals.

Solution on-sentence summary: The 1st eco-responsible platform offering transparent data recycling services to reduce IT and digital carbon footprint
Identification: The solution aims to provide the 1st eco-responsible platform for transparent data recycling. Selective archiving, reduction, deletion, cleaning and recycling of data are the keys to an eco-responsible use of data in modern organizations that are committed to energy reduction and meet ESG/CSR/SDG criteria. Hence, Systnaps has built on this DNA to develop due to a unique and powerful algorithm its Data Recycling® as a service solution. Systnaps considers its mission to support organizations find the right balance between the need for massive "datafication" required for economic development, smart and sustainable cities, compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, and protection of human rights and privacy while acting for the common good in an efficient manner. The promise is to support organizations in reducing their carbon footprint, energy consumption and spatial occupancy by up to 50% by data recycling and to support the optimization of IT infrastructure and data center expansion. Systnaps has the ambition to bring data into the circular economy!

Solution on-sentence summary: EP Tender is a battery service for extending the range of electric vehicles
Identification:
The solution aims at decarbonizing the transportation sector, one of the the main contributors to global warming, by enabling mass market adoption of electric vehicles (EVs). Our modular solution minimizes the environmental footprint of EVs while making them affordable, inclusive and convenient over long distances: traveling with peace of mind. 

A Tender is a powerbank, which is mounted on a small trailer, rented on demand and attached to EVs for long distance trips. From driver experience point of view, it is self-pairing with the car and self-steering when backing, providing a seamless user experience.

When not attached to vehicles, Tenders can be used as energy storage solutions, zero emission generators or mobile EV charger for roadside recovery. This leads to a very high utilisation rate of our batteries: above 90%.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: A kitchen water filter to turn taps into sources of clean water, to avoid bottled water consumption.
Identification:
More and more people on our planet drink bottled water instead of tap water. This poses a major problem for us and our environment. Plastic bottles are not only responsible for a large portion of the world's plastic waste problem, it also takes 1 to 2 liters of clean water and other precious resources to make a 1-liter plastic bottle.

That's why we developed the DrinkPure water filter. DrinkPure is a simple source for natural and healthy water straight from every tap. Our filter can effectively remove microplastics, pathogens, pesticides, odors and other contaminants. This has been proven by accredited testing laboratories. The filter can be easily screwed to all standard faucets. Our customers benefit from filtered drinking water without compromise! Thanks to the QuickFix filter coupling,  you decide whether water is filtered or not. One filter lasts for about two months. DrinkPure doesn’t only help you reduce plastic waste. It is also much cheaper than drinking bottled water.

Solution on-sentence summary: An AI-based platform to make cities greener through curb management
Identification:
Cocoparks develops a turnkey solution for cities to better manage the curb, in order to reduce by 10% urban pollution as well as increase significantly the accessibility of the city centers. The proprietary solution is based an AI-based sensor analyzing the urban environment locally (fully GDPR compliant) and in real-time, a SaaS platform so the city can steer the curb and an app for the citizens and users of the infrastructure. This enables cities to solve issues such as unsafe delivery vans being double-parked because of cars parked in delivery spaces, electric cars looking to park at a charging station occupied by a vehicle that is not plugged in, drivers turning around endlessly in the city center looking for a parking spot, which represents an important ratio of city circulation.

In addition, continuous parking that prevents other people from reaching local retailers is avoided. The solution can also be helpful for the detection of dangerous scooters that have fallen to the ground and are obstructing traffic and reducing the impact of construction sites on mobility in city centers.

With DC Scope, organizations can involve IT services in the company’s social responsibility actions: measure, understand and reduce the CO2 emissions of IT services. Solution on-sentence summary: Recycle plastic waste that has no recycling solutions, into a wood-like material
Identification:
Recnorec aims at improving plastic recycling  ratios by proposing a solution for waste plastic blends that were eliminated (incineration/ landfilling), in order to transform them into a material used for outside facilities instead of wood, metals, plastic or concrete.



Recnorec process can absorb mixed plastic waste streams, which is logistically very interesting for plastic waste generators. Recnorec material will replace other non renewable resources like wood, and is recyclable.



Solution works thanks to an innovative recycling process line that combines classic plastic shredding/densifying and extrusion equipments, as well as an original unique shaping machine.



Process can accept plastic waste blends without sorting or washing. Material performance relies on a relative steadiness of polymers composition in the global mix. We can absorb thermoplastics that never had any recycling solution.

Solution on-sentence summary: An air filtration device using sustainable, compostable and recycled materials in place of traditional plastic filters
Identification:
Traditionally, air purifiers rely on HEPA filters to perform their function. HEPA filters are constructed of dense polymer-heavy materials. Plastics and fibreglass which have an extremely damaging and lasting impact on the environment. The industry norm is for an air purifier unit to be sold, the filters will be used for their optimal life, then more filters will be re-purchased, on average 1-4 times per year. 



Tens of millions of these harmful filters end up wasted on our planet every single year, leading to enormous environmental damage. This is the problem we have created a pioneering and sustainable alternative to.



The briiv Air Filter is made completely from natural materials such as bioplastics and recyclable materials like cardboard and glass, with zero-plastic, natural, biodegradable filters which disappear upon disposal in a matter of months.



Our three stage filter process is engineered to perform on the same level as a plastic model, without costing the Earth.

Solution on-sentence summary: A thousand-year-old irrigation system making plants naturally self-sufficient and saving up to 70% of water
Identification: The ollas aim to facilitate the irrigation of all types of plants while allowing a strong saving of water. Simply plant the ollas near your plants and fill them with water before letting the magic happen. These porous clay water tanks have the capacity to self-regulate the plants in water up to 10 days of autonomy by slowly and naturally spreading the water around it. A thousand-year-old system still considered one of the most efficient in the world and the most sustainable. The ollas allow everyone to grow their flowers, vegetables and more without any specific knowledge. This eco-responsible system adapts to all types of plants, whether they are in pots or in gardens. Moreover, they increase the productivity of vegetables and use up to 70% less water than conventional methods.

Air purifiers to improve indoor air quality (houses, hotel rooms, restaurants, schools, medical offices, etc).



Based on a patented technology developed through 15 years of research, TEQOYA air purifiers are ozone-free ionizers. Solution on-sentence summary: An online solution allowing consumers and professionals to sell and buy second-hand household appliances.
Identification:
The solution izidore.com aims to extend the life of our home equipment. The marketplace, which specialized in second-hand furniture, decoration and household appliances, allows professionals and individuals to sell and buy second-hand products as easily as new ones. Thanks to the delivery service and secure online payment, buying second-hand has never been so easy. 



This solution aims to respond to urgent environmental issues, by allowing everyone to equip themselves better and cheaper. Selling and buying second-hand is also the opportunity to develop a circular economy on these types of products. Indeed, reuse is a real alternative to consider before choosing to recycle your furniture. 



Today, styles and fashions change very quickly and the objects that surround us have a very limited life span. This is why giving them a second life must become a consumer reflex. Izidore.com works to help consumers in this process and to accompany them towards virtuous consumption patterns.

Solution on-sentence summary: Heat recovery from cooling systems to produce free and eco-responsible hot water
Identification:
To produce the cold necessary to preserve foodstuffs, cooling systems need to extract heat from the cold rooms and reject it in the atmosphere (just as any domestic fridge).

Boostherm is a heat recovery system that recovers all the wasted energy from cooling systems to heat water for free at 55°C minimum for sanitary hot water or low-temperature heating applications. It aims at reducing energy consumption in sectors where the waste heat can be easily recycled in free hot water production such as in food production, food processing, food retail and foodservice sectors.

The Solution aims at removing atmospheric carbon and storing it away for hundreds of years, by extracting and stabilizing carbon from crop residues in tropical developing countries, in the form of a product called "biochar".

Biochar can be incorporated into soils where it remains stable for hundreds of years. In parallel, incorporating biochar in soils allows to improve soil health and crop productivity, and reduces the usage of fertilizers. Last, the production process of biochar allows to generate renewable electricity.

Solution on-sentence summary: A digital platform to collect, monitor, analyze and optimize the energy consumption of buildings
Identification:
Ubigreen Energy is an energy management software that aims at measuring, analyzing and improving the energy performance of buildings for commercial buildings, industrial sites and public buildings. 

For the implementation of a continuous improvement plan (ISO 50001, Tertiary Decree, etc.), a remote data reading system is an essential prerequisite. Thanks to it, we can build an inventory of the building, from the angle of its energy uses: detect leaks and malfunctions, define energy performance indicators, detect problems of service or maintenance and, finally, complete follow-up and reporting to technicians, operators, energy managers and company management. 

Associated with a system or an installation (electricity, natural gas, domestic hot water, etc.), remote reading makes it possible to monitor energy consumption, make internal re-invoicing, collect energy data and fluids according to consumer usage and identify sources of energy savings & equipment leaks and/or malfunctions.

Solution on-sentence summary: Sterilizing Compactor to reclaim contaminated PPE & commingled packaging waste into safe material at origin
Identification: In 2020 alone, about 1.56 billion face masks are estimated to have entered our oceans. The most effective way to prevent plastic waste such as Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) and other commingled used plastics from polluting our ecosystems is reclaim waste at its origin by sterilizing and compacting the waste into a chip.  SAFEReCYCLER is a compact reclamation platform compressed into a single piece of equipment the size of a refrigerator to prevent waste from escaping into unexpected places in our ecosystem. It is simple to install that is fully automatic with minimal resource requirements. The entire reclamation process requires minimal human intervention, is energy efficient and is self-contained with an extremely low risk of exposure to any pathogens during operation. The output material, which is certified pathogen-free, has a wide range of applications in housing and construction such as furniture sections, floor tiles, wall cladding and roof panels.

Solution on-sentence summary: Replaces single-use packaging with reusable, available, affordable and more ecological packaging
Identification: The reCIRCLE concept is simple and is already used in 6 European countries. It replaces the disposable packaging of on-the-go catering with high-quality, washable, microwaveable, tight-fitting containers and cups with lids. The products are made of durable plastic and are recyclable after hundreds of uses, at the end of life. The innovation lies in the combination between networks, products and service. It is suitable for restaurateurs who want to pack their food and beverage in a stylish and sustainable way and for consumers who want to enjoy their food on the go without waste. It works like a deposit system and the products are returnable and exchangeable in all the restaurant partners. The products never lose value, they can be returned in every state, except if the lid is missing. This way the circle is closed and the general public can enjoy a circular economy in everyday life and zero-waste packaging.

Solution on-sentence summary: A process to survey nature from DNA in the environment, making biodiversity measurement simple for businesses globally
Identification: eDNA enables data on species and ecosystems to be generated at unprecedented scales using DNA traces that organisms leave behind in the environment, especially in water. A simple kit is used to filter water from lakes, rivers or oceans, capturing the DNA traces the filter membrane, which is sent to a laboratory for analysis. In the lab, the DNA is sequenced and sequences are compared against a reference library to identify the species they came from. A single sample of just a litre of water can reveal hundreds of species, ranging from bacteria to blue whales and including both species that live in the water and those living on land nearby. The ease of sampling enables biodiversity to be surveyed in more places, more often, and by a wider range of stakeholders, providing the evidence-base for effective conservation, impact mitigation and restoration of our natural resources.

Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessMining & Extraction, BusinessConstruction, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Rivers, Trees & Forests, Soil and land, Algorithms & AI, Sensors & monitoring, Service, Software, Water & Wastewater treatment

Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative foldable container, optimizing the empty container transport, to make logistics more sustainable
Identification:
The solution aims to alleviate the problem caused by the empty shipping containers, due to global trade imbalances. While import-dominated ports accumulate large amounts of empty containers, export-dominated ports need them as transport equipment, requiring a repositioning transport of them.

In addition, shipping containers spend half their useful life empty in depots, causing a major problem in port areas that need large areas to store them.

The current strategies are not working and the final impact of repositioning empty containers is 20 billion dollars per year in cost and additional emissions of 200 million tons of CO2 per year.

Zbox is a disruptive foldable container that optimizes the empty containers repositioning. It's a patented foldable container design with the same features as the standard container. However, when it’s empty, we can fold it and bundle it in 5 containers in the same space as one, reducing the space in transport, storage and handling operations.

Solution on-sentence summary: WaveRoller is an oscillating wave surge converter that produces consistent renewable energy from ocean waves.
Identification: The technology is a submerged oscillating wave surge converter that produces consistent renewable energy from ocean waves. The unit consists of three main subsystems; Panel, Power Take-Off and Foundation. As Panel moves in sea, it absorbs energy from waves. Panel is connected to mechanical drivetrain which results in hydraulic fluids being pumped inside a closed hydraulic circuit. All the elements of the hydraulic circuit are enclosed inside a hermetic structure inside the device and are not exposed to the marine environment. The high-pressure fluids are fed into a power storage and smoothing system, which connects to a hydraulic motor that drives an electricity generator. The electrical output from this renewable wave energy power plant is then connected to the electric grid via a subsea cable and landside substation. The devices’ foundation is floating concrete barge which will be towed with a tug boat from harbour to installation site
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesInfrastructurePorts and Marine Infrastructure
Tags: Developing countries, Marine & Oceans, Electrical grid, Wave & Tidal power

Solution on-sentence summary: A dry exhaust gas treatment process to remove SOx and particles from exhaust gases of ships diesel engines
Identification: The dry SOLVAir Marine exhaust gas treatment system based on the injection of sodium-based sorbents provides an efficient, sustainable and profitable solution to comply with existing IMO 2020 sulfur regulations. The acid neutralization reaction with the SOx begins as soon as the sodium-based solution is in contact with the exhaust gases after the injection. As a side benefit the system removes more than 99 % of particles and consequently anticipates expected regulations on particle emissions reduction and can thus be considered as a future-proof solution. The sorbents used (also well-known as "baking powder") are environmentally friendly, neither toxic nor irritant or harmful to the environment and human health. They can be easily handled onboard without any risk for the crew or passengers. The resulting reaction products are considered as non-hazardous waste and different options for the treatment on land are available.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Cargo ships, Air quality monitors & filters, Logistics, Maritime shipping

The Financial benefits: 1 - 2 years payback time;Several millions of euros fuel cost savings per year per vessel;

Their food-safe sticker, StixFresh, can extend the shelf life of fresh produce by up to two weeks, by simply peeling and applying the sticker to the produce. The sachets and sheets formats, Shelf Defense, can be placed in clamshells and other container formats to protect smaller fruits such as berries and grapes from premature rotting. Solution on-sentence summary: A software solution to prevent aircraft contrails and convert achieved climate benefits into carbon credits
Identification: The Solution enables eco-conscious aircraft operators to avoid forming contrails at cruise altitudes, eliminating associated surface warming and cutting up to 60% of aviation's entire climate impact (equivalent to 2% of all human climate impact). The Solution leverages atmospheric science to generate a digital twin of the Earth's atmosphere from the surface to space, allowing operators to navigate around atmospheric zones where persistent contrail formation is likely. In addition to enabling contrail avoidance, the Solution also tracks aircraft movements to quantify achieved climate benefit for conversion into carbon credits in an emerging market worth up to $9bn globally (2019 flight numbers).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: An autonomous farm monitoring system for cooperatives and farm managers to early detect crop problems
Identification: Due to the increasing size of farms and its management, crop monitoring is becoming more and more time-consuming and difficult to carry out with the conventional means available to farmers. As a result, in order to prevent losses, farm managers use plant protection products and fertilizers, on their entire farm. Such practices have important economic and ecological consequences. Farm Monitoring 2.0 offers a daily crop monitoring solution that simplifies the work of farm managers and allows cooperatives to optimize their activities. Thus, through the combination of machine learning algorithms, remote sensing by drone and satellite, and models based on meteorological and agronomic data, the Solution ensures the anticipation and detection of the main crop problems (diseases, pests, weeds, water and fertilizer deficiencies, yield forecasts, optimal harvest date, etc.) serving the optimization of technical itineraries, logistic flows and operators' working time. The service, available on an annual subscription basis, covers the real-time acquisition and analysis of data from the relevant sources available, including meteorological, satellite, agronomic and drone-acquired data. Once processed, the information is made available via an application on a dedicated tablet in the hands of the end user or on a web platform

Solution on-sentence summary: Optimal aircraft dispatch planning software for air transport operators
Identification:
4% of all passenger planes currently flying over our heads are empty. Empty flights have a considerable cost, both economic for the operator, and environmental. As a result, dispatching the best aircraft for each flight and elaborating the fleet planning is a crucial operation. Yet, the problem has a tremendous complexity because the number of possibilities makes it impossible to solve by hand, even with a limited number of flights. Pogo is a software designed to reduce this volume of unnecessary empty flights performed by air transport companies, especially Business Aviation operators. It provides the optimal fleet usage for its users and achieves the lowest possible amount of ferry flights with no passengers.

It helps them improve the efficiency of their fleet. This results in direct savings for the operators and a reduction of their greenhouse gas emissions. Because the process can be automated and runs almost in real-time, it increases operators' efficiency. Finally, it also helps users react to last-minute changes, such as grounded aircraft or flight cancellations.

Solution on-sentence summary: Hydraulic storage solution coupled with solar panels, providing clean energy 24/7 to rural and isolated areas
Identification:
STEPSol has designed an innovative hydraulic storage solution based on the principle of Pumped-storage Hydropower (PSH), or STEP in french, but in reduced dimensions (less than 1MW), outside watercourses and coupled with a solar plant: the Hydraulic Battery. 



During the day, solar panels power a village but also a pump which brings the water from a lower tank to an upper tank (declivity of +50 meters). When night falls, or when the electrical demand is too important, water goes down and activates a turbine, which will produce electricity and compensate for the lack of solar energy. This innovative but yet rustic solution is accessible for local users who can assure its maintenance and participate in civil works



STEPSol focuses its offer on energy flexibility and the permanent adaptation of its micro PHS to the specific conditions of each site. Thanks to its competitive price, low tech conception and long lifespan, the Hydraulic Battery is a great alternative for off grid zones.

Solution on-sentence summary: Live costs and carbon footprint tracker to deploy cost-efficient sustainable workflows for audiovisual productions
Identification: TheGreenShot is a live costs and carbon footprint tracker to ease sustainable audiovisual productions. Delivered as a Web and mobile subscription service  it is used by people and teams. The solution digitises every workflow involving people and computes both costs and carbon footprints in real-time - with two key benefits: decrease the risk of budget overruns and enable productions to be sustainable at a fraction of the costs. It delivers accurate carbon footprints thanks to the granularity of the data it captures and its own computation algorithms – delivering the precision to achieve quantitative targets in footprint reduction. In addition, by focusing on all the workflows related to people – from travel to accommodation, from transport to catering and more, TheGreenShot solves the complex issue of engaging people to better address the Scope 3 dimension of carbon footprints. Through its large number of open interfaces, TheGreenShot creates uniquely efficient workflows.

Solution on-sentence summary: High power and fast-charging sodium-ion cells for electric vehicles
Identification: Tiamat's Na-ion power battery cell is responding to unsatisfied power needs thanks to its unique and patented Na-based active raw material. Offering superior safety compared to reference technologies, Tiamat's battery cell is also offering a long cycle life. These features allow (for example) automotive makers to reach CO2 emission targets by hybridising their Internal Combustion Engine vehicles with low voltage cost effective solutions. Using Tiamat's Na-ion cell allows better CO2 reductions by taking advantage of the unmatched high power offered by this technology. Finally, using a widely available raw material in Europe cuts the need to use rare earth minerals mined and shipped from many thousands of miles away, not only reducing emissions but increasing resource security.

Solution on-sentence summary: An air-water heat pump that significantly cuts lifetime emissions in the building sector
Identification:
NovaAir provides a sustainable, energy-efficient and easily integrable heating system for private households as well as commercial buildings, that is economically superior over the course of its lifetime.



By allowing the NovaAir to run on the natural refrigerant propane instead of widespread synthetic refrigerants, its emissions are up to 700 times lower than those of refrigerants in conventional heat pumps. When compared to a Single Family Home running on gas or oil heating, 3500-4500 kg CO2-equivalents can be saved annually. Meanwhile, annual operating costs are halved, which drastically lowers costs during the estimated 30 year lifetime.



The gain in energy efficiency stems from an intricate design made in Switzerland in combination with a digital platform, that allows for continuous optimization and seamless integration with solar panels and features of the “Smart Home”. The transmission of relevant data on machine health allows for faster and cheaper maintenance of the heat pump.

Solution on-sentence summary: In-line autonomous sensor to survey potable water delivered to people in distribution pipes
Identification:
The I-CENSE is a probe for real-time monitoring of drinking water quality inside distribution pipes.

The probe is directly inserted inside the pipe and measures chlorine, turbidity, conductivity, temperature, flow and pressure. It transmits the information through radio communication (4G LTE, NB IoT) to a supervisor. It creates a network to survey the complete water distribution pipe of a city. Fully energy independent and interconnected, it is mainly used for securing the supply of drinking water but can also be used for many other applications.

The main fields of application are securing the supply of drinking water, disinfection control, microbiological contamination monitoring, compartmentalization of leakage flows and asset management

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular and patented anaerobic digestion bioreactor to treat bio-waste
Identification:
BioRenGaz has developed a new patented anaerobic digestion technology that is 4 times more efficient and much more compact than conventional biogas plants thanks to vertical silo design. The anaerobic filter uses a recycled and 100% renewable packing material to replace costly and polluting plastic packing.

This medium provides an ecological habitat for the bacteria and enhances their performance. The solution is adapted for the treatment of liquid effluents and the great advantage, unlike other technologies, is that it can also valorize pulpy effluents like biowaste pulp.

The bioreactors have lower operational costs and increased energy production by keeping the micro-organisms on the packing material, which allows producing 10% more biogas.

The system is modular, so bioreactors can be built from a small scale and easily be expanded as needed.

The Solution aims for the optimization of the economic and environmental model of energy and agronomic recovery of biowaste.

Solution on-sentence summary: A renewable energy storage solution working as a giant water battery that enables the energy transition
Identification:
Pumped hydro storage plants store energy using a system of two interconnected reservoirs with one at a higher elevation than the other. Water is pumped to the upper reservoir in times of surplus energy and, in times of excess demand, water from the upper reservoir is released, generating electricity as the water passes through reversible turbines on its way to the lower reservoir.

Hydropower can play a defining role in the energy transition thanks to the balancing and system services to the grid that facilitate the integration of variable renewables.

With higher needs for storage and grid support services, Pumped Hydro Storage is the natural large-scale energy storage solution. It provides all services from reactive power support to frequency control, synchronous or virtual inertia and black-start capabilities. It brings support that was previously managed by fossil-fueled power plants but with even more reactivity and in a sustainable manner without CO2 emissions.
Looking For: Visibility
Tags: Batteries - energy storage, Electrical grid, Hydropower
The environmental benefits: Capabilities from milliseconds reactivity to weeks of storage capacity: Can provide flexibility at all timescales, in both directions (producing or absorbing extra energy);Pumped Hydro Storage capacity is 100 times higher than that of any available battery solution;With total installed storage capacity of 9000 GWh delivering short-medium-and long-term storage, PHS accounts for over 90% of storage capacity and stored energy in grid scale applications globally;By reducing reliance on fossil fuels, hydropower avoids up to four billion tons of additional Greenhouse Gas emissions being emitted annually;Hydropower has very low mineral requirements compared to other sources (accounting for only 2% of copper needs by 2040 - IEA) and does not use Rare Earth Elements (REEs) ;
The Financial benefits: The most cost-effective large scale long duration energy storage solution;Highest energy payback (energy produced/stored over lifetime versus energy required for construction): 8 to 30 times more than any other storage solution;With low operational costs (~ 1.5% of the investment cost per kW) because they do not require fuel, existing reservoir hydropower plants are the least costly source of energy storage in many markets;

Solution on-sentence summary: An artificial intelligence platform that gives maritime actors predictive analyses
Identification: Sinay proposes a Port Digital Hub, a unique tool for holistic data-driven port automation and environment management. Two specific services are targeted: predictions of ship time arrival (PTA), and of water pollution parameters. The combination of such two services is the best approach to deliver a solution addressing compelling challenges for the Port and Shipping industries (PTA). PTA is a key parameter on which a vast range of port management processes depends, including dock occupation planning or vessel traffic management. Further, the prediction of water quality parameters has a double use. First, assessing the environmental quality and anticipating pollution events; second, the calculations of water quality parameters share many input data with the calculation of PTAs. The rationale is therefore to acquire data from space and sea-borne technologies, to apply advanced AI algorithms, and to industrialize web-based services aiming at digitalizing Port logistics and environmental management processes.

Solution on-sentence summary: A system which converts waste heat from burning processes into electricity and improves energy efficiency in industry
Identification:
More than 50% of global energy consumption is lost as heat. Despite this considerable source of savings, few concrete recovery achievements have been made due to the cost and complexity of current technologies. Improving energy efficiency in industry is a major challenge for the economy and the most effective solution to meet the commitments to reduce GHG.



Our innovative solution produces electricity from burning processes waste heat. It works with fumes temperatures above 300°C in order to generate a power range from 25kWe to 1 MWe. The system is working with a mixture of vegetable oil and vapor which is propelled at high velocity onto a turbine. Coupled to an alternator, it enables to produce electricity. This electricity can be re-used by the customer for its own consumption or reinjected into the grid.



Our solution is robust, green and will cut by twice the return of investment compared to competitive technologies.

Solution on-sentence summary: Clinker-free geopolymer concrete technology to decarbonize the construction industry
Identification:

The Vertua product line has been designed to enable embodied carbon reductions allowing customers to meet their construction needs. Vertua was launched in 2020 and its products have already been used for large infrastructure projects in Europe and show high acceptance in Mexico, the United States, and South America.

This solution is focused on Vertua Ultra Zero, a net-zero CO2 concrete made as a result of an innovative solution created by CEMEX´s Research and Development Center. Vertua Ultra Zero is a geopolymer clinker-free concrete with a substantial CO2 reduction versus standard concrete manufactured with CEM I cement type. The embodied carbon reduction achieved from this material is up to 70%. The remaining 30% footprint is neutralized through carbon offsetting efforts.

Solution on-sentence summary: A repairable electric battery that uses solder-less design to reduce CO2 footprint of e-bikes
Identification: Non-replaceable batteries are bad news for the environment and consumers. Most batteries in today’s products cannot be easily removed, replaced, or repaired. 80% of cells in a classical lithium-ion battery found in the trash are functional. The global demand capacity for batteries is projected to increase in the next decade: up to 60% for batteries in consumer electronics and 15% for LEV (Light electric vehicles) by 2030. Gouach is producing in France a battery for LEV that is repairable in less than 10 minutes, as reliable and powerful as the market leaders, but eco-friendly. The solution uses a solder-less design so that the battery electronics and cells can be changed easily, with no risk and without damage to the cells. This allows for an increase in the battery longevity and a substantial reduction of the battery's CO2 footprint. Gouach aims at providing a sustainable, repairable, and eco-friendly battery for fleet sharing, delivery fleet, and electric vehicles manufacturers

This made them even more affordable and enables customers to pay in monthly, weekly, or daily instalments. Solution on-sentence summary: Fast paint repair solution which maximizes aircraft availability.
Identification:
During operation and maintenance, aircraft coatings can be locally damaged by erosion, lightning strike, bird strike, or ground service equipment. In most cases, these impacts are a few centimeters in diameter. The structure is initially not impacted but can degrade over time if the paint is not repaired (for example, because of corrosion).



Local repair of a paint system is a lengthy process, requiring surface preparation, followed by the application of multiple paint layers: anticorrosion, primer and a topcoat. Such a process, including drying times, can take up to 10 hours. This leads to airlines leaving defects untreated, or making temporary repairs.



Corso Magenta proprietary technology answers this challenge by making dry films out of standard paints that are adhesived. It allows making repairs in a quick and clean manner.



The solution is a 10cm diameter adhesive patch of aeronautical grade paint, for carrying out permanent repairs in less than 40min: CorsoPatch Aircraft.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Credibility
Target client profile: BusinessServicesInfrastructureAirports and Airbases, BusinessServicesTransportersAirlines & Airfreight, BusinessManufacturingAircrafts & Airplanes
Tags: Paints, Chemicals, Industrial coating, Maintenance and inspection, Reduce & prevent waste, Aviation
The environmental benefits: With liquid paint, workers are exposed to VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) and Chromates: Corso Magenta's solution is 100% dry (without VOC);Corso Magenta's solution is chromate free, and therefore REACH Compliant;For every paint repair, around 5 paint units are consumed when only 1 unit is used on the aircraft (80% is wasted): Corso Magenta's solution reduces paint waste by 95%;
The Financial benefits: Paint repairs are 25% cheaper than with liquid paint;All consumables linked to paint usage are saved;All disposable protective equipment linked to paint usage are saved;

Typhon's innovative, sustainable, solutions bring unique operational advantages including environmentally friendly, mercury-free UV LED Disinfection to Municipal Water Treatment Plants and Industrial Process Water. Solution on-sentence summary: An on-farm water treatment solution to improve operations throughout the food supply chain
Identification: Food sustains us and fuels our wellbeing, however food systems are impacting our planet. Producing a safe, abundant food supply is one of our greatest challenges and manure, when handled precisely, can regenerate our soils to create healthier and more abundant food. Traditional practices involved managing manure in lagoons. This is one of the most low-tech, difficult, expensive and limiting problems facing the livestock industry today. PLANT, on-farm water treatment solution, produces MORE food using LESS resources, reversing the environmental impacts of protein agriculture. While transforming manure into clean water, PLANT creates two fertilizers containing 13 essential nutrients and valuable organics that regenerate soils, so they become more fertile. 1 in 5 people live in marginal environments where soil is poor, and land has little or no agricultural value. The Solution digitizes manure to increase agricultural productivity, disrupting global food systems with lagoon-free food production. PLANT is machine learning enabled, using the power of data and AI to unlock worth-from-waste; allowing producers to grow more crops and produce more food using less money and fewer resources

Solution on-sentence summary: IGS’ vertical farming solution enables 24/7/365 cultivation of crops in a precisely controlled indoor environment.
Identification:
Think of a 300m2 sized field (for example, 50m X 60m). Then cut the field up into 50 full-size snooker table size sections (6m2 area). These sections, or Growth Trays with Lights (GTLs), are stacked around 250mm apart in two racking systems and placed inside a superstructure to create a Growth Tower (GT).

This superstructure is built to IGS’ specifications and designed to be built on structurally sound locations worldwide. Each GT houses IGS’ patented lighting, ventilation, and irrigation systems. The GT is controlled and monitored, on-site or remotely, using IGS’ cloud software. GTs are available in 6m, 9m and 12m heights. One 9m GT, for example, has a 40m2 footprint and a growing area of around 320m2. With 12 crop cycles per annum for crops like Basil, two 9m GTs can grow enough Basil to fill a football pitch. Two 12m GTs can fill one hectare. Our solution can also grow field ready starter plants like broccoli in 15 days compared to six weeks using traditional methods.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: BusinessFarming & AgricultureCrops, Public Authorities, BusinessServicesRetailerFood & Supermaket, BusinessServicesRestaurants & Canteens
Tags: Automation, Indoor farming, Agricultural Waste, Agricultural equipment & machinery, Agricultural wastewater

Growth Towers are one of the few systems with 60% automation (adaptive automation). Many alternative vertical farming systems have an automation level of 40% or 20%.;By growing crops closer to the point of production or consumption our solution can reduce food transport miles by 96%.;94% less water (compared to greenhouse production). All water that is not used in the crops can be recycled and re-used. ;0 (zero) pesticides, fungicides or herbicides are used in our solution.;
The Financial benefits: Grow high quality crops 24/7 365 with total control of climate variables for consistent and predictable results.;Reduce growth cycles by 30-50% compared to glasshouse and open field farming. For example, Micro leaf 3 to 8 days; Baby leaf 14 to 30 days; Herb 13 to 38 days; Lettuce (head) 49 days.;Significantly reduce food waste in the food supply chain which currently contributes 30% of all GHG emissions. Eg, 95% of strawberry seedlings grown in UK are imported and contain pests and disease.;

Solution on-sentence summary: Emission is an NUE (Nitrogen Utilization Efficiency) sensor system to quantify the volume of lost ammonia nitrogen during application of slurry.
Identification:
More than 1.4 million ton of nitrogen is lost every year form the use of animal slurry.  This has a socialtal cost of +48 billion Euro.  It is one of the world’s largest greenhouse gas emission contributions, air pollutant and sources of lost biodiversity.    

e-missioN sensor system is a solution that delivers information for a database to translate slurry- and climate variations into an accurate nitrogen emission loss assessment during slurry application.

This enables significantly improved management decisions for following mineral nitrogen application dosage rates.  The result is improved yields and savings on use of mineral fertilizers.  

e-missioN creates exceptional sustainability in avoided greenhouse gasses, air pollution and eutrophication.

Solution on-sentence summary: A platform to centralize data and provide actionable insights in the construction industry
Identification:
Hiboo helps companies in the construction sector to use equipment data in order to maximize their productivity, profitability and lower their carbon footprint.

Its SaaS solution collects and processes data from multiple sources offering unprecedented visibility and transparency over a fleet's performance. Hiboo creates instant value by feeding software solutions with clean dynamic data. While struggling in its digital transition, the construction sector is actually experiencing a perfect storm of data for which it is a major contributor. Data is flowing but very difficult to access mostly because construction companies have to collect data from tens of different sources. This data is even harder to process, clean and standardise because it comes in different formats, units and velocity. This is where Hiboo comes in: its mission is to help the sector to democratise access to construction equipment data. Hiboo centralizes data collected from all connected equipment on a single end point and turn it into actionable insights. With clean and dynamic data reflecting equipment activities, productivity, emissions in real time, clients are now able to measure their fleet performance and take action.

Solution on-sentence summary: An industrial fire suppression system using pure nitrogen gas to protect critical assets
Identification: ExxFire is a disruptive industrial fire suppression company, using patented pressureless nitrogen gas storage technology called Cool N2 Gas Generators (CGG). These replace high-pressure gas tanks with a safer, greener, easier to handle, and maintenance-free alternative. The nitrogen gas released from CGGs potentially offsets 7-10 megatons of CO2 equivalent p.a. from current solutions, whose cylinders filled with environmentally impacting chemical or CO2 gas. The CGGs technology, available for business-critical cabinet protection with integrated smoke or heat detection, is sold/installed worldwide. The CGGs technology is being scaled to larger volumes to enter the largest part of the €4.6bn global market, providing a safe, green and more economical alternative. A segment is preventing the start of thermal runaways of lithium-ion battery energy storage systems (BESS) that otherwise end in fire and possibly in explosions and a 2nd segment is the ever-growing data center segment.

Solution on-sentence summary: A software to improve the reliability and longevity of Li-ion batteries
Identification:
The M.A.P® technology aims to optimize the performance and longevity of lithium-ion batteries. Based on more than ten years of research within the CEA laboratory, the technology focuses on preserving batteries throughout their lifetimes, in accordance with their use and environment. MAP® stands for Measure, Act and Predict. 

The Solution measures the actual State-of-Health (SoH) during its use, thereby always guaranteeing its reliability and capacity. It then acts by giving customized and dynamic charging laws based on the battery’s health, environment, and use in order to increase its lifetime by up to 100%. Finally, it predicts the battery remaining useful life according to its use and the aging mechanisms it faces. The data collection and process throughout the battery lifetime enables to eventually guide toward the most suitable second life.

Solution on-sentence summary: Reusable cosmetics to avoid single-use materials in the skin-care and bodycare industry
Identification:
Amalthea aims at providing a safe solution in cosmetics including skincare, bodycare and hygiene. All the ingredients are safe. All the bottles are in glass and refillable.

From the production to the bathroom shelf, everything has been developed in a zero-waste approach to minimize the impact on the environment while offering the best cosmetics experience. The Amalthea routine is simple and answers to the skin needs. The products are by skin type. The packaging, apart from the bottle, is limited to a leaflet around the top of the bottle and some cardboard to protect.

Either online or in our Parisian boutique, the solution offers the same client experience with a customized approach. Refill is easy in both ways. By mail or in boutique, Amalthea receives the empty bottle, cleans, sterilizes and refills it: ready to use it indefinitely!  Amalthea fills and refills all the products in store where the same norms that are applied to any cosmetics laboratories are respected.

Solution on-sentence summary: Providing Power-to-X and Gas-to-Liquid applications to produce sustainable e-fuels and e-products
Identification: Every day we use products that are based on fossil raw materials. We are heavily dependent on fossil oil, causing massive CO2 emissions every day.  As a society, we have decided to move towards a CO2-neutral world with fewer emissions and have recorded these decisions in the Paris Climate Agreement. Renewable energy and e-mobility are solutions that drive this sustainable future. But as time passes, it becomes increasingly clear that this will not be enough. Industries such as chemicals, (heavy) transport, shipping and aviation will continue to rely on hydrocarbons for quite some time for technical reasons. INERATEC provides modular chemical plants for Power-to-X  applications and supplies sustainable e-fuels and e-products that can replace their fossil versions. Hydrogen from renewable electricity and greenhouse gases like CO2 are converted into e-kerosene, CO2-neutral gasoline, clean Diesel or synthetic waxes, methanol or SNG.

Solution on-sentence summary: A lubricant as a substitute to the mineral oils currently used in the metal forming industry
Identification: The metal forming/working industries are totally dependent on the mineral oils, obtained from crude oil by distillation processes, to ensure the success of the forming operations. Indeed, acting as a surface treatment by using non-toxic molecules having excellent tribological properties, it is now possible for the user to re-design production processes to converge towards a simpler (e.g. suppression of the degreasing step, simplification of the water management, etc..), safer and efficient process, with higher productivity and zero risks for the environment.
