Solution on-sentence summary: Waste heat harvesting & transformation into electricity & thermal energy
Identification: The current trend in IT is a dramatic increase of data collection in datacenters. Today the demand for energy-intensive applications in these structures is ever increasing due to, notably, artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things, blockchain, cybersecurity, and meteorological models. Over half of all the electricity required to power data centres is intended for cooling and thermal management systems. DaTEG™ is an adaptive system designed to reduce power consumption at the server level and/or to increase the performance of the CPU/GPU. DaTEG™ is customizable to operate in two different regimes. The first maximizes overall power saving at server levels (power saving mode) while the second allows operations in turbo boost mode for prolonged duration without risking of CPU overheating (overclock mode). GemaTEG also designed an innovative system that provides thermal and electrical energy at the same time. Contrarily to mainstream systems of solar energy harvesting, which are not only inefficient but can also quickly overheat, CentraTEG™ integrates thermoelectric technology applied to solar systems with concentration tube making it highly efficient and safe. The system is based on mature concentration tubes technology with a dedicated integration of TEG modules that are able to generate extra electrical energy through a dedicated control unit.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility

Solution on-sentence summary: A decision support system for the prediction of flash flood risk in urbanised areas
Identification: Weather-related disasters have been estimated to affect about two-thirds of the European population annually by the year 2100 (i.e., 351 million people). The anticipation of heavy rain on urbanised areas is, therefore, a prime concern of any civil protection operator. Assessment is particularly difficult for small urbanised catchments where surface runoff rapidly develops as a consequence of intense precipitation. Traditional monitoring networks and existing Decision Support Systems -DSS do not provide rainfall maps forecastings with the necessary spatial resolution and updating on a very frequent basis to allow fast and accurate prediction of the exact location and magnitude of flash floods.  Arty's solution adopts innovative technologies that allow a fast and detailed evaluation of the flood risk level expected locally in the territory. Artys'disruptive solution is a Decision Support System - DSS that uses the patented Smart Rainfall System - SRS technology for building climate-resilient cities against extreme weather events, providing real-time rainfall monitoring and flood risk nowcasting. Thanks to a network of innovative IoT sensors and advanced risk analysis modelling, SRS allows the decision-makers to protect the people and goods by undertaking wiser and faster choices and optimal, evidence-grounded management of the emergencies.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Funding, Partners
Tags: Flooding, Natural disaster, Sensors & monitoring, Software

Solution on-sentence summary: An eco-friendly artificial wave generator
Identification: Surfing is one of the fastest-growing sports in the world with currently more than 40 million surfers on the globe. To meet this increasing demand, some wave pool technologies have emerged. They opened up a new global market and changed the rules of the game in the world of surfing. However, there is a big problem: these wave pools are not sustainable. OKAHINA WAVE aims to improve the biodiversity of degraded aquatic environments by creating sustainable surf destinations on existing bodies of water anywhere in the world. The solution relies on patented technological breakthroughs, a floating atoll associated to a low-energy wave generation system. OKAHINA is the only man-made wave ridable in a natural environment. Not only its floating structure can be set up and dismantled easily with no impact on the environment but it improves the ecosystems degraded by human activity: no concrete and no water treatment needed, no high energy, oxygenation of the water, diminution of cyanobacteria, filtration of plastics, new habitats for the biotope. OKAHINA is also a profitable economic solution in a new global market. It creates jobs and increases the attraction of the territories where the solution is located.

Solution on-sentence summary: Compact and modular chemical-free coagulation and flocculation treatment for industrial waste water
Identification: Clean water is an essential part of everyday life, but water systems are often highly polluted with organic and inorganic pollutants. This Solution provides a chemical-free alternative to treat highly contaminated industrial waste water. The Electro Contaminant Removal (ECR) uses electricity and metal electrodes to coagulate contaminants present in waste water, allowing them to be easily removed as sludge, resulting in cleaner water being produced and returned to the environment. The treatment process is continuous and is completed within 3 minutes. The switch from chemical treatment to ECR allows factories to discharge cleaner water while generating significantly less sludge. Sludge generated by the ECR treatment process is safe for direct landfilling. Furthermore, the ECR removes multiple contaminants in a single process, eliminating the challenges and high cost incurred from using multiple chemicals. Being a chemical-free solution, the ECR provides a safer work environment for wastewater treatment plant operators.

Solution on-sentence summary: Solar heat as a service: delivering clean energy to industrial heat consumers
Identification: Process heat stands for 2/3 of the energy consumption in the industry and relies at 90% on fossil fuels worldwide, in developed and developing countries. Globally this represents 25% of the global GHG emissions. There is a critical need to decarbonize these activities if countries want to succeed in their energy transition, while maintaining the industrials (the heat consumer) competitive on their market, protecting them against energy price volatility and preserving their investment capacity for their production core assets. Solar Heat as a Service (SHaaS) aims at providing to large industrial consumers a CO2-free, competitive, reliable, and local solar heat for their production processes. Solar Heat as a Services relies on solar collectors and heat storage to supply the industrial sites with heat according to their needs, enabling them to save fossil fuels consumption. Customers pay according to the energy consumed and measured, and are offered very stable price for several years while being protected against the market prices' volatility. This solution that does not require their capital, allow them to focus on investments more aligned with their core strategy.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution for transport providers in large developing cities
Identification: Daba'Go offers an application that calculates the optimal route for a given journey and offers the user a selection of options taking into account the different means of transport available. The routes are calculated and classified according to the user's preference criteria: Cost, Duration, Maximum number of connections, Refusal to use certain types of transportation. In addition, Daba'Go aims to be exhaustive on all the possibilities to move around a city via partnerships to integrate transport not taken into account in our calculation (e.g. small cab, carpooling, car-sharing, scooter). The Daba'Go application is available on any smartphone independently of its version and on the website. By offering multiple transport options in an easy and convenient way, users are empowered to use more sustainable transport options for daily journeys.

Solution on-sentence summary: A non-intrusive, flexible, evolutive, and easy-to-deploy solution to monitor and control energy consumption of buildings
Identification:
Hive Optimal is an AI-based energy optimization software that drives existing cooling and refrigeration systems (without any equipment replacement) to generate up to 40 % savings. It helps commercial and industrial buildings lower energy consumption & reduce carbon footprint.



Today, HVAC-R equipment operates under the control of automation systems or a building management system which have a fixed operation and can only react to the external & internal environment according to programmed logic.

BeeBryte offers an additional layer of intelligence that makes the system predictive and adaptive, unlike traditional reactive regulation. Using weather forecast and activity patterns, it anticipates energy demand and adjusts the operation of the equipment accordingly.



It improves the reliability of the installations (early detection of anomalies) & reinforces temperature uniformity in different zones, guaranteeing compliance with prescribed constraints, such as air quality, and comfort.

Solution on-sentence summary: Separation and recovery of chromium from plating industry wastewaters
Identification: Circular Materials was funded in April 2019 to solve the challenges related to the removal and recovery of heavy metals from industrial wastewaters. Currently, only 5% of the heavy metals from spent baths in the galvanic and plating industry are recycled: the rest is converted to toxic sludges and sent to landfill as special waste, steeply increasing the treatment cost. They have patented a technology where we recover in the form of powders the 99% of heavy metals present in industrial wastewaters, by means of a sustainable and environmentally friendly precipitation process in supercritical water. The process does not produce any toxic sludge, it recovers valuable metals to be reintroduced in the industrial process or sold as secondary raw materials.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: Design and construction of modular buildings, pre-assembled off-site using bio-sourced materials
Identification:
Due to lacklustre productivity gains and archaic processes, the construction industry hasn’t made any real progress in dealing with its environmental footprint (25% of GHG emissions) nor in improving housing affordability. Vestack modules reconcile affordability and sustainability by leveraging digital design technologies and industrial prefabrication processes. They offer a one-stop-shop solution to design and construct buildings with a 3x better environmental footprint, 2x faster, at no extra cost.

The digital design tool enables major productivity gains, optimizes the use of raw materials and divides by three the time and efforts of our conception team.

Modular pre-assembly increases productivity, thereby allowing to integrate qualitative, bio-sourced materials at no extra cost. The modules are designed for assembly and disassembly allowing our buildings to match the highest environmental standards and to ensure a high level of circularity over their lifecycle.

Solution on-sentence summary: Turning plastic waste into a source of energy and employment in developing countries
Identification: Earthwake created a low-tech pyrolizer capable of turning plastic waste into energy: the Chrysalis 40. The device combines two technologies: pyrolysis and distillation. Pyrolisis is combustion without oxygen that melts plastic waste. Once distilled and cooled, plastic is turned into diesel, gasoline, and gas. Gas is then reused to power the machine. The Chrysalis only recycles polyethylene and polypropylene, which represent 70% of non-recycled plastics. Therefore, Earthwake's solution is complementary to mechanical recycling. Chrysalis 40 represents a mobile, self-sufficient, and profitable alternative able to transform 40 kg of plastics per cycle into 40L of diesel fuel. Chrysalis 40 aims to create a local circular economic model, by providing alternatives to landfilling and incineration, especially in communities that need it most.

Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesWaste & Remediation

Sectors: Energy, Waste/Pollution, Power and fuel generation, Solid waste management

Solution on-sentence summary: A 100% cloud-based georeferenced data mining solution
Identification: GeoCassini helps reduce the carbon footprint of city planning and the management of their infrastructure. With BIM, the digital models, 3D point clouds, requests have evolved faster than software solutions to meet them. Although digital twins, interoperability, collaborative work, data exchanges are at the heart of many debates, no software solution has hitherto provided an efficient global response. GeoCassini is a 100% cloud solution in Saas mode to store, share, pool, update and manage all geolocated geographic data useful for the management of space, infrastructure, buildings ... GeoCassini is based on the synchronization of the use of data from open data, LIDAR sensors (point clouds, panoramic photos), drones (point clouds, orthophotos), videos, GIS, CAD software, Bim Objects. The solution democratizes the production and exploitation of geolocated data, saving costs for the users.

Solution on-sentence summary: Equipment for establishing and maintaining efficient seaweed farming
Identification: By scaling the production of seaweed, Seaweed Farmer 1.0 provides food for a growing population (SDG 2), ensures sustainable management and use of natural resources (SDG 12), captures CO2 (SDG 13), and restores the balance of the ocean by using seaweed as a biofilter (SDG 14). However, the process to get a seaweed farm up and running can be a long and tedious journey. This is why Nordic Algae are building an eco-system that can support seaweed farmers through every step of becoming successful and at the same time provide the food industry with a stable supply of biomass. When the food industry pre-orders seaweed, Nordic Algae notifies the farmers in their eco-system who will then harvest seaweed from the ideal farming locations provided for them. The seaweed is then delivered to Nordic Algae before being delivered to the industry. Seaweed Farmer 1.0' automated cultivation and harvesting solution - retrofitted to the farmer's boat - secures fast harvesting, making the work worthwhile for the seaweed farmer

Solution on-sentence summary: Immersion cooling for edge data centers
Identification: LiquidCool systems provide many advantages and ultimate cost savings over conventional air-cooled systems in several important ways. First, since LiquidCool systems do not require fans to move air, the electrical power needed for cooling is dramatically less than for air-cooled systems. Second, because cooling with a liquid is so much more effective than cooling with air, LiquidCool systems can operate in ambient temperature environments up to 45°C without the need for mechanical cooling or water consumption. Waste heat from servers can be recovered at temperatures high enough for effective reuse. Finally, LiquidCool devices are packaged in sealed enclosures, electronics are protected from environmental hazards that can cause conventional systems to fail.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: A heat storage device based on existing vehicle washer tank for electric vehicles
Identification:
The main challenge of Electric Vehicles is the short range due to limited battery capacity. This is further aggravated under low temperature, where the battery loses capacity and supplemental heating draws significant electrical energy, reducing range by up to 40%. On the other hand, excess heat produced during operation or charging is usually rejected to the environment.



The Thermal Storage Tank (TST) uses the thermal mass of the existing washer tank, carried on every vehicle, as a heat storage device. The heat generated during vehicle operation is stored on-board and released during cold re-start of the vehicle, supplementing auxiliary electric heating. It may also serve as a heat sink during thermal peaks, for example in fast charging mode. Washer tank sizes are increasing due to the additional cleaning needs for driver assistance devices.



In summary, while the electrical powertrain recuperates kinetic energy, the TST recuperates thermal energy.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Electric, Vehicles, TES (thermal energy storage), Electric vehicles
Sectors: Mobility, Industry/Goods, Vehicles and vesselsHeating, cooling and ventilation
The environmental benefits: A 10 ltr tank can store up to 1 kWh of thermal energy, equivalent of 5.5 km of electrical range in city mode, which can be used for warming of the passenger cabin or for windscreen de-icing. The benefits increase with lower temperature, in contrary to bat;A water mass allows to absorb heat peaks and preserve battery and other components' life. During ultra fast charge, a full 10 liter tank may adsorb 5 kW of heat during 12 minutes, assisting the active cooling process and allowing faster charging.;Increases efficiency for electrified vehicle operation in cold conditions, in the order of 72 kWh/year (approx. 21.6 kgCO2e/year) per vehicle in cold northern regions.;Provides longer component life, in particular for the battery, due to enhanced thermal management and lower drain at cold. Potential reduction of battery material (1-2kg) and downsizing of heating devices.;

Saving up to 70 Eur if battery is downsized.;

Solution on-sentence summary: Passive heat transfer as an alternative to pumped water cooling systems
Identification: LHPs are a form of passive liquid cooling developed from the principles of traditional heat pipes. They improve performance while providing considerably more design flexibility than traditional heat pipes. Hence they offer a passive alternative to active (pumped) water cooling systems, removing the reliance on pumps and hence reducing energy consumption and reducing maintenance. LHPs work by creating a capillary pumping effect caused by the porous wick structure within the evaporator. The liquid vaporizes on the copper baseplate and moves around the system due to pressure differences. LHP can be used for the following applications: Power Electronics (IGBTs, MOSFETs, SiC & GaN components), processors and servers, electronics & photonics  (LEDs, Lasers, Antennas, Peltier Modules). As a passive solution competing against active (pumped) alternatives, Calyos offers its customers an eco-friendly solution for cooling the latest high power electronic components.

Solution on-sentence summary: A gas-based solution for industrial parts cleaning and decontamination
Identification: The Solution aims at providing an efficient, non-toxic and ecological cleaning equipment to medical device, mechanic and textile industries. This cleaning equipment replaces traditional cleaning solvents such as chlorinated solvents, alcohols or water + detergents by carbon dioxide CO2, which is collected as a by-product of other industries. Once put under pressure (over 73 bar) and heated (over 31°C), this gas becomes supercritical (SC) and is a good solvent for lubricants. This solvent is able to clean like a liquid but it can also penetrate in very in small holes and cavities like a gas would do due to its very low viscosity and surface tension. DFD equipment reuses CO2 several times during cleaning thanks to a continuous internal separation system. It also recycles about 80% of the CO2 at the end of the cycle. Supercritical CO2 has also well-known "pre-sterilizing" properties.

Solution on-sentence summary: 3d printing technology for the fabrication of complex geometries in hollow glass manufacturing
Identification: 3D Printed Polishing burner aims at improving the efficiency of the polishing step of glass articles during their manufacturing process. Once a glass article is formed by pressing molten glass in a mould, some defaults remain on the surface and need to be polished with a flame from specific burners. The objective of glass reheating and edge-melting is to remove the defaults and to give the glass articles (tableware, perfume containers, crystal glasses,...) a smooth and shiny appearance. Where classical burners waste most of their flame in the atmosphere, the innovation made with the 3D Printed Polishing burners enables to improve the flame efficiency. Allowing for a reduction in natural gas and oxygen consumption, the 3D Printed Polishing Burners decrease the level of CO2 emissions related with glass polishing.

Solution on-sentence summary: An ecofriendly solution for the management and treatment of infectious medical waste
Identification: The Ecosteryl Solution is capable of decontaminating and recycling all sorts of infectious medical waste by using only electricity. The process starts with a powerful shredding of waste, including solids, plastics, pathological, sharps and metals, as well as liquids and any other elements considered as medical waste; which is then decontaminated thanks to the action of microwaves and electrical resistors; to finally obtain a dry by-product that can be recycled on account of an air injection separation and a laser optical sorting line. The system does not generate any polluting emissions (no discharge of water, fumes, chemicals, or gases), this way avoiding health risks indirectly created through the release of pathogens and toxic contaminants into the environment when using traditional technologies like the incineration. By eliminating the hazardous nature of waste, this solution will be essential to face epidemics such as the recent worldwide COVID-19, thus preventing potential public health and environmental crises.

Solution on-sentence summary: A uv-c led water disinfection platform designed for point-of-entry applications
Identification: The Solution provides safe and clean disinfection of potable water "on demand" without the use of chemicals or mercury containing components. The basis of UV disinfection is the application of a germicidal wavelength emission (UV-C) targeting microorganism DNA which is disrupted and therefore can not replicate and hence is not able to induce illness or disease. The novelty of this solution is the utilization of compact UV-C LED technology in place of existing solutions that use mercury vapor lamps to emit the necessary germicidal wavelengths. Compact dimensions and straightforward installation means the Solution can easily be integrated into typical plumbing schemes close to the point-of-entry of a facilities water supply. Designed for intermittent flows, PearlAqua Deca only uses power when water is flowing, drastically reducing the energy needed. Beyond instant on/off, PearlAqua Deca features Dynamic Power Control, providing optimum performance across all flow rates– saving you money with a lower electric bill.

Solution on-sentence summary: A new wave energy transmission for subsea power
Identification: Capturing and making use of Naturally Occurring Motion Energy (NOME) for electricity remains a key challenge. WITT Energy addresses this challenge by taking the motion in water, wind and humans and turning it into electrical power which can be stored and called upon when needed. The Solution uses naturally occurring motions, such as those generated by water currents, to generate electricity by capturing energy from all six degrees of freedom. The system is zero emissions, recyclable and scalable, with units able to be built from centimetres to metres from standard industry parts. An example of the Solution in practice is the harvesting of sub-sea water motion & turning it into power to provide a solution for the aquaculture industry. This has huge potential for sectors such as fish farms, and could replace polluting diesel generators with clean energy.

Solution on-sentence summary: Compact energy appliance using combustible waste to produce clean thermal energy & biochar
Identification: MAGS provides a sustainable, profitable, and ecologically safe alternative to traditional waste management and energy generation for any habitat. This solution relies on the patented “Auto Gasification” process to enable the treatment of all combustible waste on-site, generate clean energy and soil-enriching biochar to be used within the habitat, while producing clean air emissions. MAGS destroys waste on-site, reducing its volume by 95%. Bags of waste are introduced into the machine without pre-treatment, sorting or excess handling. Most types of waste can be treated including infectious waste, food, papers, pharmaceuticals, plastics, packaging, and more. MAGS is an excellent solution for many market sectors and offers economic and environmental advantages due to its energy recovery, clean emissions, carbon sequestration in the soil, reduced environmental footprint, as well as the elimination of transport, incineration and landfilling, resulting in significant GHG reduction.

Solution on-sentence summary: A biological process for energy storage and transport in the natural gas grid
Identification: The expanding installation of wind and solar plants leads inevitably to peaks in electricity generation. As a result, surplus electricity is generated in windy and sunny periods, which to an increasing share cannot be fed into the grid. On the other hand, the deconstruction of conventional power plants causes supply gaps in times of low wind and sun. Therefore the development and installation of innovative long term storage technologies is one of the main challenges in the transformation of the energy system. In order to tackle this challenge, MicrobEnergy has developed its own system of power-to-gas technology. With this process, electricity can be converted into hydrogen by electrolysis. This hydrogen can either be used directly or, in a second step, converted together with carbon dioxide from a biogas or sewage plant into methane gas. Chemically identical to natural gas, methane can be fed into the natural gas grid in unlimited quantities. In this way the existing infrastructure of the natural gas network can be used as a huge energy storage and transport system. BiON contributes to a greener world by converting the energy from wind and sun into renewable gas, thus creating a climate-friendly energy source that can be used universally.
Looking For: New clients, Network, Visibility
Target client profile: BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility, BusinessServicesWaste & Remediation

Solution on-sentence summary: Delivering fresh water for future irrigation systems
Identification: Climate Change reduces water offer locally. Population growth increases water demand, mainly by agriculture which represents about 80% of total demand. International organizations such as FAO, UNESCO, World Bank, … point at the need of sharp increases in irrigated surfaces. These important future irrigation water requirements can be met only by large infrastructure projects. Via Marina takes existing fresh water at any river mouth and transports it coast to coast through a submarine pipeline, delivering it to where it is needed by all users: human, industries and agriculture. Therefore, it is more economical and less energy-consuming. By supplying all water demands, Via Marina helps reducing inequalities between regions rich in water and those suffering from water shortages. The solution also contributes to adapting agriculture to Climate Change and to mitigating it with new forestry specially dedicated to capturing CO2. It also reduces avoidable migratory flows. Indeed, water issues are not only food and development related but also security and peace-related. Excellent impact to cost ratio.

Solution on-sentence summary: A safe, environmentally friendly and adaptable seabed-to-surface mooring system
Identification: Anchoring floating objects and maintaining their position and location normally requires a deadload (e.g. concrete blocks) or an anchor. This can have major consequences on flora and fauna occupying the seabed, and can damage fragile and biodiverse environments. Seafloatech Pod® is a reliable, recyclable and more sustainable anchoring Solution for positioning, stabilising, and securing floating installations designed to receive boats without requiring them to drop anchor. The Solution makes a connection between seabed and the surface for any floating object and is able to stand the external forces on the floating object to stabilise it. The anchoring system uses a 'screw anchor' design, preventing damage to the flora or fauna on the seabed. Installation is easy and needs only light equipment, and is fully removable. This innovative Solution is step forward in coastal management in all the aspects of sustainable development: Social, environmental and economical.

Solution on-sentence summary: Energy storage that makes clean power from solar and wind all hours of the day
Identification: Azelio has the capacity to take the role of a renewable baseload, replacing diesel that is used today, with a zero-emission solution that produces electricity at half the cost of diesel power. Azelio also has the capability of addressing the resiliency in more mature renewable energy markets. Renewables are creating an overload in existing grids, such as in California, with its intermittent supply patterns. This creates power breakdowns and natural catastrophes. Azelio can balance the output and match demand through storing energy from day to night or from one day to the other, thereby also increasing the productivity from renewable solutions and the use of clean power in the grid. Azelio is using recycled aluminum as a storage medium. It does not require any refilling for maintained capacity as opposed to thermal storage using salt or water. It can be used over and over without any degraded capacity, and it does not use any scarce minerals. This is solving the problem of energy storage solutions requiring constant refilling of salt or water, or batteries that, in many cases, are using conflict minerals.

Identification: The solution targets food and textile surpluses that can be transformed into solutions. The current focus is to avoid food waste, that amount to an estimated 40% of total food produced, generates GHG emissions, diverse pollutions and costs a lot of money to local governments for being produced and not eaten. Working with all actors in the food chain (producer, transformation company to local charity), this business model supports the entire food value chain, which is also intended at helping transform start-ups to be more efficient at a limited cost.

Solution on-sentence summary: A simple multi-functional device for water treatment and management in aquaculture systems
Identification: Raising fish in intensive closed production systems creates challenges for fish farmers. Water quality in fish farming systems rapidly deteriorates as fishes consume O2 and discharge CO2 as part of their respiration. Uneaten food and feces accumulate creating an unhealthy environment. This is further compounded by the spread of undesirable microorganisms such as algae, bacteria and viruses in the rearing system. To tackles these challenges, Searen developed  Vacuum AirLift™ or VAL™,  a simple multi-functional device that performs essential functions reliably and efficiently.  The VAL™ is an enabling technology that makes recirculating aquaculture systems profitable and environmentally sustainable. Recirculating aquaculture systems produce high-quality protein and nutritious food in a controlled environment. High quality product requires precision control of the water condition. The VAL™ is a smart technology that provides water circulation, carbon dioxide and other undesirable gas stripping, oxygenation and particulate removal in a single simple device. The VAL™ uses a vacuum pump to power a microbubble airlift pump. The airlift pump provides low head water circulation. The microbubbles provide gas exchange allowing undesirable gases to be extracted by the vacuum. The microbubbles also attract fine particulates creating foam that is removed by the vacuum. Oxygen injected in the outgoing flow replenishes the dissolved oxygen level.
Looking For: Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Aquaculture, Aquaculture effluents, Industrial wastewater, Filtration & purification, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: VAL™ reduces energy consumption up to one eighth the level required for competing equipment;VAL™ has been demonstrated to reduce pathogen loads by 99.9% in 12 hours, decreasing notably E. coli concentration from 16750 u/ml to 27 u/ml;In independent testing against other foam fractionators, the VAL™ was 45% more effective in reducing Total Suspended Solids (TSS) using 66% less energy than competing equipment;Due to its high energy efficiency VAL™ has a greater than 85% reduction in CO2 emissions ;As part of a photo bioreactor based waste processor, VAL™ removed 96% of total suspended solids (TSS) and dissolved organics - Total Organic Carbon (TOC) was reduced from 210 to 7.8 mg/l;VAL™ does not produce any hazardous waste by products - it uses a purely physical process requiring no chemical additives providing a 100% reduction in consumables;
The Financial benefits: The energy cost to operate VAL™ is as low as 15% of competing solutions;In a US fish hatchery, VAL™ provided  a rate increase of 2.6 to 5.3 times depending on species;In a US fish hatchery, VAL™ provides a fast ROI and significant payback by reducing acquisition costs by 38% and operating cost by approximately 50% ;

Solution on-sentence summary: Concentrated solar systems for water security in the middle east and north africa
Identification: This Solution aims to provide sustainable, cost-efficient, robust and simple to operate technology which cleans/distils wastewater and otherwise unusable, or contaminated water sources, to provide clean, pure and safe water for where there is need. Concentrated Solar Multi Effect Distillation & Dewatering Systems (CSMED) uses solar thermal energy to process water from a range of sources including, for example, agriculture, industry, mining or municipal wastewater, brackish bore and hyper-saline water (including salt lakes), seawater and even mine tailings dams. The clean and safe water can then be reused for agriculture, mining and industry, thus taking pressure off precious freshwater sources. In addition,  it can also be used to supply or supplement safe drinking water where needed, made available for municipal and local business use or be released back into the natural landscape. Reclaiming, purifying and reusing water reduces risks of leaching and release of contaminated wastewater into soils, watercourses, groundwater and marine environments.

Solution on-sentence summary: A conversion technology using co2 to produce high quality fuel for the aviation industry
Identification: The International Air Transport Association (IATA) has estimated that the aviation sector's carbon footprint will be double of pre-COVID levels by 2037. This trend will significantly increase the aviation sector's GHG footprint, which has most recently accounted for 3% of annual global GHG emissions. In response, the global aviation sector has begun establishing targets to achieve carbon-neutral growth. Considering the changing regulatory environment for reducing GHG emissions, and that there are still very few sustainable fuel initiatives for aviation, airlines will face an urgent need for low-carbon fuels in the coming years. SAF+ captures carbon and combines it with hydrogen to produce ASTM-7566 compliant jet fuel. By doing so, its jet fuel leads to an 80% reduction in life cycle GHG emissions as compared to conventional jet fuels. This helps airlines by complying with mandates set by international and national organizations seeking to meet their GHG reduction targets.

Solution on-sentence summary: Simple, powerful floating solar technology to transform unused water space into a clean energy generation
Identification:
The current solar power plant industry is facing several challenges such as:

•	solar panels occupy a lot of land space and in many European countries there is no space available.

•	solar roof-top installation is not enough for all customers needs. 

•	power plants are traditionally prompt to have a lower efficiency due to solar panels overheating on the ground (every 1°C of temperature rise corresponds to a drop in the efficiency by 0.5%). 

To tackle these challenges, The HelioRec’s solution aims to:

•	keep land space free and deploy the power plants on the water.

•	provide possibility to generate all necessarily volume of energy for all customers needs.

•	increase the efficiency of solar panels due to cooling effect from the water.

HelioRec's solution is an innovative floating solar technology, designed specially for near-shore locations where half of global population live.

Solution on-sentence summary: Laser labelling of fresh fruits and vegetables
Identification: The solution aims at reducing the amount of paper and plastic waste that is rejected in nature by eliminating stickers on fruits & vegetables as well as plastic packaging on these products. This is achieved by means of a laser light that makes a permanent mark directly on the fruit skin. The mark is permanent and neither affects the fruit nor its shelf life. There is no ink, no coloring agent, no paper, no glue, nothing in the process. Just light. Thanks to Natural Branding, it is possible to trace fruits & vegetables from producer to the table of the consumer. Because the mark is permanent, it is possible to identify produce without relying to plastic packaging.

Solution on-sentence summary: Predictive control of real estate-related heating
Identification: Thanks to IOT technology old heatings are made smart and will be able to collect, analyse and exploit operational data in support of the portfolio-wide CO2-reduction goal. Through a gateway installed in the heating room, the intelligent algorithm is able to control the existing heating. Sensors in every apartment monitor this optimization in real-time. With the inclusion of meteorological forecasts, up to 20% of a buildings' emissions and energy consumption are reduced. Automated data analysis allows to better understand energy performances and to monitor and document the CO2-reduction remotely in real-time, and based on measurements. The system docks onto almost any type of existing heating, increasing the system's performance.

Solution on-sentence summary: An automated, battery-free, solar-based water desalination system
Identification: A permanent solution against the global water shortage. The solution does not need any infrastructure and can meet all restrictions in remote areas. It can produce high-quality drinking water from any type of water including seawater, brackish water, or groundwater. The system does not need any energy supply and our solar-based desalination can provide all its required energy. Seawater and sun energy as the most abundant resources in the world. By removing batteries, not only does the system stands alone for up to 15 years with the lowest maintenance, but also the invented control system can run the system in dynamic mode and control the quality of the water and whole operation conditions. This means that the system is fully automated and does not need an operator. To guarantee the quality of water and predict upcoming operation problems, a remote control system is also included.

Solution on-sentence summary: Re-using construction soil for land-use developments
Identification:
Land development and new constructions result in significant disruption to landscapes, and solutions are needed to reduce the impact of these developments. This Solution tackles this challenge by re-using inert (non polluted) construction soil to create self-financed land-use developments. These land-use developments are designed to make an environmental and societal contribution with partnerships in the fields of renewable energy, urban agriculture and conservation of wildlife. This process allows a sound and positive management of inert construction soil, which accounts into close to 60% of total waste in France. Given the fact that land-use developments created through this Solution are located close to city centres, it avoids trucks transporting soil to go to their traditional dumping places located far from the city.  Through this Solution, cities find a way to finance land-use developments and thus increase green areas. 

This is a turnkey solution for local communities, allowing them to focus on their needs in terms of land-use developments without concerns about how to finance or to manage the day-to-day complexity of such projects.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Credibility
Tags: Soil and land, Urban green spaces, Reuse waste, Construction & demolition waste, Mineral waste, Recycle waste, Construction materials
Sectors: Infrastructures, Materials and chemicals, Ecosystems management

The Financial benefits: Transportation costs are on average 50% less expensive compared to other kinds of sites located further;Free land-use developments for cities;

Solution on-sentence summary: A low-energy, healthy and comfortable prefabricated home built from local sources
Identification: Today, the construction sector is responsible for ≈39% of total annual greenhouse gas emissions. While the energy consumption of buildings is expected to decrease steadily, the energy embodied in building materials still accounts for 11%. The conventional buildings rely upon concrete or terracotta for the structure, and petrochemical foam or mineral fibres for insulation which are carbon-intensive. In opposition, Paille-Tech houses offer a comfortable, healthy and durable home, highly energy-efficient and environmentally friendly. Compared to the standards materials, the solution is low in embodied-energy and not exhausting non-renewable resources. All materials are hardly processed (e.g. no cooking) and locally procured (less transport). One m² of Paille-Tech wall requires for its production 68 kWh of non-renewable primary energy, compared to 251 kWh for a concrete and XPS wall with the same insulating value. In-shop prefabrication ensures fewer nuisances for the neighbourhood and a shorter installation time, resulting in economies (scaffoldings, no double house-renting). During its manufacture, no less than 44 kg of CO₂ equivalent is stored, whereas a conventional wall releases 50 kg into the atmosphere.

Tags: Biobased, Wood, Construction, Carbon footprint, Construction materials
Sectors: Buildings, Project planning, Manufacturing and construction processes

Solution on-sentence summary: MaGie creations: turning food waste into food ingredients
Identification: MaGie Creations aims to create a world where food waste is not seen as the end, but as a new beginning. MaGie Creations aims to achieve this by creating sustainable and healthy food products from food waste. The first food waste stream focused on is beer grain (officially known as Brewer's Spent Grains, BSG). Every year, 560 kton of beer grain is produced in the Netherlands alone. The majority of these grains are currently fed to milk cattle. But beer grain is still incredibly tasty and contains valuable nutrients, such as protein, fibre and amino acids. This is why MaGie Creations collects beer grain from breweries and converts it into food ingredients, offering significantly more sustainable and healthy ingredients compared to traditional ones.

Solution on-sentence summary: A self-powered solar led lighting solution for outdoor use with remote control
Identification: Nowadays the electricity network is easily accessible in almost all our cities where a large part of them have large infrastructures; but when we refer to roads with difficult geographical conditions or interurban roads we find smaller electricity network infrastructures or even none at all. This type of roads are the ones that get more traffic accidents, and Solar Intelligent Lighting (S.I.L.) has the potential to increase road safety. S.I.L. is a self-managed solar LED lighting solution; its solar panel feeds a Lithium battery that allows for short charging cycles, increasing its durability and efficiency. This solar LED lighting solution not only has advantages in its installation but also in the consumption and the amount of CO2 generated. The potential impact is the reduction of CO2 pollution and above all the security, providing lighting to areas where it is not available due to lack of resources or geographical conditions. With a single, not very high investment they can obtain at least 10 years of lighting without energy or CO2 costs to generate it. By providing security in these areas, mobility is increased and with it progress.

Solution on-sentence summary: A natural and biodegradable technology for the improvement of water and soil management
Identification: Land and water are sources of life. Polyter Gr is a concrete and effective response to the need for better water and soil management worldwide. It accelerates plant growth with a high reduction of water and fertiliser inputs for all types of crops. Polyter Gr can be used with independently from cultivation and irrigation methods, climate or soil type, and plant varieties. It improves the quality and quantity of productions by ensuring storage and transport performance. It protects the environment by quickly restoring ecological balance while combating desertification and soil degradation. It is an innovative product with universal and high-performance applications whatever the nature of soils or climatic conditions. By modifying all the agronomic parameters known to date, this advanced technology activates growth by delaying hydric stress and nutritional deficiencies, while sublimating the latent genetic potential of the plants. Both fertilising and hydro-retentive, it is natural and fully biodegradable. Highly versatile, Polyter Gr can be used for greenhouse, nursery, open field, agro-industrial and market garden crops to forest restocking, substrates, plants in pots, above-ground crops, revegetation of sloping areas. Polyter Gr is one of the answers to food self-sufficiency and economic sovereignty.

Identification: Waters worldwide are contaminated with a highly diverse mixture of pollutants, among them micropollutants and microplastic. These are an enormous threat to the well-being of our planet and humankind and a big challenge for science, politics, and the water industry. Wasser 3.0 PE-X® is a Green Chemistry based, modularly adaptable process for removing microplastics and/or micropollutants from waters. Solution on-sentence summary: Capturing waste in rivers before it reaches the ocean
Identification: Ocean plastic is a huge threat to marine life and is increasingly high on the political agenda. 80% of waste discharged in oceans originates from land, meaning pollution must be stopped before reaching the mouth of rivers. The H2OPE River Whale® provide an innovative waste collection solution to capture plastic in rivers. This Solution is specifically designed to capture floating and immersed waste carried along in rivers. The River Whale® is a static cleaning device, acting as a  fully autonomous natural dam for plastic, using no other energy than the strength of the current. Easily installed and able to operate 24 hours a day, a network of River Whales® is able to capture 80 to 90% of plastic waste, which can then be sent to waste management and recycling sectors. The Solution helps to protect rivers, oceans and allow waste to be captured at an early stage, thus preserving its recycling potential.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, new clients, visibility, funding, partners, credibility
Tags: Rivers, Waste collection, Low-grade plastic waste, Floating debris, Municipal Solid Waste

Solution on-sentence summary: A vertical farm to provide diversified food in isolated sites without electricity or a water network
Identification: The solution aims at providing sustainable, profitable and fresh organic healthy food, using only renewable energy and rainwater. This solution relies on mobile and modular indoor farming techniques in a recycled maritime container. All fruits and vegetables are grown on independent planters, on multiple floors, with soil and organic compost mixed. The light comes from automatic Led systems, powered with solar panels on integrated on the roof. The drip irrigation system is supplied with rainwater collected from the roof and stored in a tank inside the Food container. The air is renewed thanks to a double-flow ventilation connected to a Canadian well to recover heat from the ground. Electronic sensors analyse different parameters in real-time including the temperature, CO2, humidity level, light, plant growth speed and many more.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility

Solution on-sentence summary: Scalable silicon anodes for high energy lithium ion batteries
Identification: Batteries are in almost everything we use, almost every day of our lives. Whether it is your phone, laptop, or eventually all the vehicles that we drive, batteries will affect most areas in our life. To combat climate change, it is critical that we move to a majority of fully electric vehicles and renewable energy within the next decade. The key to both is the ability to store energy quickly, safely, and to store enough for hundreds of miles of range, or hours without wind or sunlight. The GDI solution aims at providing large scale manufacturing of 15 minute fast-charging energy storage technologies with 30% higher energy to increase utilization of renewable energy, mass transportation, and electric mobility. Also, the GHG footprint of a Lithium-Ion NMC battery using GDI silicon-based anode is estimated to be 92.5 kgCO2e per kWh, 21% lower on average than traditional Li-Ion NMC batteries. GDI’s mission is to develop cleantech that can scale to large volumes at attractive economics.

Solution on-sentence summary: An efficient multimodal logistic and delivery system in urban areas
Identification: LUMI addresses the need for an efficient multimodal logistics and delivery system in urban areas. Urban transport operators, platforms (MyTroopers, Trusk, Stuart,...) and specific services (bicycles, walking) optimize each for themselves, without being able or willing to make any synergies on behalf of the customer. For example, the right solution for a tour (price, carbon impact, delays) can be the combination of a vehicle and a group of delivery people on foot. No carrier is in a position to offer this to the customer on an objective basis. As a transport organizer, LUMI plays the part of an international logistician which select the right combination between sea, air or road freight. This approach is imperative to gain efficiency, absorb the extra cost of green transport solutions and create a smart ecosystem. With its innovative transport ecosystem, LUMI makes it possible for users to choose and benefit from these synergies.

Solution on-sentence summary: Solar-powered water pump for smallholder farmers and communities
Identification:
The sunlight pump is a small-scale, solar-powered water pump. Being a modular and versatile system, it can be used for a wide range of applications: productive use (e.g. irrigation, livestock, fish farming), drinking water supply and hygiene. It is an affordable, reliable and environmentally sustainable technology that brings water to where it is needed and contributes to the economic well-being and health of farmers and communities. 



The sunlight pump is a highly efficient water-lifting technology that does not require electricity or diesel to function. There are no operation costs, meaning that there is a higher return on investment over the lifespan of the sunlight pump. It is the right choice for anyone who wants to turn a free source of energy into time and money savings. The sunlight pump turns sunrays into savings.

Solution on-sentence summary: Ai-powered tool for smart water management and pipelines risk identification
Identification: In many cities around the world, drinking water and wastewater infrastructure was built between the 1940s and 1970s, meaning that a significant percentage of these assets is close to or has already reached the end of its useful life. Water infrastructures are crumbling and in need of replacement and repair, especially today with climate change causing significant temperature and drought variations, putting additional strain on these infrastructures. CANN forecast developed InteliPipes, a tool which enables the identification of vulnerable pipes within a city's water distribution system in order to make proactive decisions concerning the rehabilitation of water main pipes. These tools were developed using artificial intelligence models that rely on available data to provide useful insights to decision makers to help municipalities decide which water main pipes should be replaced in order to limit water loss.

Solution on-sentence summary: Making artificial reefs from natural seawater
Identification: CCell builds artificial reefs from recycled rebar, mimicking the shapes and properties of naturally occurring reefs. The reefs are powered with renewable electricity, producing a chemical reaction within the seawater that causes limestone rock to form around the reef structure. This rock provides a foundation for coral restoration and marine wildlife while strengthening the defensive properties of the reefs. CCell’s advanced modelling capabilities, combined with electronics and cutting-edge wave-energy capture technology, allows this solution to be customised for a given area. Solution on-sentence summary: Fluorine gas mixtures as an environmentally friendly cleaning gas alternative for semiconductors
Identification: Semiconductor chip manufacturers use in their processes a variety of gases to pattern silicon wafers. After a number of wafers processed, the process chambers must be cleaned. To meet the need of the semiconductor industry, Solvay developed and patented globally two different fluorine gas mixtures as environmentally friendly gases for CVD cleaning processes. Solvaclean is a cleaning gas to replace three major cleaning gases C2F6, CF4 and NF3, with environmental friendly fluorinated gas mixtures. This project included validation and optimization of the new cleaning processes on production equipment and release to FAB production (semiconductor fabrication plant where devices such as integrated circuits are manufactured). Solvaclean is cleaning with similar speed and efficiency than the alternatives, with less gas used per utilisation.

Tags: Cleaning, Chemicals alternatives

Solution on-sentence summary: A drone for precice weed detection allowing farmers to spray exactly where the weeds are
Identification:
Farmers are wasting herbicide by spraying areas of the paddock that don't need it. It is not only expensive for farmers, but also pollutes the soils, waterways and in some cases can affect human health. The solution is a fallow weed detection platform that allows farmers to target weeds using their existing machinery. This reduces chemical use by up to 97.5% and turns their existing machinery into a weed targeting platform.  

The solution uses aerial imagery (drone or plane), to identify and locate weeds. From there a tractor ready file is generated and given to the farmers. This file helps control the nozzles, turning them on if there are weeds and off if there are no weeds. This platform has helped a farmer save over $14,000 in chemical costs on a 700ha paddock.
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Tags: Drones, Pest control

Solution on-sentence summary: Waste conversion technology as a carbon-neutral alternative to fossil fuels
Identification: JF Pyrolysis Products-from-Waste System avoids the detrimental effects of waste on people, animals and planet, including greenhouse gas emissions, by providing an alternative to waste disposal practices, such as landfill, open dumps and burning. The System uses a patented slow pyrolysis technology to convert waste into products - bio-oil, biogas and biocoal / biochar - to use directly as soil amendment and fossil fuel replacements; to produce secondary products; or to generate electricity with our hybrid generator. The technology maximises efficiency by using a continuous process and minimises operating costs by being self-fueling. The system is small-scale, modular and portable; it accepts a wide range of feedstocks; and includes sub-systems for drying and feeding, condensing and storing.

Solution on-sentence summary: Geothermal surface heat exchanger to cool buildings
Identification: Heating and cooling buildings is a basic necessity for modern life but is a hugely energy intensive process. The GeoTerre Geothermic Wall is a new type of surface geothermal probe offering cheap and low emission cooling and heating buildings. The Solution is compact, fast and easy to install with a small digger for free cooling and heating. It uses the ground temperature at 2-5 metres below ground where temperatures are mostly constant all over the year. For locations where the average yearly temperature is less than 16°c, the Solution can provide cooling during summer without using HVAC or traditional air-con system. The GeoTerre Geothermic Wall reduces complete cost of ownership, has a 100 year life time, has nearly no running costs and installation costs which are nearly the same as HVACs. This Solution can help eliminate the heat island caused by HVACs, and can deliver a 90% CO2 emission reduction compared to HVAC. It can be used in a wide range of contexts, including houses, small buildings, schools, colleges, small medic centers, small server rooms.

Solution on-sentence summary: Preventing the buildup of hard mineral scale on heat exchange surfaces
Identification: Industries rely on water for many different purposes, but its unique properties mean that it is particularly efficient at transferring heat, so water is vital to both cooling and heating applications. When the state of water is changed, for instance when the water is heated, it is less able to hold on to the minerals dissolved in it and they precipitate out to form a hard mass on the surfaces of pipes and equipment, most commonly calcium carbonate or limescale, but also phosphate or sulphate scales. This blocks and damages equipment, requiring its premature disposal. The layer of scale also forms a thermal barrier, meaning that heat transfer is greatly reduced and leading to major inefficiencies - just 2mm of scale can lead to an efficiency loss of 20%. HydroFLOW units induce an electric field into the water and the pipe network to prevent the buildup of hard mineral scale without adding chemicals to the water, keeping equipment running at maximum efficiency and for longer.

Solution on-sentence summary: A micro Combined Heat Power (CHP) system operating on clean fuels for houses and commercial buildings
Identification: These situations especially occur in historical buildings which form the centre of many beautiful European cities and villages. Apart from giving the necessary heat to the users of a building, it also provides locally generated electricity at unmatched efficiency (94%), also by using clean fuels such as biomethane, green gas and hydrogen. The EnerTwin is a very small domestic power plant where a boiler and an electricity generator are combined in a single durable device. The heart of the EnerTwin is a microturbine that drives a generator. Microturbines can be easily installed, have a very long life and require very little maintenance. EnerTwin is "micro-cogeneration plus": it will keep our inner cities livable for the next generations, at affordable cost.

Solution on-sentence summary: Digital supply chain monitoring and elimination of chronic waste problems
Identification: Centaur builds a software and sensor-based platform to transform today's grain & cereal bulk supply chain into a trusted, end-to-end, post-harvest quality chain. With its monitoring solution, Centaur offers visibility, quality control, traceability and sustainability along all stages of the supply chain. This is achieved by automatically creating a digital simulation (a "digital twin") of the conditions both inside and outside the grain storage.  To achieve this, the Internet-of-Crops platform pulls in all available digital information such as weather and climate data on outside conditions, plus internal conditions identified by sensors (e.g. gas profiles, temperature, moisture levels) and inputs all of this into a state-of-the-art digital model of how grain performs when subject to any and all of these conditions.  The result is a state of the art prediction tool of likely problems, allowing remedial action in advance.

Solution on-sentence summary: A monitoring platform for drinking water treatment and beverage production plants
Identification: The actual situation in terms of microbial contamination detection on drinking water plants is very slow and not reliable. First, the actual method takes 2-3 days to show any abnormal situation, time where population will get sick.  Secondly, the actual procedure identify only a small percentage of bacteria (1-5%) as not all bacteria are able to growth on a dry nutrient support. The whole procedure requires 50 gr of plastic of lab consumable. The BactoSense device detects automatically in less than 30 min all bacteria in water directly coming from the process via a single sampling tube. When placed at the entry of the plant, the device acts as an early warning system in case of abnormal microbial conditions. When placed in other locations, process optimization can be generated with potential reductions of chlorine, impacting positively tap water acceptance and bottled water consumption (EU major initiative). On a 10 years basis, 1000 kg of plastic consumption and more than 3 to of CO2 can be avoided.

Solution on-sentence summary: A low-cost water filter for providing clean and safe water without using electricity or any chemicals
Identification: With the Nanofilter® technology, it is now possible to modify the properties of nanomaterials that are used in Nanofilter® to trap and remove a wide range of “targeted” water contaminants which vary from one geographical area to another. Water pollutants vary geographically because of different human activities and geological formation of soil and rocks. To design a Nanofilter® for removal of contaminants, water is first tested in the laboratory in order to identify the contaminants contained therein. Thus, the properties of nanomaterials are changed according to the findings of the laboratory test. As required by WHO Standards, the Nanofilter® “selectively” removes 99.999% of contaminants from water, including bacteria, viruses, and chemical contaminants (of any category). One filter purifies 10 liters/hour, lasts five years, and has relatively lower operation cost (~GBP 1 per month) compared to other existing technologies of similar quality, making it affordable to a majority of Tanzanians, Kenyans and soon Zambians, who live in underserved areas.

Solution on-sentence summary: An autonomous electric minivans for convenient transport in urban areas
Identification: Due to the poor quality of public transport in suburban areas, over 130 million Europeans depend on a car to go to work. SuburVAN are door-to-rail autonomous electric minivans that pick suburban commuters at their door and take them to a commuter railway station in less than 10 minutes, so that they can continue their trip on public transport. Combined with commuter railways, SuburVAN autonomous electric minivans can provide the fastest commute in metropolitan areas and small and mid-size cities, while reducing CO2 emissions coming from cars by 99%. Using the minivans is completely contactless, and they are automatically disinfected after every trip.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: A nanoporous silica material derived from algae for personal care products and solar cells
Identification: The development of sustainable personal care products is important to avoid further harm on life and seas, but also for human health. The solution aims to show that it is possible to create an industry that is positive for the environment and not only less negative. By using algae as a resource for the production of a unique advanced material, called Algica, a business model like this has been proven financially viable. By using this material to exchange ingredients used in personal care products, personal care products become less environmentally and health-damaging. By using this material in solar panels the efficiency is increased and more renewable energy can be produced. In the production process of this material nutritious water is cleaned and thereby valuable nutrients recycled into the remaining biomass of the algae after the extraction of the Algica material. This biomass contains besides these nutrients omega 3 rich oil. By producing Algica in this way a contribution to a more sustainable food chain is also made as well as a contribution to less eutrophication and thereby healthier seas.
Looking For: New clients, Partners,
Tags: Algae, Silicon & solar panels waste, Biodegradable, Consumer-goods, Industrial Waste, Solar photovoltaic
The environmental benefits: At least 4 % efficiency increase of solar panels;More environmentally friendly and less health damaging than 99,9 % of all personal care ingredients;Contributes to recycling of nutrients and thereby healthier food chains and seas.;
The Financial benefits: Less than 4 years pay-back time when used for efficiency increase of solar panels;Exchanges up to 4 ingredients with 1 in personal care products with less need of material;

Solution on-sentence summary: Scalable, intelligent and flexible process for sustainable agriculture
Identification: Gigrow aims at solving a problem of quality, logistics, production, and environmental impact of agriculture. It reduces to the minimum the consumption of soil, water, the energy needed to provide a reliable source of vegetable locally grown, scalable, everywhere. The solution consists of a rotating system for plants, giving better climate control, more lighting optimization. The liquid is injected through a patented injection system giving high precision water feeding. The process is designed to be intelligent, yet flexible, through AI and other systems, it adapts to the environment to leverage local realities to reduce cost and increase productivity to get a reliable quality product. For example, energy used for a plant is used for dehumidification, but also can heat greenhouse or building at night or in winter, using multiple times the same energy. It can also adapt its growing cycle to minimize energy consumption or take more energy during peak. All with ease. The system has been tested for 2 years with independent studies and government of Canada prooving more than 100 types of plant and vegetable can grow in the system

Solution on-sentence summary: An app that connects businesses with consumers to avoid food waste
Identification: One third of food products on the planet are thrown away without being eaten. In other words, one third of the energy and resources necessary to produce, transport and distribute our food is thrown in the trash. Food waste is thus a major environmental, social and economic challenge. Nevertheless a large part of food waste could be avoided. The Phenix App aims at reducing the waste of food businesses (grocery stores, restaurants, bakeries, convenience stores) by connecting them to consumers eager to save money and act for the planet. The consumers can buy themed baskets of unsold products on the Phenix App (fruits&vegetables, bread& pastries etc) at a reduced price from those businesses. The consumer pays on the app and goes to the business to pick up his meal.

Solution on-sentence summary: A carbon-free power source for liquefied natural gas vaporization and storage
Identification: Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) Import terminals are important power consumers and need vaporizers to regasify LNG. Powerfin is a LNG vaporisation system for import terminals, able to produce carbon-free electricity using the otherwise wasted cold energy contained in the LNG. It is based on an innovative thermodynamic cycle which achieves state-of-the-art cold recovery, and high reliability. The carbon-free electricity produced can be exported and/or used locally by the terminal itself. LNG regasification terminals become not only energy importers, but also local and green energy producers.

Tags: LNG - liquified natural gas, Waste cold recovery

Solution on-sentence summary: A green energy solar water heating and storage system
Identification: In most residential buildings, hot water consumption and hot water production are not in sync. When hot water is used, a volume much greater than what is actually needed is heated up, leading to unnecessary energy use. Thermoflex™ 16 solves this problem using large hot water reservoir as energy storage. The Thermoflex™ 16 is an off-grid hot water storage system, based on renewable energy (sun and wind). This is an ideal Solution for remote locations that need hot water on regular basis like residential complexes, safari lodges, medical clinics, and others. A 16 CBM double layer water bladder is installed inside the container. Once the water in the bladder reaches the desired temperature (~55 degrees C), the small daily changes in the water temperature, is compensated by  solar and wind-turbine sources integrated with the Solution.

Tags: Containerized, Solar photovoltaic

Solution on-sentence summary: A systemic approach to address environmental footprint and recyclability trade-offs in plastics
Identification: The Keiryo PET solution is a manufacturing process that reduces the environmental footprint and manufacturing cost of plastic (PET) bottles. The Keiryo PET solution modifies the performance of the material during the injection process. This allows to produce PET containers using less virgin material and/or increase the uptake of recycled feedstock. Enhanced performance has been measured (up to 15% barrier improvement for carbonated soft drink containers). This result is achieved by integrating a patented 3D printed metal insert into existing industrial production assets. 3D printing enables low-cost manufacturing and global scalability. The KP technology generates a significant environmental impact that scales with its adoption and flows from the reduced use of materials. It will accelerate the transition to a Circular Economy as it reduces the amount of virgin plastic produced and increases the reusability of plastic waste. The technology is also applicable to bio-based feedstock.

Tags: 3d-printing, Packaging, Manufacturing, PET waste, Reduce & prevent waste

Solution on-sentence summary: An app for more public participation in climate protection measures
Identification:
Changers CO2 fit App works in the field of CO2 tokenized economies for cities and companies. The Changers CO2 Fit App motivates to walk more often, cycle, use public transport and take part in eco-friendly and healthy activities, where citizens and employees learn more about waste reduction, healthy nutrition, energy-saving, green mobility and much more. 

 

The Changers CO2 fit App records all activities, calculates the CO2 balance and rewards the CO2 savings with climate points. The points can be used in donations or tree planting projects or can be redeemed against offers from the city administration, local shop owners and cultural institutions. 

 

Changers is available as Software as a Service (SaaS), White Label and as an SDK for 3rd party App integration. Assets can be managed via a Blockchain infrastructure.

Solution on-sentence summary: Using UV light to reduce pesticide use
Identification:
Pesticides use is one of the major challenges for agriculture, as the massive use of pesticides is a threat for human health and the environment. UV Boosting solution is changing the way farmers protect their crops against disease with a clean, high performance and affordable technology. The goal of the Helios solution is to make agriculture cleaner at scale with a financially attractive solution. UV Boosting solution is based on the stimulation of natural defenses of plants with Ultra Violet (UV) flashes. UV rays help plants to become more resistant to potential threats, especially powdery and downy mildew. The Helios Solution is designed to be easily adapted to farmers and winemakers equipment. It consists of UV lamps panels designed to be waste-free, chemical-free, with no residue and no impact on biodiversity. Our design-to-cost approach enables an affordable price with a quick return on investment for farmers wishing to reduce their consumption of pesticides.



As of 2022 the Solution is also commercialized in the following countries: Italy, Spain, United States.

Please notice: this information has been added post-publication (December 2020) and has not been validated through the labeling process nor can be verified at date.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution for collecting, transporting and treating all domestic wastewater in low water supply areas
Identification: Clearford, has spent 25 years developing and installing its unique, proprietary sewage collection, treatment and recycling system to tackle this very issue. The Clearford One solution works on the principle of decentralized sewage collection and has three major components: underground ClearDigest Smart Digester tanks, a ClearConvey network of sealed HDPE piping and an end of the line ClearRecover Wastewater Treatment Plant (STP) dedicated to recycling as much of the water as possible improving water security. This step-by-step decentralized process offers many advantages over traditional sewerage collection and treatment systems and allows effective sewerage coverage helping achieve SDG 6.

Solution on-sentence summary: Developing facilities to produce renewable fuels for use by air, ground and marine vessels
Identification: The climate challenge for aviation is worse than expected. Without any change, airplane emissions of CO2, having reached over 900 million metric tons in 2018, will triple by 2050. While other transportation modes can electrify, commercial aviation does not have the ability due to weight and flight ranges. The best option is to adopt drop-in sustainable aviation fuels (SAFs). Technologies for the production of SAF have matured and allow to now implement location-appropriate solutions on a broad scale to supply airlines. With a background in wind, solar, and clean transmission project development, the Refuel team is advancing a project to bring low-cost, sustainable, and community-building renewable fuels to aviation at commercial scale by 2024. This solution brings together the most efficient technology using societal waste streams as renewable feedstock. To date, Refuel the Future has already three projects on their roadmap and welcomes interested partners and investors.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Tags: Recycled, Biodiesel, Aviation, Fuel distribution & refuelling, Oil waste, Industrial Waste, Biofuel, Vehicles

Solution on-sentence summary: An electric modular vehicle providing a multi-role, scalable and tailored mobility Solution
Identification: NEXT is a modular electric vehicle offering a number of mobility options, including use as a shared car, taxi, bus, last mile delivery van, a truck for long distances, or an interchange hub for passengers and goods without outdoor transshipment. NEXT is based on 'swarms' of modular electric vehicles, with each module being able to join and detach with other modules on standard city roads. When joined they create an open, bus-like area among modules, allowing passengers to stand and walk from one module to another. Modularity allows 'en-route-transfer' which optimizes system capacity, cuts cost and traffic, increase ubiquity and comfort for the passengers. This Solution not only offers an efficient transport option, but also delivers emission-free mobility for cities.
Looking For: New clients, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessServicesTransportersTrucks & Other Road Vehicles
Tags: Electric, Vehicles, Carpooling & carsharing, Public transport, Electric vehicles
The environmental benefits: 60% less distance traveled by the entire fleet to move the same amount of passengers compared to a taxi service;60% to 80% less traffic generated due to the compact form factor and occupancy rate optimisation;60% reduction of CO2 emission per passenger;80% recyclable;
The Financial benefits: Less than 2 years payback time (for a taxi-like scenario);50% - 100% less driver cost due to higher average occupancy rate and driverless option (once permitted);50% less infrastructural cost for charging and parking compared to electric buses;

Refill Point is an interactive dispenser that refills reusable containers with sector-leading, branded liquid products sold in retail stores.

Solution on-sentence summary: Solar panels solution for ski lifts, bringing electricity production to the ski resort
Identification: The eV + module solution is a new flexible photovoltaic solar panel that can take a curved shape, like the windows of ski lift stations. The eV + module solution enables electricity to be produced from the sun and directly consumed by the ski resort. This green energy production will allow ski resorts to reduce their electricity bills over the year.
