Solution on-sentence summary: A p2r process to collect and treat oily residues from ships
Identification: Various oily residues are produced (pipeline cleaning, contaminates, tank bottoms), but most of them come from ships, which ensure 90% of the world merchandise transportation. There is a strict regulatory framework (IMO, MarPol) but its implementation is difficult and costly. To comply with these rules, oily waste producers most often have to pay to have their waste collected and/or treated. It unfortunately still leads to illegal dumping and discharge at sea or in rivers. Buying back these oily wastes is an incentive for producers to get them collected and treated, and helps the collectors to be sustainable. After the water and sediment have been removed, the Petroleum Residue Recycling Unit (P2R unit) then upcycle these residues into several types of new commercial products, compliant with international standards. The distillation scheme, specifically designed in order to treat slops which are variables by nature, involves atmospheric and vacuum distillation in successive steps.
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: BusinessServicesInfrastructurePorts and Marine Infrastructure, BusinessServicesWaste & Remediation, BusinessServicesTransportersWaterways & Cargos
Tags: Waste-to-energy & fuels, Oil waste, Cargo ships, Fuel oil, Biodiesel, Recycle waste, Industrial Waste, Biofuel, Vehicles
Sectors: Energy, Waste/Pollution, Power and fuel generation, Manufacturing and construction processes, Solid waste management
The environmental benefits: The P2R can offer worldwide port infrastructures, waste collectors (maritime and terrestrial) and ship-owners a cost-effective, environmentally friendly solution that complies with international and EU regulations regarding the treatment of oily residue;The P2R process can divide greenhouse gas emissions by three compared to the traditional process based on crude oil extraction, and helps preserve the raw hydrocarbon material stock. ;Thanks to a financial incentive for waste generators and/or collectors, the process also allows to preserve oceans and rivers;
The Financial benefits: Ecoslops' solution financially benefits vessels and oily waste collectors. Its installation sustains the local collection system, creates new qualified jobs, and enhances local economy.;

Solution on-sentence summary: A cost-effective plastic manufacturing technology for recycled and lightweight packaging
Identification: Packaging is used everywhere from to-go food service to FMCG and industry. But, it is having a significant damaging impact on our environment — producing unnecessary greenhouse gases (GHGs) that are causing global warming as well as polluting water and land with waste. Indeed packaging alone contributes 5% of carbon emissions for food production. EcoCore technology will help to solve these pressing environmental problems by making it simple and cost-effective for packaging manufacturers and brands to use more sustainable packaging that is reusable, recyclable and lightweight. The new technology is easy to use and works with existing injection moulding machines as well as tried and trusted polypropylene plastic. EcoCore® can already be found in applications that are in use, or under trial, by well-known organisations across many different sectors — from Waitrose to The NHS and Hay Festival. The technology is patent protected and available for use under licence.

Solution on-sentence summary: A solar module optimized for low-speed electric vehicles, extending their range and battery life
Identification: These small vehicles pose a lot of problems for the environment and to the companies that possess them. Most of them are charged with electricity that has been harvested using non-renewable sources, such as coal and natural gases in the U.S. On top of that, their batteries require regular maintenance due to their short lifetime. This costs a lot of money to the companies and costs a lot to the environment in terms of CO2 emissions. To remedy these problems CAPSolar uses the energy from the sun, which is 100% free and clean, to power the batteries of these vehicles. By doing so we are able to increase the range of these vehicles by about 25% and the life of its batteries by 1 to 3 years. These advantages allow the companies to use their vehicles for longer and spend less money on maintenance, but most importantly, greatly reduce their CO2 footprint.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessServicesEntertainment, Leisure & Art Company, BusinessServicesHotels & Resorts, BusinessServicesInfrastructureAirports and Airbases
Tags: Vehicles, Electric, Solar photovoltaic, Electric vehicles
Sectors: Mobility, Vehicles and vesselsPower and fuel generation

Solution on-sentence summary: Optimal energy storage for solar collectors and data centers
Identification:
Energy is wasted all over the world in nearly every thermal energy systems. 20 billion EUR or 250 million metric tons of CO2 equivalent green-house gases could be saved only in Europe with optimal thermal energy storages. Traditional systems store heat by changing the temperature of the water. Instead of water, the Solution HeatTank uses special biomaterials called phase change materials. By changing the phase, like melting and solidification HeatTank can store the energy in a more concentrated way, reducing storage volume by 90%, enabling energy savings of at least 20-50%, with a total return on investment of 3 to 5 years. HeatTank uses eco-friendly bio materials as Phase change materials, as recycled materials from by-products.

Due to the concentrated heat storage, the storage volume is smaller, allowing clients to save more space. In addition, HeatTank can store energy on different temperatures and also increase the efficiency of the energy systems by 20-50% with a 3-5 years ROI. With HeatTank it is possible to generate energy only when it is the most efficient, store it and use it when it is less efficient to produce it.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: BusinessServicesBuildings Operators, BusinessServicesICT Company & Data Centers
Tags: Waste-heat valorisation, TES (thermal energy storage), Recycle waste, Data centers, Building heating
Sectors: Buildings, Heating, cooling and ventilation, Energy storage, Energy and fuel efficiency

The Financial benefits: Reduce the operational costs with 20-50%;Total return on investment is 3-5 years;

Solution on-sentence summary: A simple yet ecological shower drain with heat recovery
Identification: The impressively simple Joulia-Twinline technology proves that there is another way. By means of an ingenious heat exchanger module, the heat energy of the used shower water is reused to warm the incoming cold water mains. Thanks to this technology, the cold water arrives at the mixing valve up to 20°C warmer than before (from 10°C up to 30°C). Therefore, substantially less hot water is needed. By this simple means, a 4-person household can save about 1900 kWh per year. Joulia-Twinline is particularly performant in places where many people shower, such as sport centres, gyms, hotels or clinics. A single Joulia- Twinline can generate about as much heat energy as a 15m2 photovoltaic array would produce in one year (1'900 kWh/a). Showering with a clear conscience is thus both ecological and delightful. The sophisticated technology is concealed under a simple stainless steel cover. Because the heat exchanger cover also serves as a trap, the total installation height is comparable to conventional shower drains and can also be used in renovations. The technology is practically instant and cleaning is simple thanks to the easily-removable cover.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Shower, Building heating
Sectors: Buildings, Water, Heating, cooling and ventilation, Energy and fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: The drain doesn't emit any CO2 in the atmosphere, doesn't use any electric energy, just works by water flow;Save as much energy as 15 m2 of solar panels would have produced, whilst showering;Joulia-Twinline wins up to 60% of the normally lost energy back;Joulia-Twinline can be recycled by almost 100%;No impact on health;
The Financial benefits: Joulia-Twinline saves up to 60% of thermal energy with each warm shower;A 4-person household can recover arround 1'900 kWh per year;

Solution on-sentence summary: A scale inhibitor made from plants, replacing petroleum-based substances in industrial water treatment
Identification: The teams at ODYSSEE have developed ODYLIFE, first bio-based anti-scaling actives, preserving environmental resources. There are many possible applications, such as cooling towers, steam boilers, closed loops, reverse osmosis and saltwater desalinization, but also the geothermal, detergents, domestic supply water. With ODYLIFE, ODYSSEE is able to produce a natural ingredient endowed with strong properties and extracted using green techniques. ODYLIFE can be implemented at a competitive price, without the need for any investment or technical conversion, as the transition has intentionally been designed to be that simple. More than that, switching to ODYLIFE means taking concrete action to promote a corporate social responsibility policy that is in line with a number of United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. Besides the ecological benefits, this solution ensures complementarity between local industries and regional ecology, with plants and farmers replacing chemical factories.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Biobased, Cooling, Desalination (= seawater purification), Chemicals alternatives, Maintenance and inspection
The environmental benefits: 300% more biodegradable: ODYLIFE analyses yield outstanding results compared to polyacrylates, one of the primary alternatives in use today.;0% harmful substances: aquatic organisms can tolerate higher doses (at least 10 times more), with no adverse effects. As a result, ODYLIFE is not considered to be a dangerous substance under Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008.;€0 investment required to implement ODYLIFE. ODYLIFE has been designed to be a “plug and play” solution, to replace current solutions.;98% fewer CO2 emissions: as shown in the LCA, the emission of CO2 equivalent associated with climate change is very low. ODYLIFE represents a 98% reduction, compared to traditional phosphate-based treatments.;50% fewer non-renewable resources are needed to produce ODYLIFE than phosphate. Solution on-sentence summary: Small water turbines to produce energy in drinking water or irrigation networks
Identification: The turbines can reach up to 25kw and they can be installed at any point of the water network as long as there are a circulating flow and pressure available. The generated energy can be used for self-consumption in any nearby installation (pumping station, treatment plant, etc) or directly sold to a local or national grid. The crew behind this solution will help users to evaluate the energy potential, calculate the economic payback and give support during the installation process including, if necessary, a commissioning service on the field for first start-up of the system. This solution offers grid-tied and off-grid solutions based on battery charging turbines. Thanks to this technology, it is now possible to generate energy with a turbine instead of wasting it in heat and noise in a valve.

Tags: Off-grid, Turbines, Water-networks

Solution on-sentence summary: Online marketplace where renewable energy consumers and producers directly connect and exchange
Identification: This solution provides a flexible, online marketplace, where consumers and producers of renewable energy can interact directly with each other. Using a real-time proof-of-origin procedure, electricity is tracked from source to destination. The marketplace supports all aspects of electricity retailing. It covers the full user-journey from sign-up to contract signature, from automated meter reading to billing. Smart-grid components can be integrated into the solution to support different use-cases. For instance, using the customers own PV electricity to charge an electric vehicle or demand-side response to reduce grid congestion. Possible applications include for instance household energy retailers looking to deploy a marketplace as a white-label solution to engage with their consumers, diversify their portfolio, manage prosumers and improve their transparency or corporate retailers looking to supply a 24/7 verifiable green energy solution to satisfy the sustainability goals of their business clients.

Solution on-sentence summary: A self-learning box to monitor solar installations and optimize domestic hot water tank management
Identification:
One of the key issues to for the development of domestic solar energy is intermittency of the production, combined with a variable intra-day price of electricity. Management of the domestic hot water tank is a typical example. 



Box Meteoptim monitors solar home installations and optimizes self-consumption of locally produced energy. This smart box, connected to your solar installation allows you to 1) check out, day after day, that the solar production is in accordance with the day's weather, and alerts you on your smartphone in the event of a problem; and 2) to control the electric supply of your hot water tank, ensuring that it is maximally heated by the sun, and that your particular needs are fulfilled. Indeed, hot water tank is not only a major home consumption item, it is also the first storage device of each house's energy. Its algorithms use weather forecasts and rely on Artificial Intelligence, making the Solution compatible with solar thermal, photovoltaic or hybrid panels, whatever the manufacturers, and automatically adjust to the family's hot water consumption's habits. Increasing by 30% your self-consumption of solar energy, this easy-to-install box ensures the profitability of your solar investment.

Solution on-sentence summary: Contact technology for energy reduction in industrial environments
Identification: The DECONTACTOR, is a connector which combines the advantages of a power socket with the performance of a switch. The socket-outlet has an integrated switching function and spring-loaded, silver nickel-tipped butt style contacts. The technology, as well as the superior quality of materials, result in a CO2 footprint reduction of 5,7 times more energy-efficient than a standard pin and sleeve product. The use of a machine or other equipment produces heat, and therefore energy - the goal is to limit it. With regard to industrial electrical socket outlets, several factors must be considered including heating due to the passage of the current, thermal cycle linked to multiple "start & stop" or manoeuvres - rorrosion resistance.  The DECONTACTOR™, has been developed to meet these criteria, with limited contact heating and better compensation of the thermal cycle.

Solution on-sentence summary: Solar blinds to reduce your carbon footprint and cut energy bills
Identification: Although most of the solar panels need to be installed on the roof, the majority of us live in a city building with little to no access to the roof. On top of that, most of the "green energy" from utility companies is never 100% green. The energy you get at home will always remain a "grey" mix of both mainstream & renewable energy. To tackle this challenge, Plug & Play Rollable Solar Panel offers the possibility to use the window's surfaces to harvest solar energy. The Solution is a smart solar blinds system that allows anyone to cut their energy bills by up to 50% while getting closer to carbon neutrality. The Solution is connected to an App, enabling users to set a schedule to deploy or retract the blinds. Each stripe has also a sun tracking feature inspired by the Sunflower movements to increase the energy efficiency output by at least 20%.

Solution on-sentence summary: Enabling smart worksites and underground infrastructure management
Identification: Every minute in the United States and every 6 minutes in France, a buried pipe is damaged by an excavator for an overall cost of more than €25,000 / damage. These events are due to inaccuracies in plans combined with the fact that underground networks are difficult to visualise. To solve this issue, Syslor applications and antenna, capture, map in 3D and visualize in augmented reality buried pipes, at any time with centimetric accuracy. This digitization process of the underground is helping utility operators, public works companies and industrial to achieve works more safely, accurately and efficiently, at a lower cost while saving carbon emission and avoiding casualties. Syslor services include the automatic conversion of plans and their permanent availability in augmented reality, creation of as-built 3D plan from a video taken with a smartphone, guidance to the point/lines to implement, and the automatic update of real locations of manholes, power boxes, etc... Syslor aims to revolutionize buried pipes management to make it safer, better, cheaper and greener!

Solution on-sentence summary: Hardware as a service for sustainable electronics
Identification: The electronics industry generates a huge amount of negative externalities, from the mines to the products' end-of-life. Many studies showed that most of these impacts occur during the product birth and death. Thus the first priority is to reduce the number of electronic devices made and sold. However, this is not viable for companies that rely solely on the sale of these devices. There is therefore a need for another business model: Hardware as as Service (HaaS). Commown is a French Société Coopérative d’Intérêt Collectif (SCIC) that supports fair and sustainable electronics by providing HaaS services with devices designed to be repaired and to last longer. The service includes providing smartphones, computers, headphones and managing repairs  beyond the manufacturer warranty, with a monthly subscription. Commown uses easy-to-repair devices and offers customer support to fix devices when issues occur. In doing so, this service extends product lifetime, reduces material waste, and offers a cost-effective option for smartphones and other electronics.

Solution on-sentence summary: An efficient and affordable vegan protein
Identification: Global consumption needs are driving overexploitation, with the global consumption of natural resources increasing over 190% in the last 150 years. Yet, in 2017, 1 in 9 people in the world were undernourished. By 2050 the world will need to produce 70% more calories to bridge to bridge the food gap to feed 9.7 billion people. Noblegen Protein is a vertical fermentation Solution using Euglena gracilis, a microorganism, to upgrade its own biology to create an efficient closed-loop solution. Noblegen is working towards their goal of creating a microbially driven process that leads to the mass production of complete, non-animal and affordable protein from locally sourced starch inputs such as corn and cassava. The potential to produce protein from starch could transform regions of the world that are typically undernourished while simultaneously addressing major global challenges such as deforestation caused by industrial agriculture and the overuse of water, land, and energy.

Solution on-sentence summary: A natural solution to reduce chemical fertilizer use in the world
Identification: In a 1999 PNAS article, Charles Frink noted that -The increase in fertiliser use associated with increased food consumption has been described as exponential and has raised concerns about water pollution and the resulting methaemoglobinemia and hypoxia. It has also raised concerns about the warming of the greenhouse effect and the alteration of the global nitrogen cycle, and thus of primary production and vegetation diversity. The use of chemical fertilisers is always a necessity, however, for the chemical form that these fertilisers have, they are also biocidal agents, killing certain elements in the soil, such as micro-organisms, which could transform them into elements immediately absorbable by crops. The destruction of these beneficial micro-organisms also creates the conditions for pathogens to develop in the soil, thus increasing the need for polluting plant protection products. All this has a direct impact on productivity and quality, as the entire crop food chain can be affected. Bioma has developed new, completely natural solutions, to be used once a year at the beginning of the agricultural season, which allow the soil microbiology to develop rapidly, within a few weeks, and immediately transform and provide nutritional elements to the crops. The solutions have been shown in several studies to reduce chemical fertilizers by at least 50% while increasing the quality and quantity of production. The theory behind the solution is that when there is a balanced microbiology in the soil that transforms the elements, then 50% of the fertilizer doses are sufficient.

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy management system to optimize energy efficiency of industries
Identification: It is common for energy systems to suffer inefficiencies regarding energy optimization. In a more particular case, photovoltaic production could be lost or sent to grid when electric consumption is lower than production. SmartEMS is a connected smart box that helps adapting the energy production of several inverters of a photovoltaic installation, taking into account the power consumed by the user. It is thus possible to limit the power injection of the installations when not authorized or when the cost of connection to the network is too high. SmartEMS regulates the active power injected into the grid by controlling the maximum power point (MPPT) of the photovoltaic inverters. Photovoltaic plant operators and managers can have the SmartEMS operating adapter to meet the requirements of each self-consumption installation. This includes the collection of additional consumption points than the control and regulation of third-party consumer equipment, such as heat pumps, charging stations or power regulation components.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Tags: Electrical grid, Sensors & monitoring, Smart-buildings

The Financial benefits: At least 50% of your annual energy invoice saved;ROI could be less than 3 years;

Solution on-sentence summary: A score-based platform for quantifying, and managing sustainable commuting behaviors

Cities, employers, and real estate developers are particularly impacted by these suboptimal choices, as they experience the effects of over-stressed infrastructure, under-utilized programs, an unhappy workforce, and an unnecessary level of emissions. Communities Commuter Score and Commute Management Platform is an all-in-one platform for companies, commercial real estate, municipalities, and TMAs to gather data and implement efficient parking and commuting programs. The Solution helps you detangle the messy web of disconnected commute management strategies to create programs that see real adoption and help achieve savings in time, cost, and emissions. Solution on-sentence summary: A control system for photovoltaic power plants enabling ancillary services for the electrical grid
Identification: To accelerate the transition towards a 100% renewable and functional electrical grid, we need to replace by renewables not only the energy but also the ancillary services needed to maintain a reliable and safe operation of the electrical grid. The Solution consists of a control system for PV plant that enables the plant to provide ancillary services. It works by allowing the PV plant to be controlled remotely by the grid operator and to react and adapt power production, electrical grid frequency and voltage avoiding blackouts, failures and damages to the equipment of the consumers. By doing this a PV plant can stabilize the electrical grid guarantee a safe and reliable operation. At the same time, the PV plant can effectively reduce its use of other technologies, such as polluting thermal power plants that currently operates for the sole purpose of providing reliable services to the grid.

Solution on-sentence summary: A platform to produce green heat for industries and cities
Identification: Companies strive to reduce their carbon footprints by introducing renewable energy resource. In order for them to continue to pursue that goal, new renewable alternatives to fossil fuels for industrial processing are needed. With Azteq's CST platform technology, companies can substantially reduce their carbon footprints generated by the mainstream alternative (burning gas). By harvesting the sun's thermal power based on concentrated solar thermal technology, Azteq's expertise helps companies to reach their corporate sustainability goals and ambitions. The CST platform provides high-temperature thermal energy with zero CO2 emission. The parabolic mirrors concentrate solar irradiation on a collector-tube in the focal line, generating temperatures up to 400°C in the collector. The thermal oil running through the collector tube is piped into a heat exchange unit. Depending on the customer application the exchange unit generates steam or heated thermal oil going into the industrial process of the customer. Azteq's business proposition based on a heat-as-a-service model provides a low and stable energy price which is beneficial for stakeholders.

Solution on-sentence summary: High power, low-cost, energy-efficient plasma torches for industrial applications
Identification: Over 30% of global GHG emissions come from the energy-intensive industry sector, necessitating mitigation options beyond energy efficiency to achieve major reductions. PyroGenesis’ APT-HP presents an environmentally friendly alternative to fossil fuel burners by producing thermal energy from low-carbon electricity for use in industrial applications. The high power of the APT-HP (up to 1 MW) enables a plasma plume exceeding 5,000 C and transformation of materials to valuable products from various industrial and waste materials. The APT-HP offers a lightweight, vortex-stabilized, compact configuration which can be retrofitted into existing installations such as iron ore furnaces and cement kilns, featuring long electrode life, low maintenance, automated operation, and a high level of safety and reliability. When replacing conventional fossil fuel burners, plasma torches potentially reduce operating costs by up to 30% and GHG emissions by about 250 MT CO2e per GW·h when using hydro power.

Solution on-sentence summary: Recycled roof tiles from discarded tires with high durability, stability and insulation
Identification:
Each year 16 thousand tons of solid pneumatic waste are dumped in the final disposal site of waste in the city of Mar del Plata, which is incinerated, buried or thrown into the sea, generating 4 tons of CO2 for each tons of poorly managed tires on average. Pneumatic material is an excellent insulator, withstands all inclement weather and, since it cannot be degraded, its final common disposal solutions are to bury it, to incinerate it or to throw it into different ecosystems. The Solution EcoTiles offers the possibility of reusing these resources, transforming them into rubber tiles.

In this way, it is possible to achieve a sustainable action with positive multi-impacts for the communities carrying it out: no public space is used with containers full of wheels, which later becomes a highly toxic waste if they are incinerated, buried, or thrown it away to the sea or in abandoned properties, with the risk of contamination and insect pests that this entails. In addition, they are given a new use and are turned into tiles, at a lower cost than a traditional roof.

Solution on-sentence summary: Giving new life to copier paper through laser technology
Identification: Paper is a vital everyday product, but requires significant natural and chemical resource to manufacture and produce. Approximately 95% of copier paper is used only once, then downcycled for the production of tissue paper, cardboard and other materials. As a result, virtually all copier paper is produced from virgin tree fibre. REEP aims to extend the lifespan of paper through its innovation Solution: a reusability model for paper. REEP’s Solution is based on laser deinking to completely remove the ink from the page, combined with advanced materials that enable paper re-use. Implemented initially for copier paper, the system allows users to print on the same sheet of paper, again and again, up to 10 times. REEP’s reusability system is the world’s first technology to enable the circular economy model for paper. In comparison to the mainstream option, REEP's reuse model massively reduces the environmental footprint of office paper usage, decreasing carbon emissions, resource consumption and waste generation by over 90%.

Solution on-sentence summary: Drilling for natural hydrogen
Identification: Natural hydrogen is a newly discovered geological source of sustainable and non-fossil energy. It is generated by a natural geochemical process deep inside the Earth'crust, making it a sustainable and inexhaustible source. Natural Hydrogen is still a little-known source of energy but some projects are already set-up and produce natural hydrogen in industrial quantities. It is the cheapest solution to produce carbon-neutral hydrogen and is competitive with fossil fuels. Its value chain is similar to natural gas production. It includes prospection, selection of sites, drilling, extraction and separation of products. Solution on-sentence summary: Low-cost electricity from an autonomous patented wing drone connected to a ground generator
Identification:
Seeking to meet the EU climate change targets, we will need to at least double the electricity generated from renewables by 2030. Wind power is our second largest energy resource after solar power.  Wind resources could provide 1,800 TW to 3,600 TW of energy, 100X more than the current global demand for power. However, most of this wind is at high altitudes.



Skypull is developing an efficient, reliable and scalable high altitude wind energy system, that consists of an autonomous vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) drone tethered to a ground generator. The drone, operating between 200 and 600 meter elevation, captures much stronger winds compared to traditional wind turbines, enabling the production of abundant low cost electricity potentially in almost any location around the globe. Skypull has a much lower environmental impact versus traditional fossil fuel based electricity generation systems, and also versus traditional wind turbines, by eliminating 90% of their mass and providing for ease of transportation and logistics, with substantially reduced CO2 emissions during its lifecycle. The worldwide patented system is completely safe, thanks to its operational principles and redundant technical solutions.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Drones, Wind power
The environmental benefits: The Skypull 1 MW system energy production is double of a same rated power wind turbine, installed in the same location;The Skypull 1 MW system overall mass (including foundation) is around 60t, vs. approximately 2,000 t of a wind turbine of comparable capacity;The Levelized Cost of Energy (LCoE) of the system ranges between 30-40 $/MWh, allowing it to compete with all fossil fuel based technologies without public incentives ;A Skypull system reduces 99% CO2 emissions (less than 1 g vs 820 g CO2/KWh), when replacing a coal fired power station;Its environmental impact reduces 90% CO2 (less than 1g vs. 13 g/kWh) versus traditional wind turbines, due to much lower energy demand during manufacturing;The drone is 7 times smaller in size compared to a traditional wind turbine rotor, and operates at 200-600 meter altitude, reducing the visual impact by 90%;
The Financial benefits: The Levelized Cost of Energy (LCoE) for a 1MW Skypull system will be 30% less than traditional wind turbines in low wind site locations (6 m/sec avg. annual wind speed);Energy Return on Energy Investment (ERoEI) of Skypull's 1 MW system is expected to be above 150, a value that can grant a new era of economic and social development around the world;One 1 MW Skypull system will produce enough energy to provide sustainable clean and renewable power to 1,100 homes at near zero CO2 emissions over its lifecycle;

Solution on-sentence summary: A semi-submersible floating system providing access to offshore winds in deep maritime areas
Identification: STAR is a semi-submersible floating system for floating offshore wind. Floating offshore wind turbines harness the energy of offshore winds in deep maritime areas farther from the coast, which are powerful and constant. Unlike fixed-foundation wind turbines that are supported by a base, which is directly set on the seabed using a gravity foundation, this Solution is based on a floating structure in concrete, steel or a steel/concrete hybrid combination fixed to the seabed by an anchoring system that controls its movements. Compared to fixed-foundation wind turbines, this innovative technology overcomes the constraints of deep-water installation and is able to produce renewable energy farther from the coast with a low visual impact. The Solution is designed to be competitive, produced in series and easily operated. It can be adapted to the specificities of the operating site and local industrial ecosystems.

Identification: Waste Robotics offers systems, which did not exist 4 or 5 years ago, and makes it possible to compete with an increase of performance and economies over Capex and Opex. The Waste Robotics system uses cutting-edge alternative technology that has more capacity than human sorters. Waste Robotic offers an avant-garde process which makes possible the selective collection of different types of residual materials (and namely organics) by the use of separate bags of different colours, using Waste Robotic's optical sorting. Identification: The Monolith represents the new generation of multifunctional solar towers on the market. Its innovative design allows it to maximize its energy production and storage capacity. The specially designed solar panels use the latest technology solar cells. In addition, its patented structure provides enough storage space for high-capacity batteries. Solution on-sentence summary: Enabling real time computing with edge computing
Identification: ObjectBox empowers storing and processing data locally - on the edge, e.g. a car, windmill - and synchronizing only select data to a central instance (cloud/server) or directly to other edge devices. Uniquely designed to run on restricted devices from sensor to smartphone to server, ObjectBox is faster and more efficient than alternatives, and solves data synchronization out of the box with native language APIs that are fast for developers to implement. This enables the digitization of industries and new IoT use cases that need to * process large volumes of real time data on the edge * work offline, independent from any internet connection * reduce cloud costs and energy consumption * keep data secure, private data private. Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative system for sub-metering electricity consumption
Identification: In a rapidly changing global energy context, energy efficiency is becoming an increasingly important issue. Energy efficiency is the largest contributor to reductions in greenhouse gas emissions globally, with renewable sources of energy coming second. The industry is the world's largest energy consumer, accounting for more than 30% of total global energy consumption. To tackle this issue Qualisteo developed Lynx², a technology dedicated to electrical consumption metering. Lynx² helps to better monitor industrial energy consumption, leading to the identification of potential energy savings. Identification: Traditional urinals not only consume between 1 and 4 litres of water per use, but also need a lot of energy during production, use and transportation. URIMAT waterless urinals reduce the water consumption by 100% and use no energy during operation. Thanks its low weight compared to other urinals, URIMAT plastic waterless urinal range reduces energy consumption during transportation by around 80%.The Solution relies on high-tech plastic or ceramic urinals with an integrated and patented odour-trap (MB-ActiveTrap) which assures that urine is transferred without water to the wastewater pipe network without any odour nuisance for users. The rimless urinal bowl with water-repellent surface assures smooth transfer to the wastewater system and makes cleaning easier compared to water-flushed systems. First-class customer service is provided by the manufacturer and their distributors.

Solution on-sentence summary: Design special molds for the manufacture of thermoset and thermoplastic composites
Identification: Vistex has developed a disruptive technology for the manufacture of advanced thermoset and thermoplastic composite products. The patented Pressure Focusing Layer (PFL) process, which reduces energy consumption as well as capital expenditures and operating expenditures by at least an order of magnitude, provides customers with improved throughput and performance at a competitive price. The PFL process reduces manufacturing waste, while providing equivalent strength, dimensional tolerance, and improved aesthetics when compared to the same autoclave cured products. Vistex utilizes digital modeling and proprietary optimization algorithms to drive the design of the patented fabrication process and manufactures complex components without the need for extensive heat, therefore using less energy.

Solution on-sentence summary: Microbiological bioremediation of heavy metals contaminated soil
Identification: To meet this challenge, this solution is a microbiological bioremediation method to be used on site. Thanks to a specific mixture of selected micro-organisms and enzymes, the populations of natural micro-organisms present in water, soil, sludge, etc. are stimulated. By optimizing their functionality and their processes, it makes it possible to degrade hydrocarbon molecules correctly and quickly, to sequester and inertize heavy metals. Hydrocarbon is an organic molecule and is used by microorganisms as a food source. With PETROLSYNTH, hydrocarbons are degraded up to 95%-99% and this quickly and naturally. Heavy metals first sequestered by micro-organisms, then inertized via several strategies including chelation, inclusion in non-hazardous and energy-free molecules.

Solution on-sentence summary: Biomethane production from mixotrophic single cell algae
Identification:
The concept of the process is a closed circuit of water and biomass in a 1.5 hectares area. For this process, only Algamoil strain can be used, this is our patented mixotrophic single-cell alga composed by 50% of lipids. There are four steps during the cultivation of the algae: 1-Photosynthesis to grow up the biomass sequestrating the CO2; 2-separation of the biomass and the water recycling 100% of water; 3-Heterotrophic growth of the biomass with the decomposition of organic waste, or agriculture by-products to increase the lipids percentage, 4-Separation of the lipids from the solid part.

Main benefits of our solution are: -To reduce the output of the CO2 in the atmosphere by two ways: (i) sequestering more than 9000 tons of CO2 it in a natural way with the photosynthesis and (ii) reducing up to 20% the output of the drainpipes of cars and trucks with the utilization of the biofuel. To reduce the use of food to produce energy (Biodiesel & Biomethane) -To reduce the use of agricultural land to produce energy. Reduce the production of plastic pollution -The high profitability of this solution for the final client/investor.

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular energy storage system for large-scale building applications
Identification: SolarLEAF is a distributed energy storage solution that directly PV couples to solar panels and installs underneath them. This panel-level format is enabled by an  advanced thermal management design which passively ensures that the batteries are maintained at optimal operating conditions. The solution directly addresses the high-cost variability of energy storage installations. These include: permitting, interconnection, customer acquisition, project origination, EPC and other project overheads. In particular, commercial installations in the 50kWh to 1MWh often lack a location to site the energy storage. Yotta addresses this challenge directly. The installation is in-line with the solar installation, requiring very limited additional training for existing solar installers and provides them with a standardized approach for deploying energy storage.

Solution on-sentence summary: A long-lasting bottle made from ocean plastic and supporting coastal communities
Identification: 22 million kilograms of plastic enter into our oceans each day, devastating marine ecosystems. Over 75% originates from uncollected waste and polluted areas that need better waste management. The Ocean Bottle is a long-term solution to the ocean plastic crisis that everyone can be a part of. The Solution is giving plastic a value so it is not discarded and therefore preventing the ocean from being choked with waste. By giving plastic a value in Haiti, Philippines, Indonesia, Egypt and Brazil. tens of thousands of people in coastal communities are engaged to become plastic collectors and have the option of earning a living wage while keeping the environment clean. Each Ocean Bottle funds the equivalent of 1000 ocean-bound plastic bottles  in impoverished coastal communities where there is little or no waste management and plastic pollution is prevalent. Plastic collectors can exchange plastic waste for money or credit via blockchain technology to spend on tuition, tech goods, health care and micro-finance.
Looking For: Network, new clients, funding, visibility, partners, credibility
Tags: Recycled, Packaging, Reusable, Marine & Oceans, Municipal Solid Waste, PET waste, Floating debris

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy efficient data center cooling unit using carbon dioxide as refrigerant
Identification: The data centre industry is an increasingly growing sector, as is its cooling needs. Most of the solutions offered in today's market include synthetic refrigerants which, in case of leaks, has a huge impact on global warming and ozone depletion. The solution aims at providing a unit that would remove synthetic refrigerants from data centres. The Aquilon unit uses 100% natural refrigerant. The computer room air conditioning unit has increased free cooling potential, without a pump or a compressor, because of carbon dioxide's thermodynamic properties.

Solution on-sentence summary: High performance, eco-friendly, self-healing epoxy primer for industrial environment
Identification: Incumbent solutions to the problem of corrosion have included coating components with high toxicity and VOCs. Inspired by nature, our self-healing technology begins to repair coating damage immediately and without manual intervention. AMP-UP 100 Low VOC Self-Healing Primer is a single component, environmentally friendly, and self-healing water based hybrid epoxy primer designed to replace incumbent solvent-borne systems with a higher performing and more environmentally friendly coating system. This novel coating system is designed to displace incumbent coating systems that often release large amounts of volatile organic compounds into the environment. AMP-UP 100 primer also removes steps of mixing separate components before application and has a dry and re-coat time within 1 hour. This primer doubles the lifetime of the coating via built in self-healing technology, that responds to damage when and where it occurs without external intervention. This results in half the amount of paint purchased, half the energy consumed, and only 5% of the VOC's of most solvent-borne coating systems over the lifetime of the surface.

Solution on-sentence summary: A manure additive to fluidize liquid manure and reduce ammonia, methane and nitrous oxide emissions
Identification: SOP® LAGOON is a powdered additive for the treatment of the liquid manure of dairy cows. It is used at 2 grams per cow (0.07 oz per cow), per week, making it very practical and simplifying the logistics for farmers.The application of the product can reduce the emissions of Methane up to 23%, of CO2 up to 22%, Nitrous Oxide up to 100% and ammonia up to 100%. The ammonia reduction that can be achieved in barns with slatted floors does not only constitute an improvement for the health of the animals, but also for the working conditions and health of the operators. It also helps the farmers with the management of liquid manure, dissolving any crusts or sediment, keeping it fluid and reducing/eliminating the need for agitators.

Solution on-sentence summary: A connected voltage control device for controlling energy consumption in large buildings
Identification: The voltage of the electrical power provided by utilities fluctuates at the mains – typically in Europe, between 207 and 253 Volts. Although it does not affect the functionality of the electric loads – designed to work within this range – it affects the electricity consumption. Voltcontrol products stabilize the voltage around 207V, which saves energy and increases the lifetime of electrical devices. The device is connected to a server to record the energy consumption and savings of each building. This platform may also host and transmit information from other sensors related to all energy sources in a building (heat, air conditioning, water, gas, etc.). The VCS voltage stabilization & reduction technology allows clients to save 10-15% on their building's electricity bills and another 20-30% on global building maintenance costs thanks to a longer lifespan of light bulbs, electrical devices & engines. A lower electricity consumption coupled with a longer lifecycle of light bulbs and electrical devices & engines translates into much lower CO2 emissions and lower use of raw materials and transportation as well as less waste. An AI system is currently developed to analyze the consumption data to identify potential problems and send alarms to the client.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners,
Tags: Smart-metering, Maintenance and inspection, Sensors & monitoring, Smart-buildings

Solution on-sentence summary: A high-performing switch-disconnectors for pv and energy storage system applications
Identification: In the solar segment the utility scale solar plants are moving towards the 1500Vdc solutions from 1000Vdc. The need for the switch-disconnector is to be energy efficient and able to achieve the 1500Vdc disconnecting as low amount of poles as possible, which has an impact on the efficiency level as well as lowering the needed cabeling. OTDC switch-disconnectors range above 250A ensure reliable breaking power for every current level, enhancing safety, efficiency and simplicity. For 1500V DC systems, the basic configuration is two poles from 315A up to 800A (IEC 60947) and from 250A up to 600A (UL98B). The ratings from 800A up to 1000A for 1500V are achieved by the parallel connected poles. Both front and side operated models are available. Modularity of the OTDC Switch-disconnector allows to disconnect up to 3 1500Vdc circuits with only one switch. Optimized 2-pole DC switch-disconnectors for 1500V DC utility-scale photovoltaic power plants and for Energy Storage System (ESS) applications bring space savings efficiency with up to 64% reduced power losses compared to weakest in the market and better performance with DC-PV2 ratings.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility
Tags: Electrical grid, Inverter, Maintenance and inspection, Solar photovoltaic

The Financial benefits: Design life of the product 30 years;Due to reduced power losses the annual saving is 44 USD per switch;

Solution on-sentence summary: Mapping the seafloor, offshore wind industries and protecting against illegal fishing
Identification: It is expensive, unsustainable and dangerous to research and monitor oceans and marine environments, yet that information is critical to protecting and understanding the ocean as well as the profitability of the $2.5 trillion marine industry. Data Xplorer is a solar-powered ocean drone, also known as an uncrewed surface vehicle (USV). Powered only by the sun, it can travel on the ocean for months at a time collecting ocean and environmental data using its suite of modular sensors. It sends the data back in real-time through secure communication systems and clients can control the USV from anywhere in the world using our user portal. Capable of traveling both in coastal waters and on the open ocean, and with a customizable platform for multiple sensor integration, it offers the ability to understand our oceans in an entirely new way. Utilizing this technology, Open Ocean Robotics provides specific services in seafloor mapping, marine mammal detection and enforcement against illegal fishing.

Solution on-sentence summary: Digital platform for unlocking the potential of secondary material exchange
Identification: Excess materials and products are currently not exchanged in a structured manner on a large scale. Mounting environmental pressure, consumer awareness and circular ambitions put pressure on companies for taking responsibility, they need to scale up their currently small scale initiatives. Excess Materials Exchange operates a B2B digital platform where companies buy and sell any type of excess materials, products and waste streams.The platform matches materials to their highest value reuse option. On the platform, the Resources Passport Module gives materials an identity and collects material data in a structured manner which allows to find high-value reuse options. The Tracking & Tracing Module allows users to follow physical resource streams by linking them to their digital twin through identifiers (i.e. bar-codes, QR-codes, RFID chips). This enables to communicate when and where products and materials will be released. The Valuation module quantifies the financial, environmental and societal impact of materials to understand which next use application is the most beneficial. Lastly, the Matchmaking Module facilitates the matchmaking of excess materials to new reuse options thanks to Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence.

Solution on-sentence summary: Hydraulic device system for the activated sludge sewage stations
Identification: Traditionally clarifiers are equipped with a Clifford (cylindrical skirt). The currents are directed towards the bottom and have a circular shape in which sludge is captured as a cloud. So that, sludge is spread and it is difficult to gather it and recycle to the aerated tank. Speed-O-Clar is a custom-made HDPE retrofit device improving primary or secondary clarifier performance. A cone shaped piece of equipment, installed at the inlet of circular clarifiers, directs influent onto a baffled plate, changing the direction of flow within the clarifier. This creates a centripetal flow at the bottom which make them more efficient and enhance the limit flow rate.

Tags: Water-networks, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Industrial wastewater, Activated sludge, Water & Wastewater treatment

Solution on-sentence summary: Connecting water utility users in the poorest urban populations
Identification: 1 billion urban dwellers currently lack access to running water at home. Rapid urban growth will make this worse. In 2050, 3/5 of humans will live in cities and need access to water service at home. The task and expense of offering them reliable at-home services are formidable, and requires breakthrough financial and technical innovation. Low-income urban populations have either never been connected to water networks or are being disconnected. In addition, an estimated 50-60% of water utility subscribers cannot pay monthly bills and face disconnection for arrears. CityTaps' vision is running water in every home, with a goal to reach 3 million people by 2023. CityTaps provides the only smart Pay-As-You-Go metering solution to address a billion person market. The CTSuite solution provides a financial and technological offer which allows low income populations to pre-pay their water in micro payments and avoid disconnection. As a result, utilities no long accumulate debts from their subscribers and thus have better financial resources to sustainably serve everyone. CityTaps' solution improves the lives of both water utilities and their subscribers creating a win-win situation for everyone.

Solution on-sentence summary: Automated compact reverse osmosis water purification and desalination system
Identification: Climate change, increasing water scarcity, population growth, demographic changes and urbanization already pose challenges for water supply systems. By 2025, half of the world’s population will be living in water-stressed areas. Re-use of wastewater, to recover water, nutrients, or energy, is becoming an important strategy. Increasingly countries are using wastewater for irrigation – in developing countries this represents 7% of irrigated land. While this practice if done inappropriately poses health risks, safe management of wastewater can yield multiple benefits, including increased food production. EZPuro™ is a robotic reverse-osmosis (RO) water purifier. EZPuro™ technology allows to purify 99.3% of all the contamination in the feed water. Solution on-sentence summary: A dewatering technology for the implementation of the urban sewage sludge directive
Identification: Premier Base has developed an approach to dewatering municipal wastewater sludge for small WWTP's that involves no energy or chemicals. The product receives secondary sludge in the range of 0.8% to 1% DS and dewaters to a range of 7% to 10% (ranges of 30%/40% can also be achieved). The Product A concrete tank*: unit dimensions 1m in-depth, 3m in width and 8m in length.  Sludge Drying Beds may be used for dewatering sludge well digested by means of either anaerobic or aerobic processes. The Sludge Drying Beds does not require any coagulants instead utilizing heat, gravitational forces and the sloping floor to dry the sludge resulting in significantly reduces operational costs of the wastewater treatment plants, a reduction in dried sludge volume and hence a reduction in transport and disposal costs.

Solution name: AWA® : The Smartphone of Solar Energy
Solution on-sentence summary: An efficient, sustainable, and reliable electricity service for every household
Identification:
AWA ®, the Smart Solar Energy Station ® is an individual, harmless, intuitive fully integrated all-in-one solution. Despite having one of the World's Largest Wireless Energy Networks, the Sun, with a 99.999% network coverage, more than 80% of Africa's territory is not served by any electricity grid network. 

More than 65% of the population lives in rural areas and only a fraction of this population currently uses a generator to power basic household equipment, often limited to lighting, ventilation and sometimes a television set. Families have no electricity to run water pumps to have access to safe water or refrigerators to store indispensable vaccines and medicines. To tackle this challenge, users simply have to remove the AWA® from the box and connect the AWA® device either to the Planet Plug® certified household appliance or directly to the electricity circuit-breaker panel to provide safe direct current (DC) power throughout the house. The AWA® enables Direct-Current full-size household appliances such as fridges or freezers to run directly from the harmless DC energy produced by solar panels, eliminating the need for a costly, troublesome and inefficient inverter.

Solution on-sentence summary: A personal styling ai for faster online shopping, higher conversions and less returns
Identification: Every year, the fashion industry faces greater than $35B annual losses in returns, over $60B resulting from insufficient personalization and more than $50B from overstock and out-of-stock in fashion e-commerce in Europe and the USA. Dresslife mitigates these losses with its Personal Styling Artificial Intelligence (AI) that helps shoppers find clothing they like and that fits in a faster and more conveniently way, leading to higher conversions and less returns for fashion retailers. Dresslife sorts products based on a recommendation score, reflecting the probability of a customer liking and keeping an item. Personalization is 6x more effective in all segments other than apparel, due to shorter product lifecycles and the complexity of the human body. Dresslife mitigates losses and achieves similar metrics for fashion e-commerce, by addressing the segment-specific complexities. Global marketplaces, such as Amazon or Alibaba, already reach a revenue uplift of 35% through personalization. Dresslife allows fashion retailers to maintain competitiveness and avoid losing market shares to the larger platforms.

Solution on-sentence summary: Low cost, fast and efficient water infrastructure repair
Identification: Water infrastructure is a vital part of modern society, but in many cases, pipes and other infrastructure are aging, risking damage and leakage. SANEXEN’s ALTRA proven water technology renews and protects aging water infrastructure from the inside. It offers a less disruptive and physically superior alternative to the outright replacement of aging or deteriorated water main pipes. On average 25% less expensive than traditional construction methods, it also presents several other benefits. It is anticipated that the deployment of this technology over 15 years will lead to considerable reduction in carbon emissions, fuel consumption, potable water loss through leaks as well as traffic and urban disruption.

Solution on-sentence summary: A novel, low maintenance technology to keep sharks separated from swimmers and surfers
Identification: The fear associated with shark attacks is causing a sharp decline in beach usage where these accidents frequently occur. SharkSafe Barrier™ (SSB) is the only tested eco-friendly shark specific barrier to protect surfers and swimmers from large sharks. The SSB merges the biomimicry of a thick kelp forest, known to be a natural barrier to some shark species, with large permanent magnets (which overwhelmed sharks' electro-magnetics receptors) to create a shark-deterrent magnetic field. The SSB works 24/7 and is 20 times cheaper to maintain than shark exclusion nets. This novel technology solves problems associated with shark attacks including loss of lives, loss of income for local businesses, and loss of biodiversity in marine ecosystems associated with current sharks culling programs. It thus contributes to the preservation of a healthy ocean ecosystem, while also promoting the sustainable use of ocean resources for economic growth.
Looking For: Network, new clients, visibility, funding, partners, credibility
Tags: Coastal, Marine & Oceans, Saline water, Floating debris
The environmental benefits: No entanglement of non-target species, unlike with nets;Protects people and sharks whilst avoiding culling;
The Financial benefits: Payback in five years thanks to reduced maintenance costs compared to mainstream option;20 times cheaper to operate than shark exclusion nets;

Solution on-sentence summary: An efficient and scalable design for urban farming
Identification: With a growing population, a growing demand for high quality, nutritious food production and competing land use demands, modern agriculture is facing challenges. This Solution from INNO-3B offers an innovative vertical farming technology that is highly optimised, scalable and profitable. Microgreens, leafy greens and herbs are grown in tall production towers at optimal environmental conditions year-round. Parameters include relative humidity, temperature, CO2 concentration and air flow. An automatic crop handling system eliminates the need for operators to go around the field or up-and-down fixed racking, while maximizing space use. Towers can be custom-built to fit the vertical space available in a building up to 40 ft high, and production surface can be upgraded up to 6 times the minimal configuration afterwards, offering economies of scale.

Solution on-sentence summary: Zero emission of paint microplastics and grit from surface treatment of industrial, infrastructure and marine assets
Identification: Over its normal life, paint is removed during surface treatment/maintenance. The predominant methods of surface maintenance are open grit blasting and water jet blasting.  They crush old paint into microplastics, and if these microplastics are not collected (and for the most part, with the traditional systems they are not!), those paint microplastics are released into the environment. To tackle this challenge, the Pinovo system delivers a solution that removes paint and rust from corroded steel surfaces, without microplastics emissions. Inside the tools, grit hits the surface to be treated at high speed. The old paint and rust are then sucked back into the system by vacuum, and are kept in a closed loop and not released into the environment. The grit is recycled and reused 10 to 20 times. After treatment, the surface has a superior finish, and is ready for the new coating. In this way, Pinovo's circular system stops the contamination of the oceans with the paint microplastics from traditional open grit blasting and water jet blasting methods, specifically addressing the objectives of SDG14.1.

Solution on-sentence summary: A smart and flexible sensor network for waste control in the streets
Identification: Very often we see waste around open containers or lids due to excess garbage or misuse of them. This causes a negative visual impact, odors and possible pandemics. Urban Conectum, a device which is installed on street lamps to deploy telecommunications networks and sensors, solves the waste control in the streets predicting the level of content of waste containers as well as evaluating the state of cleaning of the streets. It transmits the following data to the system: level of filling of each container, cleaning rate of the sidewalks, noise level, CO2 level. It allows you to manage alerts about: upcoming overflows of containers, open lids, fire, vandalism, etcetera. The number of openings and closings is measured. An algorithm predicts the fill level by relating the number of openings to the collected weight. Sends an alarm when the speed and fill level is going to overflow. It also sends an alarm when it detects that the container has been left open. The artificial vision for the control of containers and the level of cleanliness of public roads provides: Optimization of capacity and routes Control of the state of road dirt Optimization of cleaning crews.

Tags: Bins, Waste collection, Sensors & monitoring, Software

Solution on-sentence summary: Waterproof heating film providing clean and quiet heat to buildings
Identification:
The effects of climate change and increasing awareness have forced society to reduce the use of fossil fuels such as coal, oil and gas. Reliance on these resources for heating of homes, buildings and industrial processes release carbon dioxide and other greenhouse gases into the atmosphere, which are a major contributory factor in climate change. The solution aims at providing a fossil-free, low carbon, energy-efficient, waterproof FAR infrared heating film for quiet, clean, healthy heating of internal and external homes and buildings. The ultra-thin, flexible heating film can be installed on walls, ceilings and floors and can be cut on the graphene mix to accommodate lights, switches and plug sockets. The heating film can be powered by renewable energy or AC/DC low voltage transformers to heat the building fabric and occupants, saving energy and costs. 

Imagine living and working in a space that brings the outdoors indoors and is not only great for your health but also your pocket.

Solution name: Harvest to Harvest food recovery solution
Solution on-sentence summary: Turning food waste into valuable agricultural products
Identification: Food waste is a global problem. Up to a third of all food gets wasted, ending up in landfills and producing greenhouse gases. According to the UN FAO, if food waste were a country, it would be the third biggest GHG emitter after the USA and China. Food can however be recovered before it becomes waste. The Harvest to Harvest Solution provides a sustainable, profitable and ecologically healthy option to recover food that might otherwise become waste and end up in landfill. The H2H Solution uses a proprietary enzymatic digestion process to recycle food into liquid H2H fertiliser and dried H2H pet food in only a matter of hours. H2H fertiliser improves soil health, feeding plants and beneficial microbial communities, improving plant flowering and fruiting and increasing crop yields. H2H pet food captures the nutritional benefits of perishable fruits and vegetables, meat, fish and prepared foods for greater pet health and wellness.

Solution on-sentence summary: Production of high-performance polymer foams in an industrial scale
Identification: In order to achieve better insulation performance, conventional insulation materials with greater layer thicknesses are preferred for cost reasons. In areas where space is limited or where special curvatures and shapes have to be preserved for monument protection, expensive high-performance materials such as aerogels are required. This often leads to compromise solutions, so that performance is avoided due to the costs. Sumfoam enables a completely new class of polymer materials by reducing the pore size within the foam by a factor 1000 compared to common foams. It has been proved for the first time that the production of these foams is possible using high-pressure extraction technology with climate neutral foaming agent in an industrial scale at short cycle times. Therefore, this is the first technology that allows an economical large-scale production of polymer based high-performance materials, which additionally influence numerous fields of applications in a positive and sustainable way.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners

Solution on-sentence summary: Onsite elimination of waste activated sludge into food for microbes
Identification: The MicroPoP technology focusses on the common and costly waste to dispose of from microbial waste water treatment processing called WAS (waste activated sludge), which is excess waste bacteria to be disposed of. MicroPoP simply lyses (or pops) 100% of the bacteria in the WAS, better than competitors, thereby making an easy food source for the bacteria back in the aerobic or anaerobic treatment system. The digester or waste treatment system bacteria can easily and quickly eat this new food eliminating the waste in a beneficial manner. MicroPoP can be applied beneficially from both an economic and environmental standpoint at almost every industrial facility that uses microbial wastewater treatment processes and that produces WAS. The savings that can be achieved over what is done today can be re-applied to other social purposes.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Identification: ZS2 Techpanel is made out of advanced materials that are safe, sustainable, resilient and energy-efficient. ZS2 Techpanels are pre-fabricated in an advanced manufacturing facility, flat packed and then shipped to sites where they are easily assembled together to construct the building envelope. The result is a structure that has a minimum one-hour fire rating, is highly resistant to mould/mildew/bacteria/humidity/rodents, and is extremely energy efficient regardless of climate. This solution is profitable, greatly reduces the time to construct and the amount of construction waste, increases the energy efficiency compared to other construction practices and is resilient for decades.

Solution name: Internationally scalable waste anaesthetic capture and recycling system
Solution on-sentence summary: Efficiently capture volatile anaesthesia agents and aims to protect healthcare workers
Identification: Volatile anaesthetic drugs are widely used with a global annual turnover of $1.3bn. The drugs are expensive to produce, in monetary and environmental terms. In practice, once exhaled by patients the drugs are vented to atmosphere. This is very damaging to the environment, contributing a huge 3.1 million tons of CO2 equivalents a year. SageTech’s solution prevents this atmospheric discharge, collects the exhaled drug, and re-purifies it, fit for human re-use. Drug metabolism is low, around 5%, so recovery yields are very high. The solution deploys a system of collection and purification that has sustainability at its core. Working with our pressure systems keeps instruments compact and no organic solvents are used in our process. SageTech’s solution offers large financial savings on hospital infrastructure installations and maintenance costs by eliminating the need for expensive air extraction systems to take the exhaled drugs from the operating theatres to the chimney.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Medical & hygienic, Gaseous waste capture, Hazardous waste, Industrial Waste
The environmental benefits: Prevents release of 3.1Mt CO2-eq per year;
The Financial benefits: Eliminates the need for expensive air extraction systems;Substantial financial savings on hospital infrastructure installations and maintenance costs;50% saving versus current environmental damaging infrastructure;

Solution on-sentence summary: A solar-powered UV measurement device that visualizes the process of solar water disinfection
Identification: According to the World Health Organization (WHO) 663 million people still lack access to drinking water sources that are protected from external contamination. The absence of proper water disinfection triggers health and environmental issues that translate into worldwide economic problems. People in rural areas of Least Developed Countries (LDCs) are the most affected and have poor access to safe drinking water. The currently available methods in a household to disinfect water are expensive and have associated health and environmental problems such as toxicity, CO2 emissions, and deforestation. WADI allows households to obtain safe drinking water through a solar disinfection process. It is an external device that indicates the progress of the disinfection process of the water. Therefore it can be used with any PET or UVpermeable glass bottles.

Tags: Developing countries, Drinking-water, Sensors & monitoring, Sterilizing & disinfecting

Solution on-sentence summary: Geothermal and ai-based heating and cooling system for commercial and collective residential buildings
Identification: With 27% of the French CO2 emissions, the building sector is a major contributor. This is a global issue as most developed countries display similar patterns. ACCENTA invented a low-carbon heating and cooling system that reduces up to 95% of the CO2 emissions compared to standard solutions. It relies on inter-seasonal geostorage and waste heat, from air-conditioners or low-carbon solar heat, produced during summer and stored into the ground. In winter, heat pump's yields are optimized by up to 50% using the stored heat, drastically cutting both energy consumption and CO2 emissions.

Solution on-sentence summary: A big data platform for zeroing plastic footprints on the global plastic supply chain
Identification: Plastic waste from the food retail sector is a huge challenge, both for land and water pollution and for carbon emissions.  MIWA technology aims to minimise waste from the single-use packaging of food, non-food and liquid products. MIWA is a smart reusable packaging, built as an integrated hardware and software solution. MIWA reusable packaging works in tandem with unique electronic dispensers placed in retail and the MIWA information system operating in the Cloud, with the connectivity allowing for near-real-time data flows. MIWA packaging and dispensing shelves are equipped with RFID chips and readers, offering substantial opportunities to all value chain stakeholders to enhance efficiency and product/consumer safety and outperform the effects of the current single-use dominant approach. Life Cycle Assessment study shows that MIWA can reduce the overall negative environmental footprint by up to 71%, material usage waste by up to 90% and carbon footprint by 46%. Solution on-sentence summary: A new first choice to reduce  energy losses in industrial motors
Identification: Industrial electric motors use one-third of all the world’s electricity, and the number of motors is set to double by 2040. There’s a clear need for more efficient motors to save energy, cut power bills and reduce CO2 emissions. The IE5 ultra-premium SynRM motors offer up to 50% lower energy losses, lower energy consumption than the commonly used IE2 induction motors. Case studies in industrial installations have demonstrated energy savings of up to 25%, depending on the application. The IE5 level of efficiency is made possible by the SynRM design which combines the performance advantages of permanent magnet technology with the simplicity and service-friendliness of an induction platform. To ensure an environmentally friendly design, the permanent magnets do not feature rare earth materials. Additional benefits of the IE5 SynRM motor are lower bearing and winding temperatures for enhanced reliability and long life. The design also creates less motor noise for a better working environment. IE5 SynRM motors can be used in a wide range of demanding industrial applications where they offer accurate control and high efficiency across the whole speed range, even at partial loads. This makes them an ideal upgrade option for standard induction motors in pumps, fans and compressors as well as in more demanding applications like extruders, concha mixers, winches, and conveyors. IE5 SynRM motors are an easy replacement for induction motors as they have the same size and output power, so no mechanical modifications are required.
Looking For: Visibility
Tags: Motors

Solution on-sentence summary: A nature-based technology for treatment of wastewater
Identification: Wastewater treatment is a vital part of society but can create large emissions during treatment. The System O)) is an effective domestic wastewater treatment system combining Advanced Enviro-Septic (AES) pipes and a bed of filter sand. The system has three functions: Firstly, it helps evenly distribute wastewater coming from the septic tank over the entire leaching bed; Secondly, it treats the effluent; and thirdly, it releases treated water safely into the environment via infiltration into the soil. The strength of this product is in this triple action that mimics the way nature works. It is the only technology that distributes, treats and infiltrates at the same time (no moving parts, no electrical components, no maintenance, no filtering media change).

Solution name: Kinetic Energy Recovery System (KERS) for Heavy Goods Vehicles (HGVs)
Solution on-sentence summary: A retrofittable kinetic energy recovery system for heavy-goods vehicles
Identification: Our economy depends on trucks bringing goods where they need to be cheaply and reliably. Those same trucks generate a considerable amount of pollution that must be reduced: in London, for instance, road freight is responsible for 13% of CO2, 24% of NOx, and 12% of PM2.5 emissions. How can this circle be squared? Some use cases, like short, clearly defined, and unchanging back-to-base routes, such as postal delivery, lend themselves to electrification but this is not the case for the majority of 12t to 44t vehicles and OEM offerings reflect this. Even when available, fully-electric solutions require operators to spend more, haul less, and to depend on charging infrastructure which is sometimes proprietary, in a business sector where margins are razor-thin. The stop/start nature of driving urban or congested routes leads to excessive fuel consumption and emissions. By capturing energy during braking, storing it, and then using this recovered energy to help power the next acceleration, Adgero's KERS can reduce fuel consumption and CO2 emissions on these cycles by over 20% while also reducing NOx and PM. The KERS telematics suite will stream data to the telematics solution of the operator's choice and its ECU is designed to receive over the air updates to ensure peak performance. Adgero's Kinetic Energy Recovery System is affordable, retrofittable, reusable, and compatible with virtually any HGV on the road, whether rigid or tractor-trailer combinations. The electric motor/generator uses no permanent magnets or copper and the energy storage uses no heavy metals, which enables safe and easy recycling at end of life.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Funding, Partners,
Tags: Electric, Motors, Trucks, Fuel efficiency, Electric vehicles, Vibration-to-power, Vehicles
Sectors: Freight, Industry/Goods, Vehicles and vessels, Energy and fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: Retrofittable hybridization system; 25% reduction in fuel burn resulting in a similar drop in CO2 emissions;Reduction of NOx and PM emissions;
The Financial benefits: Payback under three years;Saves 6800 £ per year;

Solution on-sentence summary: The world's first breathing bioreactor to produce food ingredients and proteins more efficiently
Identification: The FAO predicts that we’ll need 100% more plant crops by 2050; however, crop yield improvement is slowing rapidly (now down to 1-2% annually) and it is hard to find new land for agriculture. There is an opportunity in growing food on barren land. Arborea believes that “photosynthetic microorganisms” will be a key choice for the production of food ingredients. Photosynthetic microorganisms are the fastest-growing primary producers of food in nature, and they produce the same ingredients as plant crops, without environmental constraints and pollution. They yield up to 40x time more proteins than plant crops in a single acre of land. Furthermore, they don’t need agricultural feedstock like cane sugar, they don’t need soil, don’t produce nitrogen runoffs, consume little water, don’t promote deforestation or loss of biodiversity.  The “BioSolar Leaf” is a membrane-driven breathing-bioreactor® technology that enables a hyper-efficient gas transfer and temperature control while maintaining optimal growth conditions. In doing so, it creates a radically more effective food production platform resulting in a capital-light, scalable solution that slashes the costs of fermentation.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners,
Tags: Protein alternative, Algae, Bacteria, Microorganisms, Automation
